content: Phoo ntawv nuav yog Hilekiyas tug tub Yelemis tej lug. Yelemis yog ib tug ntawm cov povthawj kws nyob huv lub nroog Anathaus huv Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav.
Thaus Amoos tug tub Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau kaum peb xyoos, tug TSWV txawm lug has rua Yelemis,

hab thaus Yehauyakees kws yog Yauxiyas tug tub ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws, tug TSWV rov has rua Yelemis ib zag ntxiv. Tom qaab ntawd, tug TSWV rov has ntau zag rua Yelemis moog txug thaus kws Yauxiyas tug tub Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws tau kaum ib xyoos. Ces xyoo kaum ib lub tsib hlis ntuj, luas txawm tuaj nteg cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees coj moog lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Thaus koj tseem tsi tau xeeb rua huv koj nam plaab, kuv tub xaiv koj, hab thaus tsi tau yug koj, kuv tub tsaa koj ua tug cev Vaajtswv lug rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg lawm.”
Kuv teb has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv tsi paub yuav qha le caag, rua qhov kuv tseem hluas.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj tsi xob has tas koj tseem hluas, tabsis koj ca le moog rua huv cov tuabneeg kws kuv khaiv koj moog hab qha txhua yaam kws kuv kuas koj qha rua puab.
Koj tsi xob ntshai cov tuabneeg ntawd, rua qhov kuv yuav nrug nraim koj hab tsomkwm koj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV txawm cev teg kov kuv qhovncauj hab has rua kuv tas, “Koj noog kuv has, kuv muab kuv tej lug tso rua huv koj qhovncauj.
Nub nua kuv tsaa koj ua tug muaj fwjchim kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg hab txhua lub tebchaws. Koj muaj peevxwm muab rhu tawm hab muab rhuav, ua kuas puamtsuaj hab muab povtseg, tsim tsaa hab muab cog.”
Tug TSWV nug kuv has tas, “Yelemis, koj pum dlaabtsi?” Kuv teb has tas, “Kuv pum ib tug ceg txiv dluaj.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Yog lawm! Kuv taabtom saib ntsoov  kuas muaj lawv le kuv tej lug.”
Tug TSWV rov has rua kuv tas, “Koj pum dlaabtsi hab?” Kuv teb has tas, “Kuv pum luas rhaub ib laujkaub dlej npau dlug dlaam nyob saab qaumteb hab lub ncauj qaij rua saab nraag nuav.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Yuav muaj kev puamtsuaj saab qaumteb tuaj raug cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav,

rua qhov kuv taabtom hu kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob saab qaumteb tuaj. Puab cov vaajntxwv yuav teeb puab tej zwmtxwv rua ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag, puagncig tug ntsaa yeej hab puagncig cov Yudas tej nroog.
Kuv yuav rau txim rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, rua qhov puab ua txhum hab tso kuv tseg. Puab moog hlawv khoom fij rua luas tej vaajtswv hab puab mlom rua puab pe.
Yelemis, koj ca le moog qha txhua yaam kws kuv kuas koj qha rua puab. Koj tsi xob ntshai puab. Yog nwgnuav koj ntshai thaus koj moog nrug puab nyob, koj yimfuab yuav ntshai heev dlua.

Yelemis, koj ca le noog kuv has, tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, tsi has cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv, cov numtswv, cov povthawj hab cov pejxeem suavdlawg yuav tawmtsaam koj. Tabsis nub nua kuv yuav paab kuas koj muaj zug kovyeej puab; koj yuav zoo ib yaam le lub nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv khov kho, tawv ib yaam le tug ncej hlau hab tug ntsaa yeej tooj. Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj hab tsomkwm koj, puab yuav tsi yeej koj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kuas kuv

coj cov lug nuav moog has rua lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Kuv ncu ntsoov thaus koj tseem hluas koj muab sab npuab kuv; thaus wb nyavnyuas sis yuav koj hlub kuv heev koj lawv kuv qaab lug hlaa taj suabpuam, hab lug hlaa lub tebchaws kws tsi muaj leejtwg cog qoobloo le.
Yixalayees, koj yog kuv tug xwb; koj yog kuv thawj cov qoobloo; kuv tso kev puamtsuaj hab kev txomnyem lug raug cov tuabneeg kws ua phem rua koj; kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees txhua xeem kws yog Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv, mej ca le noog kuv tej lug.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej cov yawmkoob pum kuv ua txhum dlaabtsi, puab txhaj le tsiv ntawm kuv moog lawm? Puab moog pe tej mlom kws tsi muaj qaabhau, txhaj ua rua puab tsi tseemceeb lawm.

Kuv cawm puab dlim nraag tebchaws Iziv lug; kuv coj puab hlaa taj suabpuam kws yog taj xuabzeb, muaj qhov ntuj hab yog lub tebchaws qhuav nkig nkuav, tuag tshaib tuag nqhes, tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob hab hlaa lub tebchaws ntawd le. Txawm le ntawd los puab tsi muab sab npuab kuv le.

Kuv coj puab lug nyob huv lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob, kuas puab txhaj tau noj tej txiv maab txiv ntoo hab txhua yaam kws zoo. Tabsis puab lug ua rua kuv lub tebchaws lamsim taag; puab ua rua lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab tsi huv lawm.

Cov povthawj los tsi quavntsej nug txug kuv has tas, ‘Tug TSWV nyob qhov twg lawm?’. Kuv cov povthawj tsi leeg paub kuv lawm. Cov numtswv ntxeev sab rua kuv, kuv cov cevlug tuav Npaa-aas lub npe cevlug rua suavdlawg; hab puab moog pe tej mlom kws tsi muaj nqes.”
“Yog le ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV txhaj nrug kuv tsaav tuabneeg ua plaub, kuv yuav kom puab cov xeebntxwv.

Mej ca le moog kuas txug tim koog povtxwv Xaipas kws nyob saab nubpoob; hab ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog rua tim lub tebchaws Kedas kws nyob saab nubtuaj. Mej yuav pum has tas yeej tsi tau muaj tej xwm le nuav ib zag le?

Tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg nyob huv nplajteb nuav, tso puab tej vaajtswv tseg; txawm yog tej ntawd tsi yog vaajtswv tag los puab yeej tsi tso tseg le. Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg tau ntsejmuag, tabsis puab tso kuv tseg moog pe tej vaajtswv kws paab tsi tau puab.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj has kuas lub ntuj qeeg ua zug koog ua rua txaus ntshai hab xaav tsi thoob,
rua qhov kuv tsaav tuabneeg tau ua ob yaam kev txhum; puab tso kuv kws yog lub qhov dlej txhawv tseg, hab puab moog khawb dlua ib cov qhovdlej; tabsis tej qhovdlej ntawd tawg pleb dlej xaw taag lawm.
“Yixalayees tsi yog tug ua luas qhev; nwg tsi yog tug kws yug lug ua luas qhev, vim le caag nwg cov yeebncuab pheej soj nraim nwg qaab?
Tej yeebncuab nyooj lawg rua nwg ib yaam le tsuv ntxhuav nyooj; puab ua rua nwg lub tebchaws caj quavpoj hab nwg tej nroog puamtsuaj taag nphob xuav ca tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Meefis hab Tapahes, tuaj muab nwg plaubhau chais dlo dlus.
Yixalayees, koj lob tej xwm nuav rov lug raug koj! Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv. Kuv coj koj kev lug, tabsis koj tso kuv tseg lawm.

Koj pheej yuav moog haus dlej huv tug Dlej Niles kws nyob rua nraag tebchaws Iziv ua dlaabtsi? Koj xaav has tas, koj ua le ntawd yuav muaj nqes rua koj nua los? Koj pheej yuav moog haus dlej huv tug Dlej Efalates kws nyob huv tebchaws Axilias ua dlaabtsi?

Koj tej kev phem kev qas yuav ua rua koj raug kev puamtsuaj, hab qhov kws koj tso kuv tseg, yuav ua siv ua npug lug raug koj. Thaus koj raug kev txomnyem, koj yuav paub has tas, qhov kws koj tso tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv tseg txhum luj kawg le. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Yixalayees, koj tsi ca kuv ua tug kaav koj lug ntev lawm; koj tsi noog kuv lug hab tsi xaav pehawm kuv. Tabsis koj moog ua namndlav rua ntawm tej chaw pe mlom, sau tej roob sab hab huv tej qaab ntoos.
Kuv muab koj cog ib yaam le cog lub noob txiv maab kws zoo. Tabsis vim le caag koj txa ua tsob txiv maab qus kws tsi muaj nqes lawm?
Txawm yog koj muab tej tshuaj kws muaj zug npaum le caag lug ntxuav los kuv tseem pum koj qhov ceb, rua qhov koj lub txim lu rawv koj.

Koj yuav ua le caag has tau tas koj tsi tau ua rua koj lub cev tsi huv, hab tsi tau pe tug mlom Npa-aas le? Koj sim xaav saib, koj tau ua txhum npaum le caag nraag kwj haa lawm; koj ca le leeg paub tej kev txhum kws koj ua. Koj zoo ib yaam le tug maum ntxhuav qus kws nyob tsi tsheej chaw,

hab dlha raag rhi rua tom taj suabpuam. Thaus txug caij tshov lawm, leejtwg yuav muaj cuabkaav tswj tau nwg? Thaus ntawd tug txiv ntxhuav yuav phuv tau nwg yoojyim heev. Tug maum ntxhuav yeej ibtxwm ua le ntawd thaus lub caij tshov.

Yixalayees, koj tsi xob dlha ua rua kutaw hle tawv taag, hab ua qaa qhuav qhawv moog nrhav luas tej vaajtswv. Tabsis koj tseem has tas, ‘Tsi tau! kuv tsi rov qaab lug lawm. Kuv yeej nyam lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv, kuv yuav tsi tso tseg le.’ ”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Tug tubsaab kws luas nteg tau, nwg poob ntsejmuag le caag. Mej cov Yixalayees, tsi has cov vaajntxwv, cov numtswv, cov povthawj hab cov cev kuv lug yuav poob ntsejmuag ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.

Mej cov kws has tas tsob ntoo yog mej txiv hab lub pobzeb yog mej nam, mej txhua tug yuav poob ntsejmuag heev. Yeej yuav muaj tej xwm nuav lug raug mej, rua qhov mej tso kuv tseg hab tsi rov lug cuag kuv lawm, tabsis thaus mej raug kev txomnyem mej tseem tsaa ncauj thov kuv paab hab.”

“Tej vaajtswv kws mej puab rua mej pe nyob qhov twg? Yog tej ntawd cawm tau mej, ces thaus mej raug kev txomnyem, ca le hu tej ntawd lug paab mej! Cov Yudas, mej muaj ntau tug vaajtswv npaum le mej tej nroog!
Mej ywg kuv ua dlaabtsi? Vim le caag mej ntxeev sab rua kuv?
Kuv rau txim rua mej los mej tsi zeem; mej tsi ca kuv qhuab ntuag mej. Mej muab mej cov cevlug tua povtseg, mej nyaum ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav ntaag.

Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le tig pobntseg noog kuv tej lug. Kuv zoo ib yaam le lub taj suabpuam hab lub tebchaws kws ua siv ua npug rua mej los? Vim le caag mej has tas mej yuav ua lawv le mej sab nyam xwb, mej tsi xaav rov lug cuag kuv lawm?
Tug hluas nkauj yeej ncu ntsoov nwg cev zaam lossis tug nkauj nyaab yeej ncu ntsoov nwg cev tsoog kws naav txis tshoob. Tabsis kuv tsaav tuabneeg tsi ncu qaab kuv lug ntev suav tsi txheeb lawm.
Mej txawj ntxag kuas lwm tug nyam mej. Txawm yog tej quaspuj kws ua phem tshaaj los tseem tuaj kawm ntawm mej.
Mej tej rig tsho tsuas cov tuabneeg txomnyem hab cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim tej ntshaav xwb, tsi yog tsuas tubsaab tej ntshaav le.” Tub muaj tej nuav los
“Mej tseem has tas, ‘Peb tsi muaj txim, tug TSWV yeej tsi chim rua peb.’ Tabsis kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua mej vim mej has tas mej tsi tau ua txhum.
Vim le caag mej yuav hloov sab moog pe luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv sai ua luaj? Cov Iziv yuav ua rua mej tu sab nrho ib yaam le cov Axilias tau ua rua mej lawm.
Mej yuav tso cov Iziv tseg, mej yuav txaajmuag tsi muaj cuabkaav tsaa qhovmuag saib leejtwg. Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv tsi leeg paub tej tuabneeg kws mej ca sab rua, puab yuav paab tsi tau mej le.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Yog ib tug txivneej twg nrauj nwg tug quaspuj, hab tug quaspuj ntawd moog yuav dlua lwm tug txivneej lawm, ces tug quasyawg qub moog yuav tsi tau tug quaspuj ntawd rov lug lawm, yog ua le ntawd yuav ua rua lub tebchaws tsi huv. Tabsis Yixalayees, koj moog ntxag ntau tug hluas nraug, nwgnuav koj tseem rov lug cuag kuv dlua hab los?

Koj ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib sau tej ncov roob! Puas tshuav ib qho chaw twg kws koj tsi tau moog ua namndlav rua sau le? Koj moog sawv ntawm tej ntug kev tog koj tej hluas nraug, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg Alav zuv kev tog tua tej tuabneeg kws dlua kev tom taj suabpuam. Koj ua namndlav, txhaj ua rua lub tebchaws tsi huv lawm.
Tub yog vim le ntawd, kuv txhaj sau naag rov qaab, hab tsi tso naag lug rua lub caij ntuj naag. Koj zoo ib yaam le tug namndlav kws tsi paub txaajmuag.
“Nwgnuav koj maam le has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj yog kuv txiv, koj yeej ibtxwm hlub kuv thaus kuv tseem yau lug.
Koj yuav tsi npautawg rua kuv txhua lub sijhawm hab koj yuav tsi chim rua kuv moog ibtxhis le.’ Yixalayees, koj yeej has le ntawd tag, tabsis koj tseem ua kev phem kev qas lawv le koj lub sab nyam.”

Thaus Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj puas pum Yixalayees ua le tug quaspuj kws tsi noog lug ua? Nwg tso kuv tseg hab moog ua namndlav rua sau txhua lub ncov roob hab huv qaab txhua tsob ntoo kws muaj nplooj ntxoov nyog.

Kuv xaav has tas, thaus nwg ua tej nuav txaus sab lawm, nwg yuav tig rov lug cuag kuv, tabsis nwg tsi rov lug cuag kuv le lawm, hab nwg tug vivncaug Yudas kws sab tsi ncaaj los pum ntsoov tej kws nwg ua.

Yudas tub pum kuv muab Yixalayees nrauj hab xaa nwg moog lawm, rua qhov nwg tso kuv tseg hab moog ua namndlav. Tabsis Yudas kws yog Yixalayees tug vivncaug tsi ntshai le. Yudas los kuj moog ua namndlav
hab tsi paub txaajmuag le. Nwg ua rua lub tebchaws tsi huv. Nwg ua kev nkauj kev nraug nrug tej mlom pobzeb hab tej mlom ntoo.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yudas kws yog Yixalayees tug vivncaug kws sab tsi ncaaj ua txuj rov lug cuag kuv; tabsis nwg lub sab yeej tsi npuab kuv le. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Txawm yog Yixalayees tau tso tug TSWV tseg lawm los nwg tseem zoo tshaaj Yudas tug kws sab tsi ncaaj.”
Tug TSWV kuas kuv has rua Yixalayees has tas, “Yixalayees kws sab tsi ncaaj, koj ca le rov lug cuag kuv. Kuv yog tug kws muaj kev hlub hab yuav tsi chim. Kuv yuav tsi chim rua koj moog ibtxhis.

Koj ca le leeg has tas koj tau ua txhum hab ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv. Hab koj ca le leeg has tas koj tau ua namndlav nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv nyob huv tej qaab ntoos kws muaj nplooj ntxoov nyog hab koj tsi noog kuv tej lug. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.

“Cov tuabneeg kws sab tsi ncaaj, mej ca le rov lug cuag kuv; mej yog kuv tug. Kuv yuav xaiv mej cov ib tug huv ib lub nroog hab ib xeem twg ob leeg, hab kuv yuav coj mej rov moog rua sau lub Roob Xi-oos.
Kuv yuav pub kuas mej muaj cov numtswv kws noog kuv lug, puab yuav muaj tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse tswjfwm mej.

Thaus mej fuamvaam coob heev nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, tej tuabneeg yuav tsi has txug tug TSWV lub Phijxaab lawm. Puab yuav tsi has lossis ncu txug le; puab tsi yuav hab yuav tsi ua dlua ib lub ntxiv lawm.

Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd luas yuav hu Yeluxalees has tas, ‘Tug TSWV lub zwmtxwv,’ hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuaj ua ke pehawm kuv. Puab yuav tsi ua lawv le puab lub sab tawv hab puab lub sab phem yuam puab ua lawm.

Yixalayees yuav koom nrug Yudas, hab puab yuav ua ke rov peg lub tebchaws saab qaumteb kws puab raug nteg moog rov lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv tau muab rua puab cov yawmkoob ua puab tug moog ibtxhis.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Yixalayees, kuv txaus sab yuav koj lug ua kuv tub hab yuav muab lub tebchaws kws ntxim sab rua koj, yog lub tebchaws kws zoo tshaaj lwm lub tebchaws huv nplajteb nuav, kuv txaus sab ca koj hu kuv ua txiv, hab tsi xob tso kuv tseg ib zag ntxiv lawm.
Tabsis koj tsi muab sab npuab kuv ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws sab tsi ncaaj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Muaj ib lub suab nrov sau tej ncov roob tuaj: lub suab ntawd yog cov Yixalayees lub suab quaj hab thov, rua qhov puab ua txhum hab tsi ncu qaab tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv lawm.

Mej cov kws tso kuv tseg lawm, ca le rov lug cuag kuv kws yog mej tug TSWV; kuv yuav khu mej tej mob kuas zoo hab pub kuas mej muaj lub sab ncaaj. Mej teb has tas, “Peb ca le rov moog cuag tug TSWV, rua qhov nwg yog peb tug Vaajtswv.
Peb tej mlom kws peb pe sau tej ncov roob paab tsi tau peb le. Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv txhaj paab tau peb xwb.
Tabsis qhov kws peb pe Npa-aas kws yog tug vaajtswv rhuav ntsejmuag ntawd, ua rua peb tej tsaj txhu, tej tub tej ntxhais tuag taag, hab txhua yaam kws peb cov yawmkoob tsim tseg ca puamtsuaj taag.
Tsimnyog peb txaajmuag hab pw dlaa luam rua huv aav tiv txujkev txaajmuag. Peb hab peb cov yawmkoob tau ua txhum rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv; peb yeej tsi fwm hab tsi noog nwg lug tag.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees, yog mej xaav rov lug cuag kuv, mej ca le tig hlo rov lug. Yog mej tso tej mlom kws kuv ntxub tseg hab muab sab npuab kuv,
kuv yuav pub mej tuav kuv lub npe nrug lwm tug sis coglug. Thaus  ntawd txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav thov kuv foom koob moov rua puab hab puab yuav ua kuv tsaug.”

Tug TSWV has rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Mej ca le laij mej tej laj tej teb kws tsi tau laij; tsi xob muab mej tej noob nplej moog tseb rua huv haav xuavpaug.

Cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le mej tau coglug rua kuv kws yog mej tug TSWV, hab muab mej lub sab tso rua kuv kaav. Yog mej tsi ua le ntawd, kuv txujkev chim yuav kub cuag suavtawg, vim mej tej kev phem kev qas. Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav cheem tau kuv txujkev chim le.”

Mej ca le tshuab raaj tshuab xyu nrov nroo ntwg moog thoob tebchaws; ca le has nrov nrov rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalees, kuas suavdlawg ca le tsiv moog rua huv tej nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv.
Ceebtoom kuas suavdlawg moog rua huv lub nroog Xi-oos; ca le tsiv tag kuas dlim, tsi xob ua sab nyaav! Tug TSWV yuav tso kev nruj kev tsiv hab kev puamtsuaj luj kawg nkaus tuaj saab qaumteb tuaj.

Tug kws ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg puamtsuaj tub sawv kev tuaj ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav tawm huv haav zoov lug. Nwg yuav tuaj ua kuas cov Yudas puamtsuaj; tej nroog luj huv tebchaws Yudas yuav puamtsuaj taag, hab tej nroog yuav nphob xuav tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob.
Suavdlawg ca le naav ntaub tsaaj quaj ntsuag hab nyuaj sab, rua qhov tug TSWV txujkev chim tseem tsi tau tshem ntawm cov Yudas moog.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Thaus txug nub ntawd, cov vaajntxwv hab cov numtswv txhua tug yuav qaug zug; cov povthawj yuav ceeb hab cov cev kuv lug yuav xaav tsi thoob le.”

Kuv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj tau dlaag cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees! Koj has tas, yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb lug rua huv, tabsis nav ntaaj nav rag tub hlais puab cejdlaab lawm!”

Lub sijhawm ntawd yuav muaj tug moog has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, cua dlaaj cua dlub taabtom ntsawj tom taj suabpuam tuaj rua puab. Tsi yog tej cua kws ntsawj tej npluag nplej xwb,
tabsis yog tej cua muaj zug heev kws tug TSWV tso tuaj. Qhov ntawd yog tug TSWV txav txim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Mej saib, yeebncuab tuaj ib yaam le tej twv fuab dlub. Nwg tej tsheb neeg dlha tuaj ib yaam le nthwv cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj, hab nwg tej neeg dlha ceev dlua dlaav yaa. Peb swb lawm! Peb puamtsuaj lawm!
Yeluxalees, ca le ntxuav tej kev phem huv koj lub sab kuas huv, koj txhaj yuav dlim koj lub txim. Koj tseem yuav xaav txug tej kev txhum ntawd moog txug thaus twg?
Muaj tuabneeg xaa xuv tsi zoo huv lub nroog Daas hab sau Efalayees TEJ ROOB tuaj.
Puab tuaj ceebtoom rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg hab Yeluxalees has tas yeebncuab taabtom tuaj ntawm lub tebchaws dleb heev tuaj. Cov yeebncuab ntawd yuav tuaj qw tawmtsaam cov Yudas tej nroog,
hab yuav vij lub nroog Yeluxalees ib yaam le cov tuabneeg zuv teb, rua qhov cov tuabneeg huv Yeluxalees ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV. Tug TSWV has le ntawd.

Yudas, koj coj kev puamtsuaj rov lug raug koj, rua qhov koj ua koj lub neej hab koj teg num lawv le koj sab nyam xwb. Tub yog koj tej kev txhum ua rua koj raug kev txomnyem ntaag; txujkev txomnyem ntawd yuav ua rua koj qhuav sab qhawv.
Tug mob! Kuv nyaj tsi taug kuv tug mob lawm! Kuv lub sab! Kuv lub sab puag taag lawm! Kuv nov tej suab xyu hab tej suab sis ntaus sis tua nrov, ua rua kuv nyob tsi tswm le.
Kev puamtsuaj ib yaam taag ib yaam tuaj, ua rua lub tebchaws puag ntsoog taag. Tuab ntsais muag xwb peb tej tsev ntaub puamtsuaj taag; hab tej ntaub qhovrais ndluag taag ua tej dlaim.
Kuv tseem yuav pum tej chij kws kwv ntaus rog, hab nov tej suab xyu hab suab raaj nrov moog txug thaus twg?

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tsaav tuabneeg ruag kawg nkaus; puab tsi paub kuv. Puab zoo ib yaam le tej mivnyuas kws ruag; puab tsi totaub le. Puab tsuas txawj moog ua kev phem kev qas xwb, tabsis puab tsi paub ua qhov zoo.”
Kuv saib lub nplajteb, mas nwg nyob qhuav nkuag ca; hab saib rua sau nruab ntug tsi pum qhov kaaj le.
Kuv tsaa muag saib sau tej roob, pum tej roob ua zug koog, hab tej pov roob los nyob tsi tug.
Kuv saib tsi pum muaj tuabneeg le; txawm yog tej noog los yaa tsiv taag.
Lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob los ua suabpuam taag, tej nroog huv lub tebchaws los puamtsuaj taag vim tug TSWV txujkev chim.
(Tug TSWV has tas lub tebchaws yuav nyob qhuav nkuag ca, tabsis nwg yuav tsi ua kuas puamtsuaj taagnrho.)
Lub nplajteb yuav quaj ntsuag, hab lub ntuj yuav tsaus nti. Tug TSWV has le caag, nwg yeej tsi hloov le; nwg txav txim sab le caag, nwg yeej tsi thim le.

Thaus nov tej suab neeg dlha hab tej suab neevnti nrov, txhua tug yuav tsiv tawm; ibtxha yuav tsiv moog rua huv haav zoov, ibtxha yuav nce moog rua sau tej roob zeb. txhua lub nroog yuav nyob qhuav nkuag ca hab yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob huv ntxiv le lawm.

Yeluxalees, koj raug puamtsuaj lawm! Vim le caag koj naav tej rig tsho lab, vim le caag koj coj saw nyaj saw kub hab zaas qhovmuag? Koj tseev zaam kuas koj zoo nkauj, tabsis tsi muaj qaabhau! Koj tej hluas nraug tso koj tseg hab puab xaav muab koj tua povtseg lawm xwb.

Kuv nov koj lub suab quaj ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws yug mivnyuas, hab qw ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws yug thawj tug mivnyuas, lub suab ntawd yog Yeluxalees lub suab quaj fuas sav, nwg xyaab nwg txhais teg hab has tas, “Kuv puamtsuaj lawm! Puab taabtom tuaj muab kuv tua povtseg!”

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, ca le moog rua tom tej kev! Tsaa muag saib puagncig mej! Mej saib kuas tseeb! Moog nrhav tom tej kab tej khw saib puas muaj ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab muab sab npuab Vaajtswv? Yog mej nrhav tau tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, ces tug TSWV yuav zaam Yeluxalees lub txim.
Txawm yog mej has tas, mej pehawm tug TSWV, mej has le ntawd, tabsis mej tsi ua lawv le mej has.

Qhov tseemceeb, tug TSWV xaav kuas mej muaj txujkev ncaaj nceeg xwb. Tug TSWV nplawm mej, tabsis mej tsi quavntsej; nwg ntaus mej, tabsis mej tsi xyum ua zoo. Mej tawv ncauj heev hab tsi tso mej tej kev txhum tseg le.

Kuv xaav has tas, “Cov tuabneeg nuav tsi meejpem hab tsi paub qaabhau le. Puab ua le tuabneeg ruag, puab tsi paub ua tej kws puab tug Vaajtswv nyam, hab puab tsi paub tej kws Vaajtswv xaav kuas puab ua.

Kuv yuav moog cuag cov tuabneeg kws muaj meejmom hab nrug puab thaam. Puab paub tej kws puab tug Vaajtswv nyam, hab puab paub tej kws tug TSWV xaav kuas puab ua.” Tabsis puab txhua tug tsi leeg paub tug TSWV lub fwjchim hab tsi noog nwg lug.

Vim le ntawd tsuv ntxhuav txhaj tawm huv haav zoov lug tum puab; maa yuav lug tom taj suabpuam lug muab puab dlua kuas ndluag ua tej dlaim, hab tsuv txaij yuav nyaag lug rua huv puab tej nroog. Yog puab tawm moog rua saab nrau, puab yuav raug dlua ua tej dlaim vim puab ua kev txhum ntau heev, hab tso Vaajtswv tseg zug zug lawm.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Vim le caag kuv txhaj zaam txim rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg? Puab tso kuv tseg hab moog pe tej mlom kws tsi yog Vaajtswv lawm. Kuv pub kuv tsaav tuabneeg tau noj tsau npo, tabsis puab moog ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab siv puab lub sijhawm moog ntxag tej namndlav.
Puab zoo ib yaam le tej txiv neeg qus kws rog hab xaav phuv maum; puab xaav ntsoov rua txujkev ntxag luas tej quaspuj.
Puas tsimnyog ca kuv rau txim rua puab, vim puab tej kev txhum? Hab ca kuv ua pauj rua tsaav tuabneeg kws ua le nuav?

Kuv yuav ca yeebncuab tuaj txav kuv tsaav tuabneeg tej vaaj txiv maab povtseg, tabsis tsi pub ua kuas puab tuag taag, kuv yuav kuas yeebncuab muab tej ceg txiv maab ntshua povtseg; rua qhov tej ceg txiv maab ntawd tsi yog kuv le.
Cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas tsi muab sab npuab kuv hlo le. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg tsi leeg paub nwg hab has tas, “Nwg yeej yuav tsi ua le caag rua peb le!  Yuav tsi muaj kev puamtsuaj lug raug peb! Yuav tsi muaj kev tsuv kev rog lossis kev tshaib kev nqhes lug raug peb le!”

Puab has tas cov cev Vaajtswv lug tso ncua xwb, puab yeej tsi nov tug TSWV has rua puab le. Tabsis tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has rua kuv tas, “Yelemis, vim cov tuabneeg nuav has lug saib tsi taug kuv le ntawd, kuv yuav muab kuv tej lug kws kub cuag suavtawg tso rua huv koj qhovncauj. Cov tuabneeg ntawd yuav zoo ib yaam le tej tawg, suavtawg yuav kub puab taag dlu lug.”
Cov Yixalayees, tug TSWV yuav coj ib tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob dleb heev tuaj tawmtsaam mej. Yog tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug hab nyob ntev lug lawm. Mej tsi paub tsaav tuabneeg ntawd tej lug le.
Puab cov tubrog kws tua neevnti muaj zug heev, hab puab tua tsi taabncuab leejtwg le.

Puab yuav noj mej tej qoob hab tej zaub mov; puab yuav tua mej tej tub tej ntxhais kuas tuag taag. Puab yuav tua mej tej tsaj txhu hab yuav txav mej tej txiv maab hab ntuv tej txiv ncuav pas povtseg. Tej nroog muaj ntsaa yeej kws mej ca sab rua yuav raug yeebncuab tej tubrog muab tsoo pob puag taag.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Txawm yog le caag los nub ntawd, kuv yuav tsi pub kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg tuag tu noob.

Yelemis, thaus puab nug has tas, vim le caag kuv ua tej nuav, koj has rua puab tas, vim puab tso kuv tseg hab moog pe luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv huv mej lub tebchaws, yog le ntawd puab yuav tau moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv nyob rua lwm tebchaws.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Koj ca le moog has rua Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv huv tebchaws Yudas has tas,
Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg ruag hab tsi totaub, ca le tig pobntseg noog kuv tej lug; mej muaj qhovmuag tabsis tsi pum kev hab muaj pobntseg, tabsis tsi nov lug.

Kuv yog tug TSWV; vim le caag mej tsi fwm kuv? Vim le caag mej tsi ntshai kuv tshee nyo ntawm kuv lub xubndlag? Kuv muab lub taj xuabzeb ua nrim quas dlej havtxwv, yog tug nrim kws nyob moog ibtxhis tsi muaj leejtwg hlaa dlhau. Txawm yog havtxwv ntsawj tuaj los yuav tsi dlhau hab havtxwv ndlaas tuaj los yuav tsi pob.
Tabsis mej yog tuabneeg tawv ncauj hab ntxeev sab, mej moog xu quas dlaag rua ib caag hab tso kuv tseg.
Txawm yog kuv tso naag lug lawv caij lawv nyoog rua mej hab pub mej muaj qoobloo sau txhua xyoo los mej tsi paub fwm kuv le.”
Mej tej kev txhum ua rua mej tsi tau txais Vaajtswv tej koob moov.
“Muaj ib cov tuabneeg sab phem nyob nrug kuv tsaav tuabneeg; puab pw zuv tog ib yaam le tej tuabneeg nthuav tsig cuab noog,  tabsis yog puab cuab muv kuas maag tuabneeg.
Tej tuabneeg moog cuab tau noog puv tawb le caag, cov tuabneeg sab phem moog fuab luas tej khoom lug puv tsev ib yaam le ntawd. Vim le ntawd puab txhaj npluanuj hab muaj fwjchim,
hab muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag ua rua puab rog. Puab ua kev phem kev qas tsi paub dlhuav le. Puab tsi paab tsaa tej mivnyuas ntsuag cai lossis tsi ua ncaaj rua cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom.
“Tabsis kuv kws yog tug TSWV, yuav rau txim rua puab, vim tej kws puab ua ntawd; kuv yuav ua pauj rua tsaav tuabneeg nuav.
Muaj ib yaam xwm phem kws xaav tsi thoob tshwm rua huv lub tebchaws nuav:
Cov cevlug has lug dlaag xwb; cov povthawj tswjfwm cov pejxeem lawv le cov cevlug has, hab kuv tsaav tuabneeg tsi caam le. Tabsis thaus kawg puab yuav ua le caag?”

Cov Npeenyamees, mej ca le tsiv kuas dlim! Ca le tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog! Mej ca le tshuab raaj tshuab xyu kuas nrov ntshu nrooj huv Tekau-as hab rauv tawg huv Npethes Hakhelees kuas nchu paa! Kev txomnyem hab kev puamtsuaj yuav tuaj saab qaumteb tuaj raug mej.
Lub nroog Xi-oos zoo nkauj kawg le, tabsis yuav raug puamtsuaj taag;
tej vaajntxwv hab puab tej tubrog yuav tuaj tsuam yeej rua qhov ntawd. Puab yuav tsaa puab tej tsevntaub lawv le puab sab nyam puagncig lub nroog.

Puab yuav has tas, “Ca le npaaj kuas txhij, peb yuav moog tua lub nroog Yeluxalees! Peb yuav moog tua thaus taav su!” Tabsis tom qaab ntawd, puab has tas, “Lig heev lawm! Nub tub yuav poob qho hab ntxoov ntxoo lug luas lawm yuav tsaus ntuj.
Peb tog kuas tsaus ntuj peb maam moog tua; peb yuav rhuav lub nroog tej chaw faajxwm kuas puamtsuaj taag.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has rua cov vaajntxwv ntawd, kuas moog txav ntoo lug meem ua chaw nce moog vij lub nroog Yeluxalees. Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees, vim nwg tsimtxom lwm tug.

Dlej txhawv huv lub qhov tshij tuaj le caag, tej kev phem kev qas txhawv huv Yeluxalees tuaj le ntawd. Kuv nov muaj kev nruj kev tsiv hab kev puamtsuaj; lossis kev mob kev nkeeg hab nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug nyob huv lub nroog ntawd xwb.
Cov tuabneeg huv Yeluxalees, ca tej kev txomnyem nuav qha mej lossis ca kuv tso mej tseg; kuv yuav muab mej lub nroog hloov ua suabpuam kuas tsi muaj tuabneeg moog nyob.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has rua kuv tas, “Cov Yixalayees yuav raug luas lwg kuas dlu lug, ib yaam le tej ceg txiv maab kws luas dle txiv taag lawm. Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum paab kuas txhua tug dlim thaus kws tseem muaj sijhawm.”
Kuv txhaj teb has tas, “Yog kuv moog has hab ntuag puab, leejtwg yuav noog kuv has? Puab yog tuabneeg tawv ncauj hab tsi noog koj tej lug, puab luag tej kws koj kuas kuv qha rua puab.

Koj txujkev chim tawmtsaam puab kub lug huv kuv tuaj, ua rua kuv nyaj tsi taug lawm.” Ces tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Muab kuv txujkev chim laub rua sau tej mivnyuas kws nyob ntawm tej kev hab rua tej tub hluas kws tuaj sis sau ua ke. Tej quaspuj hab txivneej yuav raug luas nteg moog, hab tej tuabneeg laug los luas yuav tsi tseg le.
Puab tej vaaj tse, tej laj teb hab tej quaspuj luas yuav txeeb coj moog rua lwm tug. Kuv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws nuav.
Cov tuabneeg ntawd, tsi has cov numtswv lossis tej pejxeem txhua tug ua tsi ncaaj kuas puab npluanuj; txawm yog cov cev Vaajtswv lug hab cov povthawj los ua tsi ncaaj rua tej pejxeem ib yaam nkaus.
Puab yuav has tas kuv tsaav tuabneeg tej qhov txhaab tsuas yog kus mivntsiv xwb. Puab has tas, ‘Zoo lawm lauj!’ Tabsis qhov tseeb tag yeej tsi tau zoo le.

Qhov kws puab ua kev phem kev qas le ntawd, puab puas paub txaajmuag? Puab yeej tsi paub txaajmuag le. Puab tub tsi paub has tas, ua le ntawd puab yuav poob ntsejmuag; yog le ntawd, puab txhaj poob ntsejmuag le lwm tug kws tub poob lawm. Thaus kuv rau txim rua puab, yog nub kawg rua puab lawm! Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg has tas, “Mej ca le moog sawv tom tej kev tshuam saib hab nug luas has tas, tej qub kev thaus u nyob qhov twg hab txujkev kws zoo dlua ndlais yog txuj twg? Mej ca le taug txuj ntawd, mej txhaj yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.” Tabsis puab teb has tas, “Peb yuav tsi ua le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV tsaa ib cov tuabneeg moog zuv tog noog luas tshuab raaj tshuab xyu ceebtoom rua suavdlawg. Tabsis puab teb has tas, “Peb tsi noog.”
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj has tas, “Txhua tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le tig qhovntsej noog, mej txhaj paub has tas, yuav muaj xwm dlaabtsi tshwmsim lug raug kuv tsaav tuabneeg.
Lub nplajteb, koj ca le noog kuv has; kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug tsaav tuabneeg nuav, rua qhov puab tsi noog kuv lug hab tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug qha.

Tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab kws puab coj huv tebchaws Senpas lossis tej txumlom kws puab coj huv lub tebchaws dleb heev tuaj, yuav muaj nqes dlaabtsi rua kuv? Kuv yuav tsi txais puab tej khoom fij hab tej tsaj kws puab coj tuaj hlawv fij.
Kuv yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg ntawd dlawm qaug. Puab tej txiv tub, tej phoojywg hab tej tuabneeg zej zog yuav tuag taag huv tuabsi.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Yuav muaj tuabneeg tuaj huv lub tebchaws peg saab qaumteb tuaj; puab yog tsaav tuabneeg muaj fwjchim kws nyob dleb heev taabtom npaaj tuaj ua rog.

Puab tuav rawv ntaaj hab neevnti ntawm teg; puab yog cov tuabneeg kws ua nruj ua tsiv hab tsi taabncuab leejtwg le. Puab caij neeg dlha nrov nroo ntwg tuaj cuag dlej havtxwv ndlaas. Puab npaaj nrooj yuav tua lub nroog Yeluxalees.”

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Thaus peb nov tej xwm nuav, peb tej teg tsaug leeg tsaa tsi taug. Peb ntshai heev ib ce mob lwj ntsuav ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws mob plaab yug mivnyuas.
Peb tsi muaj peevxwm tawm moog rua tom tej ntug zog, lossis taug kev moog rua qhov twg le, rua qhov peb cov yeebncuab yeej npaaj rawv tog tua peb xwb, ua rua peb ntshai kawg le.”

Tug TSWV has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg tas, “Mej ca le npua ntaub tsaaj hab dlaa qhov tshauv. Quaj kua muag ndlwg lawg ib yaam le mej quaj mej tug tub kws mej hlub tuag, rua qhov tuab ntsais muag xwb, yeebncuab tub tuaj tua mej lawm.
Yelemis, koj ca le sim kuv tsaav tuabneeg ib yaam le koj sim tooj sim hlau, saib puab yog tuabneeg zoo le caag.
Puab yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab, tawv ncauj hab puab tawv npaum nkaus le tej tooj hab tej hlau. Puab yog tuabneeg tsi ncaaj hab nyam nkawg xaiv rua nuav rua u.

Lub yeejvub yeej kub kawg lawm, tabsis tej quav tooj quav hlau tseem tsi yaaj hab ndlwg tawm le. Txawm yog kuv muab kuv tsaav tuabneeg nchuav dlua los yuav tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi, rua qhov tseem muaj cov tuabneeg ua phem nrug puab nyob.
Suavdlawg yuav hu puab has tas, yog tej quav tooj quav hlau kws tsi muaj nqes, rua qhov kuv kws yog tug TSWV tso puab tseg lawm.”

Tug TSWV kuas kuv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, qhov chaw kws cov Yudas tuaj pehawm tug TSWV. Tug TSWV kuas kuv sawv ntawm roojvaag qha tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tej lug rua puab has tas, “Mej ca le tso plhuav mej lub neej qub hab mej tej num tsi zoo kws mej ua tseg, hab tig lug ua lub neej tshab, kuv txhaj yuav pub mej nyob ntawm nuav.
Mej tsi xob ntseeg luas tej lug kws dlaag has tas, ‘Peb dlim lawm! Ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev!’
“Mej ca le tso plhuav mej lub neej qub hab tej num tsi zoo kws mej ua tseg, ib leeg ua ncaaj rua ib leeg.

Tsi xob quab yuam lwm tsaav tuabneeg, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab tej puj ntsuag. Tsi xob tua tej tuabneeg tsi muaj txim kws nyob huv mej lub tebchaws. Tsi xob pe luas tej vaajtswv, rua qhov tej ntawd yuav ua rua mej raug kev puamtsuaj.
Yog mej ua lub neej tshab, kuv txhaj yuav pub mej nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej cov yawmkoob ua puab tug moog ibtxhis lawm.
“Mej sim saib, mej tsuas ca sab rua tej lug dlaag ntxag xwb.
Mej ua tubsaab, tua tuabneeg, ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg, dlaag twv ntuj twv teb, tua tsaj fij rua Npa-aas hab pe luas tej vaajtswv kws mej yeej tsi tau pe dlua le.
Mej ua tej kws kuv ntxub los mej tseem muaj plhus tuaj sawv taabmeeg kuv huv lub Tuamtsev hab khaav has tas, ‘Peb tub dlim lawm!’
Mej xaav has tas, kuv lub Tuamtsev yog qhov chaw rua tej tubsaab tuaj nkaum nua los? Kuv tub pum tej kws mej ua taag lawm.

Mej ca le moog rua peg lub nroog Silaus  hab saib lub chaw kws yaav taag lug kuv xaiv tseg ua thawj lub chaw rua suavdlawg pehawm kuv, saib zoo le caag lawm. Kuv ua rua lub nroog ntawd puamtsuaj taag, tub yog vim kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees ua kev phem kev qas.
Mej tau ua tej kev txhum kws kuv has ntawd lawm. Txawm yog kuv ntuag mej ntau zag lawm los mej tsi noog kuv has le, hab thaus kuv hu mej los mej tsi teb,

yog le ntawd, kuv yuav rhuav lub Tuamtsev kws mej ca sab rua ib yaam le kuv rhuav lub nroog Silaus lawm. Thaaj chaw kws kuv muab rua mej cov yawmkoob hab mej nuav, kuv yuav muab rhuav ib yaam le kuv rhuav lub nroog Silaus hab.
Kuv yuav ntab mej tsiv ntawm kuv moog, ib yaam le kuv ntab mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees tawm moog lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Yelemis, koj tsi xob thov kuv paab cov tuabneeg nuav. Koj tsi xob quaj hab thov kuv cawm puab; tsi xob thov kuv zaam txim rua puab, rua qhov kuv yuav tsi noog koj tej lug thov.
Koj tsi pum tej kws puab taabtom ua nyob huv cov Yudas tej nroog, hab tom tej kev kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees los?

Tej mivnyuas moog khaws tawg, cov txivneej rauv tawg, cov quaspuj ntse moov nplej puab ncuav cub coj moog fij rua tug mlom quaspuj kws hu ua ‘Nam Vaajntxwv Ntuj; puab muab cawv laub fij rua luas lwm tug vaajtswv ua rua kuv chim.
Tabsis kuv puas yog tug kws chim? Puab txhaj yog cov kws chim hab poob ntsejmuag.’

Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, yuav laub kuv txujkev chim lug rua lub Tuamtsev nuav. Kuv yuav laub rua sau tej tuabneeg, tej tsaj txhu, tej ntoo hab tej qoobloo. Kuv txujkev chim zoo ib yaam le lub cubtawg kws tsi muaj leejtwg yuav tua tau.

“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, tej tsaj kws mej coj tuaj tua hlawv fij rua kuv, muaj ibtxha mej muab hlawv taagnrho fij rua sau lub thaaj hab muaj ibtxha mej noj tau. Txawm yog txuj kevcai txwv tsi pub noj los kuv kws yog tug TSWV has tas, mej noj tau!”
Thaus kuv coj mej cov yawmkoob tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuv tsi tau has txug tej tsaj kws puab coj tuaj tua hlawv fij lossis lwm yaam khoom fij le.
Tabsis kuv has kuas puab noog kuv lug, kuv txhaj yog puab tug Vaajtswv hab puab txhaj yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Kuv has kuas puab coj lawv le kuv tej lug, puab lub neej txhaj yuav vaammeej.
Tabsis puab tsi noog kuv has lossis tsi quavntsej kuv tej lug le. Puab tawv ncauj hab ua lawv le puab lub sab phem qha puab. Vim le ntawd, puab txhaj ua phem zuj zug hab ua tsi tau zoo le lawm.
Txij nub kws mej cov yawmkoob tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug txug nwgnuav, kuv khaiv kuv cov tubkhai kws yog cov cev kuv lug tuaj cevlug rua mej tsi tu ncua le.
Tabsis mej tsi quavntsej lossis tsi noog puab tej lug qha. Mej seem hajyam tawv ncauj hab ntxeev sab ua phem tshaaj mej cov yawmkoob.
“Yog le ntawd Yelemis, koj yuav pav tej lug nuav rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis puab yuav tsi noog koj has; koj hu puab tabsis puab yuav tsi teb.

Koj yuav has rua puab tas, puab yog tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv lug, txawm yog kuv rau txim rua puab los puab tsi zeem le. Puab tsi ca sab rua kuv, tsi muaj leejtwg has txug kuv le lawm.”

“Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej ca le quaj ntsuag; mej ca le txav mej tej plaubhau hab coj moog povtseg, ca le moog hu zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag sau tej ncov roob, rua qhov kuv kws yog tug TSWV chim rua mej, kuv txhaj tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg tseg lawm.
“Cov Yudas ua phem ua qas kawg le. Puab muab puab tej mlom kws kuv ntxub coj tuaj tso rua huv kuv lub Tuamtsev, ua rua lub Tuamtsev tsi huv lawm.

Puab tseem teeb tau ib lub thaaj hu ua Taufes rua huv lub Haav Hinoos, ua chaw rua puab coj puab tej tub tej ntxhais moog tua hlawv fij. Tabsis kuv tsi tau kuas puab ua le ntawd, kuv tsi tau xaav txug tej ntawd le.

Yog le ntawd, muaj ib nub suavdlawg yuav tsi hu has tas Taufes lossis lub Haav Hinoos lawm, tabsis yuav hu ua lub Haav Tua Tuabneeg. Luas yuav coj tej tuabneeg tuag tuaj log rua ntawd, rua qhov tsi muaj chaw log tuag lawm.
Tej noog hab tej tsaj nruab nraag yuav lug noj tej cev tuag ntawd, hab tsi muaj leejtwg yuav lawv tej tsaj ntawd tsiv.
Lub tebchaws ntawd yuav ua suabpuam. Kuv yuav ua kuas tej suab raaj suab qeej kws nrov lomzem hab kev noj tshoob haus kug huv cov Yudas tej nroog hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tej kev ntsag moog.

“Lub sijhawm ntawd luas yuav tuaj khawb cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv, tej numtswv, cov povthawj, cov cev kuv lug hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tej pobtxhaa tawm huv puab tej qhov ntxaa moog.

Tsimnyog sau tej pobtxhaa ntawd coj moog log, tabsis luas muab puab tej pobtxhaa tso pawg lug rua sau npoo aav ib yaam le tej quav nyuj. Luas yuav muab tej pobtxhaa ntawd tso rua lub nub, lub hli hab tej nubqub zab, yog lub nub lub hli hab tej nubqub kws puab teev, puab pe, puab moog tuavxaam hab puab nyam.

Cov tuabneeg kws seem ntawm tsaav tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas nuav, puab nyob ntawm tej chaw kws kuv ntab puab moog nyob, puab yuav ntshaw tuag tshaaj ntshaw ua neej nyob. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kuas kuv has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg has tas, “Tug tuabneeg kws qaug lawm txawm yuav tsi sawv le los? Tug tuabneeg kws yuam kev lawm txawm yuav tsi thim rov lug le los?
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, vim le caag mej tsiv ntawm kuv moog, mej txawm tsi tig rov lug cuag kuv le lawm? Mej nyam mej tej mlom heev, mej txhaj tsi rov lug cuag kuv.

Kuv ua tuab zoo noog, tabsis mej tsi has tej lug tseeb le. Mej cov tsi muaj ib tug kws txawj tu sab rua nwg tej kev txhum; mej cov tsi muaj ib tug nug has tas, ‘Kuv ua txhum dlaabtsi?’ Mej txhua tug nyag ua lawv le nyag lub sab nyam ib yaam le tug neeg kws dlha too hauv quas li moog rua huv tshaav rog.

Txawm yog tej noog paag hawv los tub paub lub caij kws yaa rov lug rua ntawm nwg lub chaw; tej nquab, tej luv hab tej noog dlej los tub paub lub caij tsiv. Tabsis kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej tsi paub txuj kevcai kws kuv muab rua mej coj le?
Mej yuav ua le caag has tau tas, mej yog tuabneeg txawj ntse hab mej paub kuv tej kevcai zoo? Mej saib, cov sau kevcai tub muab tej kevcai hloov lawm!
Mej tej tuabneeg txawj ntse yuav raug kev txaajmuag, puab yuav ntshai hab raug nteg moog; puab tub tsi leeg paub kuv tej lug, yuav ua le caag has tas puab muaj tswvyim?

Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav muab puab tej teb rua lwm tug, hab yuav muab puab tej quaspuj rua lwm tug txivneej yuav. Cov tuabneeg ntawd, tsi has tej numtswv lossis tej pejxeem, txhua tug puavleej ua tsi ncaaj kuas puab npluanuj. Txawm yog cov cev kuv lug hab cov povthawj los ua tsi ncaaj rua cov pejxeem ib yaam nkaus.
Puab suav has tas, kuv tsaav tuabneeg tej qhov txhaab tsuas yog kus mivntsiv xwb. Puab txhaj has tas, ‘Zoo lawm lauj!’ Tabsis qhov tseeb tag, yeej tsi tau zoo le.

Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej tsi txaajmuag rua tej kev phem kev qas kws mej ua le los? Mej tsi paub txaajmuag le; mej tub tsi paub has tas, ua le ntawd mej yuav poob ntsejmuag. Yog le ntawd, mej txhaj poob ntsejmuag le lwm tug kws tub poob ntsejmuag lawm; thaus kuv rau txim rua mej, yog nub kawg rua mej lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.

“Kuv xaav sau kuv tsaav tuabneeg ib yaam le tug kws nwg sau nwg tej qoob; tabsis puab zoo ib yaam le tsob txiv maab hab tsob txiv ncuav pas kws tsi txi txiv; txawm yog tej nplooj tub qhuav hab zeeg taag lawm los kuv yuav ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj txeeb lub tebchaws nuav.”

Tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg sis nug has tas, “Peb tseem yuav nyob le nuav tog ua dlaabtsi? Peb ca le tsiv moog rua huv tej nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej hab tuag rua ntawd. Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv yeej pum zoo ca peb tuag. Tug TSWV muab tshuaj muaj taug rua peb haus, vim peb ua txhum rua nwg lawm.
Peb nrhav kev thaajyeeb, tabsis tsi tau ib qhov zoo le; peb nrhav kev khu mob, tabsis tau kev txhawj kev ntshai xwb.

Peb cov yeebncuab tub tuaj nyob txhij huv lub nroog Daas lawm; hab peb nov puab tej neeg tshuab zum zawg. Thaus puab cov neeg hee ua rua peb lub tebchaws tseeg nkawg. Peb cov yeebncuab tuaj rhuav peb lub tebchaws hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv, peb lub nroog hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv kuas puamtsuaj huv tuabsi.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej tsaa qhovmuag saib, kuv yuav tso ib cov naab muaj taug lug rua huv mej; cov naab ntawd yuav tum mej, mej yuav ntxag tsi tau le.”
Kuv txujkev quaj ntsuag kh u tsi tau le; mob kuv lub sab kawg.

Mej noog saib! Kuv nov kuv tsaav tuabneeg lub suab quaj thoob plawg lub tebchaws. “Tug TSWV tsi nyob sau roob Xi-oos lawm los? Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav Xi-oos tsi nyob lawm los?” Tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Vim le caag mej pe mej tej mlom hab nyo taubhau hawm lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv kws tsi muaj qaabhau ua rua kuv chim?”
Tej tuabneeg quaj has tas, “Lub caij ntuj kub tub xaus hab lub caij sau qoobloo los tub dlhau lawm, tabsis peb tseem tsi tau dlim.”
Kuv lub sab quaj ntsuag, vim kuv cov tuabneeg raug puamtsuaj lawm; kuv quaj tu sab nrho ua rua kuv ib ce txhaav taag.
Txawm tsi muaj tshuaj nyob huv cheebtsaam Nkile-as le los? Txawm tsi muaj kws khu mob nyob qhov ntawd le los? Vim le caag, tsi muaj leejtwg khu kuv tsaav tuabneeg kuas zoo mob le?
Kuv xaav kuas kuv lub taubhau yog lub qhovdlej txhawv, hab ca kuv ob lub qhovmuag ua cav dlej rua kua muag ndlwg; kuv txhaj tau quaj taag nub taag mo rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws raug luas tua tuag.
Kuv xaav kuas muaj ib lub chaw rua kuv nyob tom taj suabpuam; kuas kuv nyob nrug dleb kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Puab txhua tug yog tuabneeg tsi ncaaj hab yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab.

Puab nyam has lug dlaag; puab tsi has lug tseeb, tabsis puab has lug dlaag thoob tebchaws. Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tsaav tuabneeg ua kev phem kev qas ib yaam taag ib yaam tuaj; hab puab tsi leeg paub has tas kuv yog puab tug Vaajtswv.”

Txhua tug yuavtsum ceevfaaj nwg tug phoojywg; hab tsi muaj leejtwg ntseeg nwg tug kwvtij sab; rua qhov tej kwvtij puavleej has lug dlaag ib yaam le Yakhauj, hab txhua tug puavleej txobthuam nwg tej phoojywg.

Puab txhua tug ua tsi ncaaj rua puab tej phoojywg; hab tsi muaj ib tug has lug tseeb le; puab cob puab tug nplaig kuas has lug dlaag, hab tsi tso puab tej kev txhum tseg. puab ua kev phem ib yaam taag ib yaam tuaj, hab ib leeg dlaag ib leeg. Tug TSWV has tas, nwg tsaav tuabneeg tso nwg tseg lawm.

Vim le nuav tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus txhaj le has tas, “Kuv tsaav tuabneeg ua phem ua qas heev, kuv yuav ua le caag rua puab? Kuv yuav sim puab, kuv yuav muab kuv tsaav tuabneeg nchuav dlua tshab ib yaam le nchuav nyaj.
Puab tug nplaig zoo ib yaam le xibxub vug kws tua tuabneeg tuag, puab has lug dlaag ntxag xwb. Txhua tug ua txuj has lug zoo rua tej tuabneeg zej zog, tabsis yog puab cuab muv tog luas xwb.
Kuv yuav tsi rau txim rua puab vim tej kws puab ua ntawd los? Kuv yuav tsi ua pauj tsaav tuabneeg kws ua le nuav los? Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Yelemis has tas, “Kuv yuav quaj ntsuag rua tej hauv roob, hab quaj rua tej tshaav zaub, rua qhov tej ntawd qhuav taag lawm, hab tsi muaj leejtwg taug kev hlaa qhov ntawd le. Tsi nov tej tsaj nyeg ua suab saab qhov twg le. Tej noog hab tej tsaj qus los tsiv taag lawm.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav ua kuas lub nroog Yeluxalees puamtsuaj taag, hab ca ua chaw rua tej maa nyob; tej nroog huv tebchaws Yudas yuav ua suabpuam tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob.”

Kuv nug has tas, “Tug TSWV, vim le caag lub tebchaws nuav yuav qhuav ua suabpuam taag hab tsi muaj tuabneeg taug kev hlaa qhov ntawd le lawm? Leejtwg txhaj yuav txawj ntse hab totaub tej nuav? Koj yuav qha rua leejtwg kuas nwg moog pav rua lwm tug?”
Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Tej nuav tshwmsim, tub yog vim kuv tsaav tuabneeg tso kuv tej lug kws kuv qha rua puab tseg lawm. Puab tsi noog hab tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug.
Tabsis puab tawv ncauj hab moog pe tej mlom Npa-aas ib yaam le puab cov yawmkoob qha puab pe.

Yog le ntawd, koj ca le saib tej kws kuv kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav ua, kuv yuav muab nroj ab rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg noj hab muab tshuaj muaj taug rua puab haus.

Kuv yuav muab puab ntab moog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws puab hab puab cov yawmkoob tsi tau paub hab tsi tau pum dlua nyob. Hab kuv yuav ca yeebncuab tuaj tawmtsaam puab moog txug nub kws muab puab rhuav puamtsuaj taag.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Mej xaav saib yuav muaj dlaabtsi tshwm lug! Ca le hu cov quaspuj kws txawj nyav tuaj nyav hab hu cov quaspuj kws txawj hu nkauj quaj ntsuag tuaj hu nkauj.”
Tej tuabneeg has tas, “Ca le kawgkag hu puab tuaj hu nkauj hab nyav rua peb noog, kuas peb kua muag ndlwg si laim huv peb qhovmuag lug ib yaam le dlej.”

Mej noog tej suab quaj huv lub nroog Xi-oos: “Peb raug puamtsuaj lawm lauj! Peb poob ntsejmuag kawg le! Peb ca le tawm huv peb lub tebchaws moog; peb tej vaaj tse luas tub muab rhuav pob puag taag lawm.”
Kuv has tas, “Mej cov quaspuj, ca le noog tug TSWV has hab ua tuab zoo noog nwg tej lug, qha mej tej ntxhais kuas txawj nyav, hab qha mej tej phoojywg kuas txawj hu nkauj quaj ntsuag.
Kev tuag tub nkaag ntawm peb tej qhovrais lug rua huv peb tej vaaj tse, hab txav peb tej mivnyuas kws taabtom ua si ntawm tej kev hab tej tub hluas kws ncig tom tej kab tej khw lawm.”

“Tej tuabneeg tuag pawg lug rua txhua qhov chaw, ib yaam le tej quav nyuj tom tej nraag, hab ib yaam le tej naab nplej kws cov tuabneeg hlais nplej ua poob tsi muaj leejtwg sau. Tej lug nuav yog tug TSWV kuas kuv has.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg txawj ntse tsi xob khaav puab tej tswvyim, lossis cov tuabneeg muaj zug tsi xob khaav puab tug zug, lossis cov tuabneeg npluanuj tsi xob khaav puab tej nyaj txag.

Yog leejtwg xaav khaav, nwg yuavtsum khaav has tas nwg paub hab totaub kuv, rua qhov kuv txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis, kuv ua ncaaj hab has tseeb xwb. Tej nuav yog tej kws hum kuv sab. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv yuav rau txim rua cov Iziv, cov Yudas, cov Edoos, cov Amoos, cov Mau-am hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob tom taj suabpuam kws pheej nyam txav plaubhau tuab tuab lu.  Cov tuabneeg ntawd puavleej ua kevcai txav, tabsis puab tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg. Cov tuabneeg ntawd hab cov Yixalayees puavleej tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg.”
Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le noog tej lug kws tug TSWV has rua mej.

Nwg has tas, “Mej tsi xob ua kev phem kev qas ib yaam le lwm tsaav tuabneeg ua; tsi xob ca tej xwm kws tshwmsim sau nruab ntug ua rua mej xaav tsi thoob, txawm yog lwm tsaav tuabneeg ntshai tej ntawd los xij.
Cov tuabneeg ntawd tej kev ntseeg tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi; puab moog txav ntoo huv haav zoov lug rua cov kws txua ntoo muab cuabyeej txua
hab muab nyaj muab kub lug vuam rua. puab muab ntsa hlau ntsa kuas tsi xob qaug.

Tej mlom ntawd zoo ib yaam le tej mojzeeg kws luas dlai rua tom tej teb dlib; tej mlom ntawd tsi txawj has lug; luas yuavtsum nqaa tej mlom ntawd, rua qhov tej mlom ntawd tsi txawj moog kev. Mej tsi xob ntshai tej mlom ntawd, rua qhov mlom ua tsi tau phem rua mej hab paab tsi tau mej.”
Tug TSWV, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav zoo npaum le koj; koj yog tug muaj zug luj zug nchaav, koj lub koob lub npe nrov nchaa moo lug hab muaj fwjchim heev.

Tug Vaajntxwv kws kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg, leejtwg txhaj tsi kaam fwm koj? Koj yog tug kws tsimnyog peb fwm; txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej tuabneeg txawj ntse lossis puab tej vaajntxwv tsi muaj ib tug zoo npaum le koj.
Puab cov ntawd puavleej ruag hab tsi thoob tsib. Tej mlom ntawd yog ntoo xwb, qha tsi tau dlaabtsi rua mej.

Puab muab tej nyaj kws coj tim Xapees tuaj, hab cov kub kws coj huv tebchaws Ufas lug vuam tej mlom ntawd. Tej mlom ntawd puavleej yog cov tuabneeg kws txawj nchuav nyaj nchuav kub hab txawj txua ntoo txua xwb; puab muab tej rig tsho ntaub xav hab ntaub tsaamxem rua tej mlom ntawd naav, tej ntaub ntawd yog cov tuabneeg kws txawj ntus ntaub ntus xwb.

Tabsis tug TSWV, koj yog tug Vaajtswv tseeb; koj yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob hab yog tug vaajntxwv kws nyob moog ibtxhis. Thaus koj chim lub nplajteb ua zug koog; txhua tsaav tuabneeg tiv tsi taug koj txujkev chim.
(Mej yuavtsum qha rua puab has tas tej mlom ntawd tsi yog cov kws tsim lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj; tej mlom ntawd yuav puamtsuaj taag; hab yuav tsi muaj nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav lawm.)
Tug TSWV tsim lub nplajteb lug ntawm nwg lub fwjchim; nwg tsim lub qaab ntuj lug ntawm nwg lub tswvyim, hab nthuav lub ntuj lug ntawm nwg txujkev txawj ntse.

Thaus tug TSWV has rua tej dlej sau nruab ntug, ces tej dlej ntawd txawm nrov nroo ntwg; nwg ua kuas muaj fuab tsaus nti tim qaab ntug lug. Nwg ua kuas muaj tsaglig xub rua thaus naag lug, hab tso cua huv nwg lub txhaab tuaj ntsawj.
Tuabneeg txhua tug puavleej ruag hab tsi muaj kev txawj ntse; cov tuabneeg nchuav mlom yuav raug txaajmuag, rua qhov tej mlom kws puab nchuav tsi caj sa hab cuav xwb.
Tej mlom ntawd tsi muaj nqes hab tsimnyog raug thuam; thaus tug TSWV txav txim rua puab, puab yuav puamtsuaj taag.

Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tsi zoo le tej mlom ntawd; nwg yog tug kws tsim ib puas tsaav yaam, hab nwg yog tug xaiv cov Yixalayees ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg lub npe hu ua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, luas tuaj vij mej lawm! Mej ca le sawbsim mej tej khoom.
Tug TSWV yuav ntab mej tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog; nwg yuav tso kev txomnyem lug rua mej moog txug nub kws mej puamtsuaj taag tsi tshuav ib tug seem le. Tug TSWV has le ntawd.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees txhaj has tas, “Peb raug mob saab kawg le! Peb tej qhov txhaab yuav khu tsi zoo le. Peb xaav has tas, peb yuav tiv taug tej nuav!

Peb tej tsevntaub puamtsuaj taag; tej hlua kws nqug los po hab tu taag. Peb tej mivnyuas pluj taag tsi tshuav ib tug nrug peb nyob paab peb tsaa tsevntaub; hab tsi tshuav ib tug paab peb dlai tej ntaub thaiv qhovrais lawm!”

Kuv teb has tas, “Peb cov thawjcoj ruag kawg le; puab tsi thov tug TSWV ua tug coj kev. Tub yog vim le nuav puab txhaj ua tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi le, hab peb cov tuabneeg txhaj tsiv moog nyob ua saab ua sua taag lawm.
Mej ca le noog! Muaj ib tsaab xuv tuaj! Yog lub suab ua tsuv ua rog nrov dloog dlaj saab qaumteb tuaj; puab yuav tuaj ua kuas cov Yudas tej nroog ua suabpuam taag ua chaw rua tej maa nyob.”
Tug TSWV, kuv paub has tas tsi muaj leejtwg kws nwg rov ua tug tswv kaav nwg; hab tsi muaj leejtwg kws nwg rov tswj nwg lub neej.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ntuag koj tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis thaus koj chim, thov koj tsi xob ua nruj ua tsiv lossis rau txim nyaav rua peb, nyob tsaam peb tuag lawm.

Thov tshem koj txujkev chim moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi pehawm koj hab cov tuabneeg kws tso koj tseg lawm. Puab tua koj tsaav tuabneeg, puab ua rua peb puamtsuaj, hab ua rua peb lub tebchaws puamtsuaj taag dlu lug lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Koj ca le ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej lug cog tseg nuav. Koj moog has rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas
kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, kuv tau foom tsi zoo rua txhua tug kws tsi coj hab tsi ua lawv le tej lug cog tseg nuav lawm.

Tej lug nuav yog tej kws kuv cog tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob thaus kuv coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv kws zoo ib yaam le puab nyob huv lub qhovcub nchuav hlau lug. Kuv has kuas puab noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm. Kuv has rua puab tas, yog puab noog kuv lug, puab yuav ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv.

Ces kuv yuav ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob has tas, kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob rua puab kws nwgnuav puab tub tau lawm.” Kuv teb tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav ua le ntawd.”

Thaus ntawd tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le moog rua huv cov Yudas tej nroog hab tom tej kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Koj qha kuv tej lug rua puab noog hab kuas puab ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg nuav.
Thaus kuv coj puab cov yawmkoob tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuv ntuag puab nyaav kawg kuas puab noog kuv lug hab kuv tseem naj nub ntuag puab lug txug nwgnuav.

Tabsis puab tsi noog hab tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug le. Puab tseem tawv ncauj hab ua phem ib yaam le qub. Kuv kuas puab ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg, tabsis puab tsi ua. Kuv txhaj rau txim rua puab lawv le tej lug kws kuv has tseg lawm.”
Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees taabtom tuavhuv tawmtsaam kuv.

Puab rov ua tej kev txhum kws puab cov yawmkoob ua. Puab cov yawmkoob tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv has. Puab pe luas tej vaajtswv. Cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas rhuav tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.
Yog le ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV txhaj qha rua puab has tas, kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab hab puab yuav tsiv tsi dlim le. Thaus puab thov kuv paab, kuv yuav tsi noog puab tej lug thov.

Thaus ntawd, cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav moog thov tej vaajtswv kws puab teev hab pe kuas paab puab. Tabsis thaus kws kev puamtsuaj tuaj ti puab lawm, tej vaajtswv ntawd yuav paab tsi tau puab le.
Cov Yudas tej mlom ntau npaum nkaus le puab tej nroog, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees teeb thaaj teev tug mlom Npa-aas kws phem qas ntau npaum nkaus le tej kev huv lub nroog.
Yelemis, koj tsi xob thov kuv paab cov tuabneeg nuav. Thaus puab raug kev txomnyem, puab thov kuv paab, kuv yuav tsi noog puab tej lug.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws kuv hlub taabtom ua phem ua qas. Puab muaj cai tuaj huv kuv lub Tuamtsev ua dlaabtsi? Puab xaav has tas, puab tuaj coglug  hab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij, ces puab txawm yuav dlim kev puamtsuaj nua los? Hab puab yuav muaj kev zoo sab nua los?

Muaj ib zag kuv hu has tas, puab yog tsob txiv ntoo roj kws muaj nplooj tsaus nti hab txi txiv zoo nkauj kawg; tabsis nwgnuav kuv yuav muab suavtawg hlawv tej nplooj kuas kub nyab cig nrov nroo ntwg cuag xub nroo hab muab tej ceg luv huv tuabsi.

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, yog tug kws cog cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas; tabsis nwgnuav kuv has rua puab tas, kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab. Puab rov ua rua puab raug kev puamtsuaj, rua qhov puab ua txhum; puab tua tsaj fij rua Npa-aas txhaj ua rua kuv chim.”
Tug TSWV qha rua kuv paub has tas, kuv cov yeebncuab tuavhuv yuav tua kuv.

Thaus tug TSWV tsi tau qha rua kuv paub, kuv zoo ib yaam le tug mivnyuas yaaj kws luas yuav caab moog tua. Kuv tsi paub has tas luas tub tuavhuv yuav ua phem rua kuv. Luas has tas, “Peb ca le muab tsob ntoo kws tseem khov kho  ntawd ntuv povtseg; ca le muab nwg tua kag, txhaj tsi muaj leejtwg ncu txug nwg le lawm.”

Kuv thov tug TSWV has tas, “Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, koj yog tug kws txav txim ncaaj nceeg; koj paub tuabneeg lub sab hab tej kev xaav. Kuv thov koj ua pauj cov tuabneeg ntawd rua kuv pum ntsoov, rua qhov kuv tub muab kuv rooj plaub tso rua koj has lawm.”
Cov tuabneeg Anathaus xaav muab kuv tua povtseg, puab has rua kuv tas, yog kuv pheej cev tug TSWV tej lug, puab yuav muab kuv tua povtseg.

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “kuv yuav rau txim rua puab txhua tug! Puab tej tub hluas yuav raug nav ntaaj nav rag tuag; puab tej mivnyuas yuav tuag taag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes.
Kuv tub teem sijhawm tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug cov tuabneeg Anathaus lawm, thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, puab yuav tsi dlim ib tug le.”

“Tug TSWV, yog kuv ua plaub rua koj; koj yuav yog tug kws yeej xwb. Tabsis kuv xaav nug koj txug txujkev ncaaj nceeg. Vim le caag cov tuabneeg sab phem tsuas muaj vaammeej zuj zug xwb? Vim le caag cov tuabneeg sab tsi ncaaj ua dlaabtsi los tav?
Koj yog tug cog puab, puab txhaj nrhau caag; puab luj hlub hab tawg paaj txi txiv. Puab naj nub has koj lub npe, tabsis puab lub sab tsi npuab koj.

Tabsis tug TSWV, koj paub kuv zoo; koj pum ntsoov tej kws kuv ua hab paub has tas, kuv hlub koj npaum le caag. Thov koj ntab cov tuabneeg sab phem nuav moog ib yaam le tug yaaj kws luas caab moog tua; koj zuv rawv puab moog txug thaus luas muab puab tua lawm.

Yuav ca peb lub tebchaws qhuav, hab tej nroj tsuag huv peb tej laj teb ntsws moog txug thaus twg? Tej tsaj hab tej noog tuag taag vim tej kev phem kev qas kws peb cov tuabneeg ua; puab has tas, ‘Vaajtswv yeej tsi paub tej kws peb ua.’ ”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Yelemis, yog koj nrug cov tuabneeg nuav sis tw, koj tub qaug zug lawm koj yuav ua le caag nrug neeg sis tw dlha? Yog has tas koj tub tsi tau luag nyob huv tej taj nraag nuav, koj yuav ua le caag tau luag nyob huv lub haav zoov ntawm ntug dlej Yauladees?
Txawm yog koj tej kwvtij hab koj tsev tuabneeg los ntxeev sab rua koj; puab ua ib nqaag tawmtsaam koj. Txawm yog puab yuav has lug zoo npaum twg rua koj los koj tsi xob tso sab rua puab.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tso cov Yixalayees tseg lawm; kuv tsi leeg paub tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv. Kuv muab tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv hlub cob rua puab cov yeebncuab teg.
Tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv ntxeev sab rua kuv; puab nyooj rua kuv ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav nyooj huv haav zoov; vim le ntawd kuv txhaj ntxub puab.
Tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv zoo ib yaam le tug noog kws tej dlaav yaa txhua phaab tuaj muab. Ca le hu tej tsaj qus tuaj nrug noj!
Ntau tug numtswv txawv tebchaws tuaj rhuav kuv lub vaaj txiv maab puamtsuaj taag; puab tuaj tsuj kuv tej teb ua lwj ua lam; puab ua rua lub tebchaws kws kuv hlub ua suabpuam taag.
Puab ua rua kuv lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag ca; lub tebchaws quaj saib ntsoov kuv; thoob plawg lub tebchaws ua suabpuam taag, tsi muaj leejtwg quavntsej le.
Cov tuabneeg fuab noj fuab haus tuaj nyob puv nkaus sau tej roob suabpuam. Kuv txhaj tso kev tsuv kev rog tuaj rhuav lub tebchaws kuas puamtsuaj taag; tsi muaj leejtwg tau nyob kaaj sab lug le.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg cog nplej, tabsis puab sau tau txhauv xwb; puab rau sab ua num, tabsis puab tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi le. Tub yog vim kuv txujkev chim, puab txhaj tsi muaj qoob sau.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv muaj lug yuav has rua tej tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob ibncig cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws kws ua rua lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua cov Yixalayees puamtsuaj lawm. Kuv yuav tshem cov tuabneeg sab phem ntawd tawm huv puab tej tebchaws moog ib yaam le luas dlob nroj povtseg, hab kuv yuav cawm cov Yudas kuas dlim ntawm puab cov yeebncuab teg.
Tabsis tom qaab kws muab puab tshem tawm lawm, kuv yuav rov hlub puab. Kuv yuav coj txhua tsaav tuabneeg rov moog nyob huv puab tej tebchaws.

Yog puab ntseeg hab ua lawv le kuv tsaav tuabneeg txuj kevcai kawg sab kawg ntsws, hab tuav kuv lub npe coglug has tas, ‘Tug TSWV muaj sa nyob,’ ib yaam le puab kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg tuav Npa-aas lub npe coglug, puab txhaj yuav muaj feem nrug kuv tsaav tuabneeg nyob ua ke hab vaammeej.
Tabsis yog ib tsaav tuabneeg twg tsi noog kuv lug, kuv yuav tshem tsaav tuabneeg ntawd hab ua kuas puab puamtsuaj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has kuas kuv moog yuav ib txuj hlaab ntaub maag lug sa, tabsis nwg has rua kuv tas, “Koj tsi xob muab raus dlej le.”
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj moog yuav tau ib txuj hlaab ntaub maag lug sa.
Tug TSWV rov has rua kuv tas,
“Koj ca le moog rua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates hab muab txuj hlaab ntawd zais rua huv ib lub qhov ntawm cov pobzeb.”
Kuv txhaj coj txuj hlaab ntawd moog zais ze rua ntawm ntug Dlej Efalates lawv le tug TSWV has rua kuv.
Tau tsi ntev tom qaab nuav, tug TSWV has kuas kuv rov moog muab txuj hlaab ntawm tug dlej Efalates lug.
Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj rov moog, thaus kuv moog txug ntawm qhov chaw kws kuv zais txuj hlaab, kuv pum has tas txuj hlaab tub lwj taag tsi zoo lawm.
Tug TSWV rov has rua kuv tas,
“Qhov nuav yog qha rua koj paub has tas, kuv yuav rhuav cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees txujkev khaavtheeb kuas puamtsuaj taag.

Cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas nuav tsi noog kuv lug. Puab tawv ncauj hab ua phem ua qas tshaaj yaav taag lug, puab teev hab pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv. Yog le ntawd puab yuav zoo ib yaam le txuj hlaab kws lwj taag tsi zoo siv lawm.

Kuv xaav kuas cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas cog ruaj rua ntawm kuv ib yaam le txuj hlaab kws khi ruaj rua ntawm dluav. Kuv ua le ntawd kuas puab txhaj tau ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, qhuas kuv hab fwm kuv lub npe; tabsis puab tsi noog kuv lug le.”

Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, “Yelemis, koj has kuas cov Yixalayees ntim cawv txiv maab puv nkaus txhua lub hub. Puab yuav teb koj has tas, puab paub has tas yuavtsum ntim cawv txiv maab kuas puv txhua lub hub.

Koj has rua puab tas, kuv kws yog tug TSWV, kuv yuav muab cawv txiv maab txhaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, tsi has cov vaajntxwv kws yog Daviv cov xeebntxwv, cov povthawj, cov cev kuv lug, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog txug thaus puab qaug cawv huv tuabsi.

Ces kuv yuav muab puab tsoo kuas tawg ib yaam le cov hub sis tsoo tawg, tsi has tug laug lossis tug hluas los yuav tuag taag. Kuv yuav muab puab tua kuas tuag taag, tsi mov tsi tshua lossis tsi hlub puab le.”
Cov Yixalayees, tug TSWV tub has lawm! Ca le txu fwjchim hab noog nwg lug.

Fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ua ntej kws nwg tsi tau tso kev puamtsuaj lug, hab ua ntej mej kutaw dlawm qaug sau tej roob; ua ntej nwg muab qhov kaaj kws mej xaav tau hloov ua qhov tsaus dlub ncab.

Yog mej tsi noog lug, kuv yuav moog quaj tuabywv nyob ib qho, vim mej txujkev khaavtheeb; kuv yuav quaj tu sab heev, kuas kuv tej kua muag ndlwg si laim, rua qhov tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg raug luas nteg moog lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le has kuas vaajntxwv hab nwg nam ca le nqeg sau lub zwmtxwv lug, rua qhov obtug ob lub mom kub tub poob sau obtug taubhau  lug lawm.
Tej nroog kws nyob huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb, luas tub tuaj vij taag lawm, tsi muaj leejtwg moog tau rua huv tej nroog ntawd le. Cov Yudas raug nteg huv tuabsi lawm.”
Yeluxalees, koj ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib! Koj tej yeebncuab taabtom tuaj saab qaumteb tuaj! Cov tuabneeg kws muab tso rua koj saib kws ua rua koj khaav nyob qhov twg lawm?
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws koj xaav has tas yog koj cov phoojywg tuaj tua yeej koj hab tswjfwm koj, koj yuav has le caag?  Yuav mob koj npaum nkaus le tug quaspuj kws taabtom mob plaab yuav yug mivnyuas.
Yog koj nug has tas, “Vim le caag tej xwm nuav txhaj lug raug kuv? Vim le caag luas dlua kuv tej rig tsho ndluag taag hab yuam kuv? Tub vim yog koj ua kev txhum ntau heev.

Tug tuabneeg tawv dlub puas hloov tau nwg dlaim tawv kuas dlawb lossis tug tsuv txaij puas hloov tau kuas tsi xob txaij? Yog has tas, ob yaam kws has nuav hloov tau, tsi taag koj yuav qha, tej tuabneeg sab phem yeej yuav hloov ua tau tuabneeg zoo.
Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas koj tawg ri sua ib yaam le tej quavnyaab kws cov cua tom taj suabpuam ntsawj.
Tug TSWV has tas, tej nuav yog tej kws koj tau. Tej nuav yog tej kws kuv npaaj tseg rua koj, rua qhov koj tau tso kuv tseg hab ca sab rua tej vaajtswv cuav.
Tug TSWV yuav hle koj cev rig tsho kuas koj labqaab hab txaajmuag.

Nwg pum ntsoov koj ua tej kws nwg ntxub. Hab nwg pum ntsoov koj moog pe luas tej vaajtswv sau tej ncov roob hab huv tej taj nraag, ib yaam le tug txivneej kws nyaag nrhw thaam luas tej quaspuj lossis ib yaam le tug txiv neeg xob kws lawv quas ncav tej maum neeg qaab. Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej puamtsuaj lawm! Thaus twg mej maam le ua tau tuabneeg zoo?”
Tug TSWV qha rua kuv txug ntuj qhua teb nkig has tas,
“Yudas taabtom quaj ntsuag; nwg tej nroog puamtsuaj taag, nwg tej pejxeem dlaa huv aav hab ntxhuv sab kawg, hab Yeluxalees quaj thov kev paab.

Cov tuabneeg npluanuj khaiv puab tej tubkhai moog nqaa dlej; cov tubkhai moog rua ntawm tej qhov kws khawb tog dlej naag, tabsis tsi muaj dlej; puab nqaa thoob qhuav rov qaab lug tsev puab qaug zug hab ntxhuv sab heev puab txhaj muab ntaub kauv ntsejmuag.
Vim tsi muaj naag lug, puab lub tebchaws txhaj qhuav heev, cov tuabneeg ua laj ua teb ntxhuv sab kawg, puab txhaj muab ntaub kauv puab ntsejmuag.
Txawm yog tug maum muaslwj huv haav zoov kws nyavnyuas yug tau mivnyuas los ca le muab tug mivnyuas tso tseg vim tsi muaj zaub noj.
Tej neeg luav qus sawv sau tej ncov roob kws dlo dlus; hab ua paa txug sav qhe ib yaam le tej maa; tej neeg luav ntawd tsaus muag tsi pum kev vim tsi muaj zaub noj.

Kuv tsaav tuabneeg quaj thov kuv has tas, ‘Tug TSWV, txawm yog peb tej kev txhum tawmtsaam peb, los thov koj paab peb lawv le koj tau coglug tseg lawm. Peb tau tso koj tseg ntau zag, peb tau ua txhum rua koj tag.

Tug TSWV, koj yog cov Yixalayees lub chaw vaamkhom; koj yog tug kws paab peb dlim kev puamtsuaj. Vim le caag koj ua ib yaam le tug qhua kws nyob huv peb lub tebchaws, hab ib yaam le tug tuabneeg taug kev kws pw ib mos xwb?

Vim le caag koj zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws ceeb ib plhaw, hab zoo ib yaam le tug tubrog kws paab tsi tau leejtwg le. Tabsis tug TSWV, koj tseem nrug nraim peb! Peb yog koj tsaav tuabneeg, thov koj tsi xob tso peb tseg.’ ”

Tug TSWV has txug tsaav tuabneeg nuav tas, “Puab nyam tso kuv tseg hab puab tsi tswj puab lub sab le, yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tsi txaus sab rua puab. Kuv yuav ncu ntsoov puab tej kev txhum hab rau txim rua puab, vim tej kev txhum kws puab ua.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj tsi xob thov kuv paab cov tuabneeg nuav.

Txawm yog puab yoo mov thov kuv los kuv yuav tsi noog puab tej lug thov; txawm yog puab tua tsaj hab muab nplej tuaj hlawv fij rua kuv los kuv yuav tsi txaus sab rua puab. Kuv yuav tua kuas puab tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog, hab ca puab tuag tshaib tuag nqhes, tuag mob tuag ntsaaj.”

Kuv has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj yeej paub has tas cov cev koj lug taabtom has rua suavdlawg tas, yuav tsi muaj kev tsuv kev rog hab tsi muaj kev tshaib kev nqhes le lawm, rua qhov koj tau coglug has tas peb lub tebchaws yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb xwb.”

Tabsis tug TSWV teb has tas, “Cov cevlug tuav kuv lub npe has lug dlaag xwb; kuv tsi tau khaiv puab moog lossis kuv tsi tau kuas puab moog qha lossis tsi tau has ib lus rua puab le. Tej ywgtoog kws puab has ntawd tsi yog lug ntawm kuv; tej kws puab qha tshwm ntawd tsi muaj qaabhau, yog puab xaav xwb.

Kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav qha rua koj paub tej kws kuv yuav ua rua cov cevlug kws kuv tsi tau khaiv puab moog, puab ca le tuav kuv lub npe qha rua suavdlawg has tas, yuav tsi muaj kev tsuv kev rog hab kev tshaib kev nqhes lug raug lub tebchaws nuav ib zag le lawm. Kuv yuav tso kev tsuv kev rog hab kev tshaib kev nqhes lug raug cov tuabneeg ntawd.

Cov tuabneeg kws nov cov cevlug ntawd qha, yuav tuag taag rua kev tsuv kev rog hab kev tshaib kev nqhes ib yaam nkaus. Luas yuav muab puab tej cev tuag pov rua ntawm tej ntug kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg muab puab log. Tej xwm nuav yuav lug raug puab hab puab tej quaspuj mivnyuas huv tuabsi. Kuv yuav ua kuas puab tau ris tej kev phem kev qas kws puab tau ua taag lug lawm.”

Tug TSWV kuas kuv pav kuv tej kev ntxhuv sab rua suavdlawg noog has tas: “Ca kuv quaj taag moog le, ca kuv lub kua muag lug taag nub taag mo; rua qhov kuv tsaav tuabneeg mob txomnyem ntsuav hab puab raug luas tsimtxom lwj sab kawg le.

Thaus kuv tawm moog rua tom tej nraag laj, kuv pum tej tuabneeg kws raug luas tua tuag pawg lug. Thaus kuv moog rua huv tej nroog, kuv pum tej tuabneeg tuag tshaib pawg lug. Cov povthawj hab cov cevlug rau sab ntso ua num, tabsis puab tsi paub has tas puab ua dlaabtsi.”

Tug TSWV, koj tso cov Yudas tseg lawm tag los? Puas yog koj ntxub cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Xi-oos? Ua caag koj yuav ntaus peb saab ua luaj, tsi muaj nub khu tau le? Peb nrhav kev thaajyeeb, tabsis tsi tau qhov zoo le; peb ca sab has tas peb tej mob yuav zoo, tabsis yimfuab txhawj ntshai.
Tug TSWV, peb tau ua txhum rua koj lawm tag; peb leeg peb hab peb cov yawmkoob tej kev txhum rua koj.

Thov ncu ntsoov koj tej lug cog tseg hab tsi xob ntxub peb. Thov koj tsi xob ca luas ua saib tsi taug lub nroog Yeluxalees, lub nroog ntawd yog koj lub zwmtxwv kws ci ntsaa ab. Thov koj tsi xob rhuav tej lug kws koj cog tseg rua peb lawm.

Lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej mlom ua tsi tau kuas naag lug; lub ntuj los yeej ua tsi tau kuas naag lug. Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, peb ca sab rua koj xwb, Tsuas yog koj tuab leeg txhaj yog tug kws ua tau tej nuav.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Txawm yog Mauxes hab Xamuyees sawv ntawm nuav thov kuv los kuv yuav tsi hlub cov tuabneeg nuav le. Ca le ntab puab moog; kuv tsi xaav pum puab lawm.

Thaus puab nug koj has tas, ‘Peb yuav moog qhov twg?’ Koj ca le qha kuv tej lug rua puab has tas, ‘Cov kws yuav tuag mob tuag ntsaaj yeej yuav tuag mob tuag ntsaaj; cov kws yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, yeej yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag; cov kws yuav tuag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes, yeej yuav tuag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes; cov kws yuav raug luas nteg, yeej yuav raug luas nteg.’”

“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV tau txav txim sab tso plaub yaam kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab: puab yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, dlev yuav muab puab hai moog, noog yuav lug noj puab lub cev, hab tej tsaj qus yuav lug khee noj puab tej nqaj kws seem.
Kuv yuav ua kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv nplajteb nuav ntshai puab, vim tej kws Hexekiyas tug tub Manaxes kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas ua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalees, leejtwg txhaj yuav hlub mej, hab leejtwg txhaj yuav nrug mej tu sab? Leejtwg yuav tog taug nug has tas, mej nyob le caag lawm?
Tug TSWV has tas, mej tau tso kuv tseg lawm, mej tig nrausqaum rua kuv. Vim le ntawd kuv txhaj ntaus mej, rua qhov kuv tswj tsi tau kuv txujkev chim lawm!

Kuv yuav muab mej ntab tawm ntawm txhua lub nroog huv lub tebchaws nuav moog; ib yaam le cua ntsawj tej quavnyaab. Kuv yuav ua rua mej kws yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg kuas puamtsuaj, kuv tua mej tej mivnyuas, vim mej tsi tso mej tej kev txhum tseg.

Tej puj ntsuag kws nyob huv mej lub tebchaws tseem ntau tshaaj tej xuabzeb ntawm ntug havtxwv. Kuv tua mej tej tub kws tseem hluas hab ua rua puab nam quaj quas ntsuag. Kuv yuav tso kev siv kev npug hab sub tawg sub ntshaa lug raug puab thaus puab tsi nwm le.

Leej nam kws muaj xyaa tug mivnyuas tuag huv tuabsi lawm nwg yuav ca le tsi ncu qaab hab ua tsi taug paa. Txawm yog nruab nub nrig los yuav tsaus ntuj nti rua nwg; nwg yuav poob ntsejmuag hab mob sab kawg le. Kuv yuav ca mej tej yeebncuab tuaj tua mej cov kws tseem ua neej nyob, Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Kuv yog tug tuabneeg kws tsi muaj kev kaaj sab le! Vim le caag kuv nam txhaj yug kuv rua huv lub nplajteb nuav? Kuv txhaj tau nrug txhua tug tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws nuav sis caav sis tshe? Kuv tub tsi tau txais nyaj ntawm leejtwg lossis qev nyaj rua leejtwg; tabsis txhua tug foom tsi zoo rua kuv!
Tug TSWV, yog has tas kuv tsi ua koj teg num  kawg sab kawg ntsws, yog kuv tsi tau thov koj paab kuv tej yeebncuab thaus puab raug kev txomnyem nyuaj sab, ces ca puab tej lug foom tsi zoo raug kuv.
(Tsi muaj leejtwg luv tau cov hlau xyaw tooj kws luas coj saab qaumteb tuaj.)
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Vim kuv tsaav tuabneeg ua kev txhum thoob tebchaws, kuv txhaj rau txim rua puab kws yog tso yeebncuab tuaj fuab puab tej nyaj tej kub.
Kuv yuav ca puab moog ua puab cov yeebncuab qhev nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws puab tsi tau paub dlua le, rua qhov kuv txujkev chim zoo ib yaam le lub cubtawg hab yuav kub moog ibtxhis.”

Kuv teb has tas, “Tug TSWV, koj yeej paub txhua yaam. Thov koj ncu ntsoov kuv hab paab kuv! Thov koj ua pauj rua cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom kuv. Koj tsi xob ua sab ntev rua puab, nyob tsaam puab tuaj tua tau kuv. Thov ncu ntsoov has tas vim koj teg num, kuv txhaj raug tej kev txomnyem nuav.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuv yog koj tug, kuv noog tej lug kws koj has rua kuv, koj tej lug nyob huv kuv lub sab, ua rua kuv kaaj sab hab zoo sab kawg.
Kuv tsi muaj sijhawm moog nrug luas ua kev lomzem hab tso dlaaj tso luag le, kuv noog koj lug, kuv txhaj moog nyob tuab leeg ua rua kuv chim sab heev.

Vim le caag kuv txhaj muaj tej kev nyuaj sab nuav? Vim le caag kuv tej qhov txhaab pheej fuam luj zuj zug? Vim le caag txhaj khu tsi zoo le? Puas yog koj xaav ua kuas kuv zoo le lub haav qhuav kws tsi muaj dlej lub caij ntuj qhua?”

Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog koj rov lug cuag kuv, kuv yuav pub koj ua kuv tug tubkhai dlua. Yog koj has lug tseeb tsi has lug dlaag, koj yuav rov tau ua kuv tug cevlug dlua. Tej tuabneeg yuav rov tuaj cuag koj, tsi taag koj yuav moog cuag puab.

Kuv yuav ua kuas koj tawv ib yaam le tug ntsaa yeej tooj thaiv tsaav tuabneeg nuav, txawm yog puab tawmtsaam koj los puab yuav kov tsi yeej. Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj hab tsomkwm koj kuas koj tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Kuv yuav cawm koj kuas dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem hab limham lub fwjchim. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV rov has rua kuv tas,
“Koj tsi xob yuav quaspuj lossis yug mivnyuas rua huv thaaj chaw kws zoo le nuav.
Kuv yuav qha kuas koj paub tej xwm kws yuav muaj lug raug cov mivnyuas kws yug rua ntawm thaaj chaw nuav hab puab nam puab txiv.

Puab yuav raug tej mob phem tuag taag, hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg nyav lossis log puab. Puab tej cev tuag yuav lwj ua tej pawg le tej quav nyuj rua sau npoo aav. Puab yuav raug nav ntaaj nav rag tuag lossis tuag tshaib tuag nqhes. Tej noog hab tej tsaj qus yuav lug noj puab.

“Koj tsi xob moog rua huv lub tsev kws muaj kev quaj kev nyav. Koj tsi xob nyav leejtwg le. Kuv yuav tsi foom koob moov rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg kuas nyob kaaj sab lug lossis hlub hab taabncuab puab le.

Tug npluanuj hab tug pluag los yeej yuav tuag taag rua huv lub tebchaws nuav, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg nyav puab lossis coj puab moog log le. Tsi muaj leejtwg kws nwg yuav muab nwg hlais lossis chais nwg tej plaubhau qha has tas nwg quaj ntsuag.
Tsi muaj leejtwg paab leg kev noj kev haus rua tsev tuabneeg kws muaj kev pluj tuag hab nplig puab sab. Tsi muaj leejtwg hlub tug kws nam txiv tuag taag tso nwg tseg.
“Tsi xob moog rua huv lub tsev kws muaj rooj noj rooj haus. Tsi xob moog nrug puab nyob lossis noj haus le.

Koj ca le noog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tej lug. Kuv yuav ua kuas tej suab lomzem zoo sab hab kev noj tshoob haus kug ntsag moog. Cov tuabneeg tam nuav qhovmuag yuav pum ntsoov tej ntawd.

“Thaus koj qha tej nuav rua puab taag, puab yuav nug koj has tas, ‘Vim le caag tug TSWV txhaj rau txim nyaav ua luaj rua peb? Peb tej kev txhum yog dlaabtsi? Peb tau ua txhum dlaabtsi tawmtsaam tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv?’
Koj ca le qha tug TSWV tej lug rua puab has tas, ‘Tub yog vim mej cov yawmkoob tso kuv tseg, moog pe luas tej vaajtswv. Puab tso kuv tseg hab tsi noog kuv tej lug qha.
Mej tseem ua phem tshaaj mej cov yawmkoob hab. Mej txhua tug puavleej tawv ncauj, sab phem hab tsi noog kuv lug le.

Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav muab mej ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog rua lub tebchaws kws mej lossis mej cov yawmkoob tsi tau paub dlua le. Nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd mej yuav tau pe luas tej vaajtswv nruab nub mo ntuj, hab kuv yuav tsi taabncuab mej le.’ ”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub txug lub sijhawm kws tuabneeg tsi tuav kuv lub npe coglug has tas, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob tau coj cov Yixalayees tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug,

tabsis puab yuav tuav kuv lub npe coglug has tas Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob tau coj cov Yixalayees kws nyob saab qaumteb hab huv tej tebchaws kws kuv ntab puab moog nyob ntawd rov lug. Kuv yuav coj puab lug moog nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, yog lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav tso tej tuabneeg cuab ntseg coob heev tuaj nteg cov tuabneeg nuav. Kuv yuav tso tej tuabneeg tua nqaj tuaj caum puab tua sau tej roob, tej pov roob hab huv tej qhov tsua.
Kuv pum txhua yaam kws puab ua, tsi muaj ib yaam kws kuv tsi pum le. Tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi roog tau puab tej kev txhum kuas kuv tsi pum le.
Kuv yuav rau txim ob npaug rua puab tej kev txhum hab kev phem kev qas, rua qhov puab txua tej mlom kws tsi muaj sa hab coj tej mlom ntawd lug tso puv tebchaws ua rua kuv lub tebchaws tsi huv lawm.”

Tug TSWV, koj yog tug tsomkwm hab txhawb kuv tug zug; thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem nyuaj sab koj paab kuv. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob qaab ntuj yuav tuaj cuag koj hab has tas, “Peb cov yawmkoob tsi muaj dlaabtsi le, tsuas yog tej vaajtswv cuav hab tej mlom kws tsi muaj nqes xwb.
Tuabneeg tseem tsim tau vaajtswv rua tuabneeg pe hab los? Tej kws tuabneeg txhais teg ua yeej tsi yog Vaajtswv le.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav ua tuab zag ua kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg pum kuv tug zug hab lub fwjchim, puab txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has tas, cov Yudas, luas muab cwjmem hlau sau mej tej kev txhum ca, muab raab txaug kws yog pobzeb muaj nqes txaug rua huv mej lub sab, hab muab suam rua ntawm mej tej ceg kaum thaaj lawm.
Mej cov tuabneeg pheej moog pe tug mlom Aselas tej thaaj hab tej ncej kws teeb rua huv tej qaab ntoos, sau tej ncov roob,
hab sau tej roob tom tej taj nraag. Kuv yuav ca mej tej yeebncuab tuaj txeeb mej tej nyaj tej kub, hab qhov txhua chaw, vim tej kev txhum kws mej ua  thoob plawg lub tebchaws.

Mej yuav tau tso  lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej lawm tseg hab kuv yuav kuas mej moog ua mej cov yeebncuab qhev rua lub tebchaws kws mej yeej tsi tau paub dlua le, rua qhov kuv txujkev chim zoo ib yaam le lub cubtawg kws cig tsi paub tuag le.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav rau txim rua tug tuabneeg kws tsiv tawm ntawm kuv moog, ca sab rua tuabneeg tug zug hab ca sab rua tej tuabneeg kws txawj tuag.
Nwg zoo ib yaam le tsob ntoo kws tuaj tom taj suabpuam kws luj hlub huv tej mojsaab qhua ntawm thaaj aav qaab ntsev kws tsi muaj dlaabtsi tuaj le. Tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi zoo rua nwg le.
“Tabsis kuv yuav foom koob moov rua tug kws ca sab rua kuv.

Nwg zoo ib yaam le tsob ntoo kws tuaj ntawm ntug dlej hab nrhau caag moog rua huv dlej. Txawm yog tshaav ntuj kub los nwg yeej tsi ntshai, rua qhov nwg tej nplooj tsi qhuav tsi ntsws le; txawm yog tsi muaj naag los nwg yeej tsi txhawj; hab nwg yeej tawg paaj txi txiv lawv caij lawv nyoog.
“Leejtwg txhaj paub tau tuabneeg lub sab? Tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi kws txawj dlaag ntxag le tuabneeg lub sab; lub sab ntawd mob luj hab khu tsi zoo le.
