“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws paub tuabneeg txujkev xaav hab sim tuabneeg lub sab, kuv pub rua txhua tug lawv le nwg lub neej, hab lawv le tej num kws nwg ua.”

Tug tuabneeg kws tau nyaj lug ntawm kev ua tsi ncaaj, zoo ib yaam le tug noog kws puag tej qai kws tsi yog nwg nteg, thaus nwg ib nraab neej nwg kev npluanuj yuav pluj moog taag, hab thaus kawg nwg yuav yog tug kws ruag tshaaj plawg.
Peb lub Tuamtsev zoo ib yaam le lub zwmtxwv kws ci ntsaa ab nyob sau lub roob sab thaus chivkeeb lug lawm.

Tug TSWV, cov Yixalayees ca sab rua koj nkaus xwb; txhua tug kws tso koj tseg lawm yuav raug kev txaajmuag; puab yuav pluj taag ib yaam le tej npe ntawv kws sau rua ntawm tej moov aav; rua qhov puab tso koj kws yog tug TSWV kws yog lub qhovdlej txhawv tseg lawm.
Tug TSWV, thov koj khu kuv, kuv txhaj yuav zoo. Thov cawm kuv, kuv txhaj yuav dlim. Kuv qhuas koj tuab leeg xwb!
Tej tuabneeg has rua kuv tas, “Tug TSWV Txujlug nyob qhov twg? Ca le ua kuas tav!”

Tabsis tug TSWV, kuv tsi tau txhib kuas koj tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab.  Kuv tsi tau xaav has tas ib nub twg kuas muaj kev txomnyem lug raug puab. Tug Tswv, koj yeej paub tej nuav; koj paub tej lug kws kuv has.
Thov koj tsi xob ua nruj ua tsiv rua kuv; thaus kuv raug kev txhawjxeeb koj yog kuv lub chaw vaamkhom.

Tug TSWV, thov koj ua kuas cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom kuv raug txaajmuag, tabsis thov koj paab cawm kuv. Thov koj ua nruj ua tsiv rua puab, tabsis tsi xob ua rua kuv! Koj ca le tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab kuas puab puamtsuaj taag!

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Yelemis, koj ca le moog rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Tuabneeg kws cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv moog rua huv lub nroog hab tawm lug; hab moog rua ntawm tej roojvaag huv lub nroog Yeluxalees qha kuv tej lug rua puab,
koj qha rua cov vaajntxwv, cov Yudas hab tej tuabneeg txhua tug kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws moog hab lug ntawm tej roojvaag kuas puab ca le noog kuv tej lug.

Koj has rua puab tas, yog puab xaav muaj txujsa nyob, nub Xanpataus kuas puab tsi xob nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi moog hab lug; puab yuavtsum tsi xob nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag saab nrau lug rua saab huv,

lossis nub Xanpataus tsi xob nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi huv puab tej tsev moog rua saab nrau. Puab yuavtsum tsi xob ua num nub Xanpataus. Puab yuavtsum ceev nub Xanpataus ua nub tseemceeb lawv le kuv tau saamfwm rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.
Puab cov yawmkoob tsi noog kuv lug lossis tsi quavntsej kuv le. Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, puab tseem tawv ncauj; puab tsi noog kuv lug lossis tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug qha.

“Koj qha rua puab kuas puab yuavtsum noog kuv tej lug saamfwm. Nub Xanpataus puab tsi xob nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi tawm ntawm cov roojvaag huv lub nroog moog rua saab nrau. Puab yuavtsum saib nub Xanpataus ua nub tseemceeb, nub ntawd puab tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.

Yudas cov vaajntxwv hab cov numtswv yuav moog hab lug ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag, muaj meejmom hab fwjchim ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Daviv, hab taagnrho cov pejxeem Yudas hab cov tuabneeg huv Yeluxalees yuav caij neeg, hab tsheb neeg lug puv nkaus huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Tuabneeg yuav tuaj huv cov Yudas tej nroog hab huv tej zog kws nyob puagncig lub nroog Yeluxalees, huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, tim tej taw roob, sau tej roob sab hab huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb tuaj. Puab yuav coj tej khoom hlawv fij theej txhoj, tej qoobloo, tej tshuaj tsw qaab hab tej khoom fij ua tsaug tuaj rua kuv huv lub Tuamtsev.

Tabsis puab yuavtsum noog kuv lug hab saib nub Xanpataus ua nub tseemceeb. Nub Xanpataus puab yuavtsum tsi xob nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag moog rua saab nrau, yog has tas puab tsi noog kuv lug, kuv yuav tso suavtawg hlawv lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag. Suavtawg yuav kub lub nroog Yeluxalees tej loog hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tua tau le.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Koj ca le moog rua nraag tug puab laujkaub aav lub tsev. Kuv muaj lug yuav has rua koj.”
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj moog rua nraag tug puab laujkaub aav lub tsev, kuv pum nwg taabtom puab laujkaub.
Thaus nwg puab ib lub laujkaub twg tsi zoo, nwg txawm rov muab cov aav zuaj puab ua dlua lwm yaam.
Thaus ntawd tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,

“Mej cov Yixalayees, mej xaav has tas kuv tsi muaj cai ua rua mej ib yaam le tug puab laujkaub aav ua rua cov aav nplaum ntawd nua los? Cov aav nplaum nyob huv tug puab laujkaub txhais teg le caag, mej nyob huv kuv txhais teg ib yaam le ntawd.
Yog thaus twg kuv has tas kuv yuav rhu, yuav rhuav lossis yuav ua kuas ib tsaav tuabneeg lossis ib lub tebchaws twg puamtsuaj moog,
tabsis yog tsaav tuabneeg ntawd tso puab tej kev phem kev qas tseg, kuv yuav hloov sab tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv tub has tseg lawm.
Yog kuv has rua ib tsaav tuabneeg lossis ib lub tebchaws twg tas, kuv yuav txhim khu tsaav tuabneeg lossis lub tebchaws ntawd kuas vaammeej,
tabsis yog tsaav tuabneeg ntawd ua kev phem kev qas tsi noog kuv lug, kuv yuav hloov sab tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv has.

Yog le ntawd, koj ca le qha rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, kuv taabtom npaaj tawmtsaam hab yuav rau txim rua puab. Koj has kuas puab ca le tso puab tej kev txhum tseg, tig rov lug ua qhov zoo hab xyum ua lub neej tshab.
Puab yuav teb koj has tas, ‘Peb tsi ua le ntawd! Peb yuav tawv ncauj hab ua phem ua qas lawv le peb lub sab nyam.’ ”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Ca le nug txhua tsaav tuabneeg saib puas muaj tuabneeg nov dlua tej xwm nuav los tsi muaj? Cov Yixalayees ua txhum luj kawg le lawm.
Puas yog tej hauv roob sab huv tebchaws Lenpanoos yeej ibtxwm muaj dlaus? Puas yog tej dlej kws txhawv txag zag sau tej roob yeej ndlwg tsi tu le?

Tabsis kuv tsaav tuabneeg tso kuv tseg; puab moog hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab fij rua tej mlom, puab taug kev moog qhov twg los dlawm puab kutaw; puab tsi ua lawv le tej kevcai thaus u lawm; puab tsi taug kev, puab plos haav faab xwb.
Puab ua rua lub tebchaws nuav lamsim taag, luas yuav saib tsi taug lub tebchaws nuav moog ibtxhis; tej tuabneeg kws dlua kev yuav xaav tsi thoob hab cu hau nyo.

Kuv yuav ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawg tsiv ri sua taabmeeg puab tej yeebncuab ib yaam le tej moov aav kws cov cua saab nubtuaj tuaj ntsawj. kuv yuav tig nrausqaum rua puab, thaus puab raug kev puamtsuaj, kuv yuav tsi paab puab.”

Thaus ntawd suavdlawg has tas, “Peb ca le tuavhuv tawmtsaam Yelemis. Peb yeej muaj cov povthawj qha peb hab muaj cov tuabneeg kws muaj tswvyim qha tau peb, hab muaj cov cev Vaajtswv lug kws yuav cev Vaajtswv lug rua peb. Peb ca le nrhav lug kom Yelemis, peb tsi xob noog nwg tej lug.”
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj thov tug TSWV has tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov hab noog tej lug kws cov yeebncuab txobthuam kuv.
Puab muab kev phem pauj kev zoo los? Puab khawb qhov tog kuv kev. Koj ncu ntsoov has tas, kuv tau tsaa ncauj thov koj kuas txu koj tej kev chim tsi xob rau txim rua puab.

Tug TSWV, nwgnuav thov ca kuas puab tej mivnyuas tuag tshaib tuag nqhes, hab tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, ca tej quaspuj nyob ua puj ntsuag tsi muaj quasyawg hab tsi muaj mivnyuas; ca tej quasyawg tuag mob tuag ntsaaj, hab ca tej tub hluas tuag rua huv tshaav rog.
Thov koj khaiv ib paab tuabneeg moog fuab puab tej vaaj tse thaus puab tsi nwm kuas puab quaj ntshai tshee nyo. Puab khawb qhov hab cuab muv tog kuv kev.

Tug TSWV, koj paub has tas, puab tuavhuv yuav tua kuv povtseg. Thov koj tsi xob tshem puab tej kev txhum lossis zaam txim rua puab le. Thov koj ua kuas puab qaug nrum rug swb hlo, hab rau txim nyaav rua puab thaus koj tseem chim.”

Tug TSWV kuas kuv moog yuav ib lub hub. Nwg kuas kuv coj cov txwjlaug hab cov povthawj laug qee leej tawm ntawm lub Roojvaag Txhais Laujkaub moog rua tom lub Haav Hinoos hab qha tug TSWV tej lug rua puab.

Tug TSWV kuas kuv has rua cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Mej ca le noog kuv kws yog tug TSWV, cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tej lug. Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug rua ntawm thaaj chaw nuav, kuas tej tuabneeg kws nov zaaj nuav xaav tsi thoob.

Kuv yuav ua le nuav, rua qhov suavdlawg tso kuv tseg hab moog tua tsaj hlawv fij rua luas tej vaajtswv ua rua qhov chaw nuav tsi huv lawm. Tej vaajtswv ntawd yog tej kws puab, puab cov yawmkoob hab puab cov vaajntxwv tsi tau paub dlua le. Puab tua tej tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim ntau leej rua ntawm thaaj chaw nuav,
hab puab teeb ntau lub thaaj rua puab tua puab tej mivnyuas hlawv fij rua Npa-aas. Kuv tsi tau saamfwm kuas puab ua, kuv tsi tau xaav txug tej ntawd le.
Tug TSWV has tas, vim puab ua le ntawd, muaj ib nub twg luas yuav tsi hu thaaj chaw ntawd ua Taufes lossis lub Haav Hinoos lawm, tabsis luas yuav hu ua lub Haav Tua Tuabneeg.

Kuv yuav rhuav cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tej tswvyim rua ntawm thaaj chaw nuav. Kuv yuav ca puab cov yeebncuab kovyeej puab hab muab puab tua tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog. Kuv ca tej noog hab tej tsaj nruab nraag noj puab.
Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug rua huv lub nroog nuav. Txhua tug tuabneeg kws dlua kev tuaj pum tej xwm nuav puab yuav poob sab hab xaav tsi thoob le.

Yeebncuab yuav tuaj vij lub nroog hab nrhav kev tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv. Vim yeebncuab vij lub nroog, luas zuv nruj heev, ua rua cov tuabneeg nyob huv muaj kev tshaib nqhes hab txomnyem kawg, puab ib leeg yuav tua ib leeg noj hab tua puab tej mivnyuas noj.”
Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV kuas kuv tsoo lub hub taabmeeg cov tuabneeg kws nrug kuv moog ntawd,

hab kuas kuv qha tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tej lug rua puab has tas, “Kuv yuav ntaus cov tuabneeg nuav hab rhuav lub nroog nuav ib yaam le muab lub hub nuav tsoo tawg taag, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav muab lub hub nuav rov sis lu tau. Luas yuav coj tej tuabneeg tuag moog log rua huv Taufes, rua qhov tsi muaj lwm thaaj chaw log tuag lawm.
Kuv has rua mej tas, kuv yuav ua rua lub nroog nuav hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv ib yaam le ua rua Taufes ntaag.

Tej tsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv tej tsev hab sau tej ruv tsev kws cov tuabneeg moog hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab fij rua tej nubqub hab laub cawv fij rua luas tej vaajtswv, puavleej tsi huv ib yaam le Taufes.”
Tom qaab ntawd kuv txawm tawm huv Taufes, qhov chaw kws tug TSWV khaiv kuv moog qha nwg tej lug lug. Kuv moog sawv ntawm lub tshaav puam kws nyob saab nrau lub Tuamtsev hab qha rua suavdlawg has tas,

tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Kuv yuav rau txim rua lub nroog nuav hab tej zog kws nyob ibncig ze nuav lawv le kws kuv tub has tseg lawm, rua qhov mej tawv ncauj hab tsi noog kuv lug.”
Thaus Imes tug tub Pasehus ua povthawj hab ua tug thawj saib num huv lub Tuamtsev nov kuv has tej lug nuav,
nwg txawm kuas luas nplawm kuv hab muab saw hlau xauv kuv kutaw ze rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Npeenyamees theem sab ntawm lub Tuamtsev.
Nub tom qaab thaus sawv ntxuv kws Pasehus tuaj tso kuv, kuv has rua nwg tas, “Tug TSWV tsi tis koj npe hu ua Pasehus. Nwg tis koj npe hu ua ‘Kev Kub Ntxhuv Txhua Qhov.’

Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua kuas koj rov ua kev ntxhuv rua koj hab koj tej phoojywg, hab koj yuav pum yeebncuab rhu ntaaj tua koj tej phoojywg txhua tug povtseg. Kuv yuav muab cov Yudas txhua tug cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos teg; nwg yuav coj ibtxha moog rua tim nwg lub tebchaws hab muab ibtxha tua povtseg.

Kuv yuav ca yeebncuab tuaj fuab puab tej nyaj hab tej qhov txhua chaw kws muaj nqes huv lub nroog moog. Txawm yog cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv tej nyaj hab tej qhov txhua chaw los luas yuav coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos.
Pasehus, luas yuav nteg koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos hab. Koj yuav tuag hab luas yuav muab koj log nrug koj tej phoojywg kws koj tau dlaag ntxag.’ ”
Tug TSWV, koj tau dlaag kuv, kuv txhaj raug luas dlaag ntxag. Koj muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim tshaaj kuv. Txhua tug saib tsi taug kuv hab luag kuv plig taag nub le.
Thaus twg kuv has lug, kuv yuavtsum tau quaj hab qw has tas, “Kev nruj tsiv! Kev puamtsuaj!” Tug TSWV, luas txobthuam kuv hab muab kuv tso dlaaj tso luag txhua lub sijhawm, vim kuv qha koj txujlug.

Tabsis thaus kuv has tas, “Ca kuv tsi xob xaav txug tug TSWV hab has txug nwg lub npe ntxiv lawm!” Thaus ntawd koj txujlug kub ib yaam le suavtawg huv kuv lub sab tuaj. Kuv ua tag nyaj, tabsis kuv tiv tsi taug ntxiv lawm.

Kuv nov suavdlawg sis ntxhi has tas, “Muaj kev kub ntxhuv nyob rua txhua qhov; Peb ca le moog has qha rua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj!” Txawm yog kuv tej phoojywg zoo los puab tog nrhw nkaug kuv. Puab sis thaam has tas, “Tej zag peb yuav ntxag hab nteg tau nwg lug ua pauj tej kws nwg ua rua peb.”

Tabsis tug TSWV, koj yog tug kws tuaj kuv tog, koj yog tug muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim, cov kws tsimtxom kuv yuav qaug. Puab yuav poob ntsejmuag moog ibtxhis, rua qhov puab nteg tsi tau kuv; puab yuav ncu ntsoov puab txujkev poob ntsejmuag moog ibtxhis.

Tabsis tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, koj sim tej tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, koj paub tuabneeg lub sab xaav. Yog le ntawd, kuv muab kuv rooj plaub tso rua koj, thov ca kuv pum koj ua pauj rua kuv cov yeebncuab.
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV! Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug! Nwg cawm tug kws raug luas tsimtxom dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem.
Ca le foom tsi zoo rua nub kws yug kuv! Tsi xob ncu txug nub kws kuv nam yug kuv!
Ca le foom tsi zoo rua tug txivneej kws coj xuv zoo lug qha rua kuv txiv has tas, “Koj tau ib tug tub lawm!” Ua rua kuv txiv zoo sab heev.

Ca kuas nwg zoo ib yaam le tej nroog kws tug TSWV muab rhuav puamtsuaj taag tsi taabncuab le. Ca nwg nov tej suab quaj hab suab ntsaaj thaus sawv ntxuv; hab tej suab txhij tubrog sis ntaus sis tua thaus taav su,
rua qhov nwg tsi muab kuv tua thaus kuv tseem nyob huv nam plaab. Ca kuv nam lub plaab ua kuv lub ntxaa moog ibtxhis le.
Vim le caag ca kuv yug lug raug tej kev txomnyem nyuaj sab, hab ua neej poob ntsejmuag taag moog le xwb?
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas khaiv Pasehus kws yog Makiyas tug tub hab tug povthawj Xefaniyas kws yog Ma-axeyas tug tub tuaj has rua kuv tas,

“Thov koj paab wb nug tug TSWV, rua qhov Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos hab nwg cov tubrog tub tuaj vij peb lub nroog lawm, tej zag tug TSWV yuav ua ib yaam txujci paab peb, hab yuav ua kuas Nenpukajnexales thim rov qaab.”
Tug TSWV kuas kuv has rua ob tug kws tuaj cuag kuv,

kuas rov moog has rua Xedekiyas has tas, tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has le nuav: “Xedekiyas, kuv yuav ua kuas koj cov tubrog swb thaus mej moog tua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos hab nwg cov tubrog. Kuv yuav sau koj cov tubrog tej cuabyeej ua rog lug ca rua huv plawv nroog.
Kuv tug zug luj zug nchaav, kev chim, kev npautawg hab kev nruj kev tsiv yuav tawmtsaam mej.
Kuv yuav tua txhua tug kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav tej tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu yuav raug tej kaab mob aws mob ntshaa tuag taag.

Tabsis koj, koj cov numtswv hab cov pejxeem kws dlim nav ntaaj nav rag, dlim kev tshaib kev nqhes hab dlim kev mob aws mob ntshaa, kuv yuav muab mej cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws yog mej tug yeebncuab kws xaav muab mej tua povtseg. Nenpukajnexales yuav muab mej tua tuag taag, tsi taabncuab lossis tsi tseg mej ib tug le. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kuas kuv has rua cov tuabneeg ntawd has tas, “Mej ca le noog kuv has! Kuv yog tug TSWV. Kuv muab ob yaam rua mej xaiv: saib mej xaiv txujsa lossis txujkev tuag.

Yog leejtwg nyob huv nroog yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag lossis yuav tuag taag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes lossis tuag rua kev mob kev nkeeg. Tabsis yog leejtwg moog thawj cov tubrog Npanpiloos kws tuaj vij lub nroog, tug ntawd yuav dlim tsi raug tua.

Kuv txav txim sab lawm has tas, kuv yuav tsi zaam lub nroog nuav, kuv yuav muab rhuav kuas puamtsuaj taag. Kuv yuav muab lub nroog nuav cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos, ces nwg yuav hlawv lub nroog kuas kub nyab taag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kuas kuv coj nwg cov lug moog has rua cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv tsev tuabneeg kws yog Daviv cov xeebntxwv has tas, “Mej ca le noog tug TSWV tej lug hab naj nub ua ncaaj nceeg. Ca le paab tug kws raug luas dlaag ntxag. Yog mej tsi ua le ntawd, tej kev phem kev qas kws mej ua, yuav ua rua kuv txujkev chim kub cuag suavtawg tsi muaj leejtwg tua tau.

Lub nroog Yeluxalees, koj nyob  sab tshaaj tej haav ib yaam le lub roob tsuas kws sab dlua tej taj nraag. Tabsis kuv yuav tawmtsaam koj. Koj khaav has tas tsi muaj leejtwg yuav tuaj tawmtsaam koj lossis tsoo tau koj tej ntsaa yeej lug rua huv koj lub chaw nyob.
Tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua koj, vim tej kws koj ua. Kuv yuav muab suavtawg hlawv koj lub loog, hab suavtawg yuav kub txhua yaam kws nyob ibncig ntawd. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kuas kuv moog rua huv lub loog hab has rua cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv kws yog Daviv tug xeebntxwv, nwg cov numtswv hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuas noog tug TSWV tej lug kws has tas,

“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV, kuv saamfwm kuas mej yuavtsum ua zoo hab ua ncaaj. Mej yuavtsum paab tug kws raug luas dlaag ntxag. Tsi xob quab yuam lossis tsimtxom cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag lossis tej puj ntsuag; hab tsi xob tua cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim rua ntawm qhov chaw dlawbhuv nuav.

Yog mej muab sab rau ua lawv le kuv tej lug nuav, ces Daviv cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws moog le. Puab, puab cov numtswv hab puab tej pejxeem yuav tau caij neeg hab caij tsheb neeg moog hab lug ntawm lub loog nuav tej roojvaag.
Tabsis yog mej tsi noog kuv tej lug saamfwm, ces kuv qha rua mej has tas, kuv yuav ua kuas lub loog nuav pob puag taag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
“Kuv saib cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv lub loog zoo nkauj ib yaam le cheebtsaam Nkile-as hab ib yaam le tej Roob Lenpanoos; tabsis kuv yuav ua kuas lub loog nyob qhuav nkuag ca tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob.
Kuv yuav tso tuabneeg tuaj rhuav lub loog kuas puamtsuaj. Puab yuav nqaa taus tuaj ntuv tej ncej cab kws zoo nkauj hab muab hlawv kuas kub nyab taag.
“Tom qaab ntawd tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws dlua kev tuaj yuav sis nug has tas, vim le caag kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav ua le ntawd rua lub nroog luj nuav?
Ces puab yuav teb has tas, tub yog vim cov Yudas tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab puab moog pe luas tej vaajtswv lawm.”

Cov Yudas, mej tsi xob quaj Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas! Thaus nwg tuag mej tsi xob nyav; tabsis mej ca le quaj ntsuag rua Yau-ahas kws yog Yauxiyas tug tub; luas tub nteg nwg coj moog lawm, nwg yuav tsi rov lug pum lub tebchaws kws nwg nam yug nwg ib zag le lawm.
Tug TSWV has txug Yauxiyas tug tub Yau-ahas kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas hloov nwg txiv chaw has tas, “Nwg tawm ntawm nuav moog lawm, yuav tsi tau rov lug le.
Nwg yuav tuag rua huv lub tebchaws kws luas coj nwg moog, hab yuav tsi tau rov lug rua huv lub tebchaws nuav le.”
Tug kws ua nwg lub tsev ntawm lub sab tsi ncaaj, hab txuas nwg lub tsev kuas dlaav ntawm lub sab nkhaus hab nwg yuam tej tub zug ua num tsi them nqe zug rua puab, tug ntawd yuav raug puamtsuaj.

Tug kws has tas, “Kuv yuav ua ib lub loog luj rua kuv kuas muaj tej chaav dlaav heev rua tshooj sau.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj ua qhovrais rua nwg lub tsev, muab txag ntoo cab lug xov hab vuam kob lab rua, tug ntawd yuav puamtsuaj.

Koj muab ntoo cab lug ua tsev rua koj nyob, koj txawm tau ua tug vaajntxwv kws zoo tshaaj lwm tug nua los? Koj txiv ibtxwm txaus sab rua nwg lub neej; nwg ibtxwm ua ncaaj hab ua zoo hab txhua yaam kws nwg ua puavleej vaammeej.
Nwg txav txim ncaaj rua tug txomnyem txhua yaam kws nwg ua puavleej zoo; tug kws ua le nuav txhaj yog tug kws paub Vaajtswv.
Tabsis koj tsuas pum koj txhaj yog tug zoo xwb; koj tua cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim hab quab yuam koj tej pejxeem. Tug TSWV yog tug kws has le ntawd.

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj has txug Yauxiyas tug tub Yehauyakees kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas has tas, “Thaus nwg tuag tsi muaj leejtwg nyav lossis has rua nwg tas, ‘Ua caag koj tuag txomnyem ua luaj, kuv tug phoojywg, ua caag koj yuav tuag txomnyem ua luaj le!’ Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg lug kua muag rua nwg lossis quaj has tas, ‘Kuv tug tswv! Kuv tug vaajntxwv!’
Luas yuav coj nwg moog log ib yaam le luas hai tug neeg luav moog pov rua saab nrau lub nroog Yeluxalees tej roojvaag.”

Cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej ca le moog rua peg tebchaws Lenpanoos hab qw nrov nrov, ca le moog rua huv tebchaws Npasaas hab tsaa suab hlo quaj; ca le moog qw nrov nrov sau tej roob huv tebchaws Mau-am, rua qhov cov kws tuaj mej tog raug puamtsuaj taag lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua koj thaus kws koj tseem vaammeej, tabsis koj tsi noog nwg lug, koj ibtxwm ua koj lub neej le ntawd; koj yeej tsi noog tug TSWV lug le.
Cua yuav ntsawj koj tej thawjcoj moog taag, cov kws tuaj koj tog yuav raug luas nteg coj moog; koj yuav poob ntsejmuag hab txaajmuag heev, vim tej kev phem kev qas kws koj tau ua taag lug lawm.

Koj tau zoo hab nyob kaaj sab lug huv tej tsev kws muab tej ntoo cab peg tebchaws Lenpanoos lug ua; tabsis koj yuav quaj ntsaaj quas lawg thaus kev mob lug raug koj, ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws mob plaab yug mivnyuas.

Tug TSWV has rua Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees kws yog Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees tug tub kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas has tas, “Kuv kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj sa nyob, txawm yog koj yog lub nplhaib homthawj ntawm kuv saab teg xis los kuv yuav muab hle,
hab muab cob rua cov tuabneeg kws koj ntshai hab xaav muab koj tua povtseg. Kuv yuav muab koj cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos hab nwg cov tubrog.
Kuv yuav ca luas nteg koj hab koj nam kws yug koj moog rua lwm lub tebchaws. Koj yuav moog rua lub tebchaws kws tsi yog qhov chaw yug koj, hab meb yuav tuag rua qhov ntawd.
Meb yuav xaav rov lug rua lub tebchaws nuav heev, tabsis meb yuav tsi tau rov lug lawm.”

Kuv has tas, “Puas yog Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees zoo ib yaam le lub hub tawg kws luas muab povtseg tsi muaj leejtwg xaav yuav le? Tub yog vim le ntawd, nwg hab nwg cov mivnyuas txhaj raug nteg coj moog rua lub tebchaws kws puab tsi tau paub dlua le.”
Lub tebchaws, lub tebchaws, lub tebchaws! Ca le noog tej lug kws tug TSWV has:

“Tug txivneej nuav yeej raug foom tsi zoo kuas nwg cov mivnyuas pluj taag, ua ib tug txivneej kws ua dlaabtsi los ua tsi tau le. Nwg yuav tsi muaj xeebntxwv lug kaav lub tebchaws Yudas ib yaam le Daviv muaj xeebntxwv lug hloov nwg chaw. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua cov numtswv kws tua nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab ua rua puab tawg ua saab ua sua lawm.

Ntawm nuav yog tej lug kws tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has rua cov numtswv kws saib tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg has tas, “Mej tsi saib kuv tsaav tuabneeg; mej ntab puab tawm, puab txhaj moog nyob ua saab ua sua. Nwgnuav kuv yuav rau txim rua mej vim mej ua phem ua qas.
Kuv yuav sau kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws tseem nyob huv tej tebchaws kws kuv ntab puab moog nyob rov qaab lug nyob huv puab tej zej zog. Puab yuav muaj tub muaj ki fuamvaam coob heev.
Kuv yuav tsaa kuas muaj numtswv saib kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Puab yuav tsi txhawj tsi ntshai, hab kuv yuav tsi rau txim rua puab ntxiv  lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Muaj ib nub kuv yuav xaiv Daviv cov xeebntxwv ib tug kws ncaaj nceeg ua vaajntxwv. Tug vaajntxwv nuav yuav kaav pejxeem ntse ntsuav, hab nwg yuav ua ncaaj ua nceeg rua suavdlawg thoob plawg lub tebchaws.
Thaus tug vaajntxwv nuav lug kaav lawm, cov Yudas yuav nyob tso sab lug hab cov Yixalayees yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb. Luas yuav hu nwg has tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws yog peb Txujkev Cawm Dlim.’
“Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Muaj ib nub suavdlawg yuav tsi tuav nwg lub npe coglug has tas, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob coj peb cov Yixalayees tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug,

tabsis puab yuav tuav kuv lub npe coglug has tas, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob yog tug coj peb cov Yixalayees tawm huv lub tebchaws kws nyob saab qaumteb hab huv tej tebchaws kws peb raug nteg moog rov qaab lug. Thaus ntawd puab yuav nyob huv puab lub tebchaws.’ ”
Kuv sab ntsws puag taag hab kuv ib ce tshee nyo. Kuv zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws qaug cawv, zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws haus cawv txiv maab ntau dlhau lawm.

Vim tug TSWV hab nwg tej lug kws dlawbhuv cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ua kev nkauj kev nraug tsi muaj ib tug muab sab npuab tug TSWV le; tug TSWV txhaj foom tsi zoo rua lub tebchaws, tej tshaav zaub huv tej taj nraag txhaj qhuav taag, vim puab siv puab lub fwjchim ua kev tsi ncaaj nceeg.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov cevlug hab cov povthawj puavleej tsi ncaaj; kuv pum puab ua kev phem kev qas nyob huv lub Tuamtsev.

Puab taug txujkev nplua hab tsaus ntuj nti; kuv yuav ua kuas puab dlawm qaug. Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab; lub sijhawm kws rau txim rua puab lug txug lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Kuv pum Xamalis cov cevlug tej kev txhum: puab tuav Npa-aas lub npe cevlug rua suavdlawg, hab puab coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees yuam kev lawm.

Tabsis kuv pum cov cevlug kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, tseem ua kev phem kev qas heev tshaaj; puab ua nkauj ua nraug hab has lug dlaag; puab coj tuabneeg ua kev txhum; vim le ntawd, txhaj tsi muaj ib tug tso kev phem kev qas tseg. Kuv saib puab txhua tug puavleej ua kev phem kev qas, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas.

“Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus txhaj has rua cov cevlug kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees le nuav tas: Kuv yuav muab tej nroj kws ab heev rua puab noj hab muab tej tshuaj lom rua puab haus, rua qhov puab tau ua kev phem kev qas thoob plawg lub tebchaws.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalees has tas “Mej tsi xob noog cov cevlug cuav has, puab tsuas qha tej kev ca sab tsi tseeb rua mej hab qha lawv le puab xaav xwb, tsi yog kuv kuas puab qha.
Cov cevlug cuav has rua cov tuabneeg kws tsi kaam noog kuv tej lug tas, ‘Mej yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.’ Hab has rua txhua tug tuabneeg tawv ncauj tas, yuav tsi muaj kev puamtsuaj lug raug mej le.”

Kuv has rua mej tas “Cov cevlug cuav ntawd tsi muaj ib tug paub tej kws tug TSWV xaav. Puab cov ntawd tsi muaj ib tug tau nov lossis totaub tug TSWV tej lug lossis puab tsi noog hab tsi quavntsej tej lug kws nwg has le.
Tug TSWV txujkev chim yog nthwv naag xub naag cua hab yog cua dlaaj cua dlub kws lug qhwv nkaus cov tuabneeg sab phem taubhau,
hab cov cua ntawd yuav tsi tu moog txug thaus tug TSWV ua tav lawv le nwg npaaj tseg lawm. Muaj ib nub nwg tsaav tuabneeg yuav paub txug tej kws nwg ua nuav.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tsi tau tso cov cevlug cuav ntawd tuaj, tabsis puab tuaj puab xwb, kuv tsi tau has rua puab, tabsis puab tuav kuv lub npe cevlug.
Yog puab paub tej kws kuv xaav, ces puab yeej yuav moog cev kuv tej lug rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab ua kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg tso puab tej kev txhum tseg.
“Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws nyob tau txhua qhov, tsi yog nyob tuab qhov xwb.
Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav tsiv nraim rua ib qhov twg kws kuv tsi pum le. Mej puas paub has tas kuv nyob tau txhua qhov, tsi has sau ntuj lossis huv nplajteb nuav?
Kuv paub tej kws cov cevlug cuav ntawd has, puab tuav kuv lub npe dlaag has tas, yog puab ua ywgtoog pum kuv has rua puab.
Cov cevlug cuav ntawd tseem yuav has lug dlaag hab coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuam kev moog txug thaus twg?
Puab xaav has tas tej ywgtoog kws puab qha ntawd yuav ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg tso kuv tseg ib yaam le puab cov yawmkoob tso kuv tseg moog teev Npa-aas lawm.

Tug cevlug kws ua npau suav, tsuas pav nwg zaaj npau suav nkaus xwb, tabsis tug cevlug kws nov kuv tej lug, nwg yeej ua tuab zoo qha tej lug ntawd. Yog muab quavnyaab pev rua naab nplej, yaam twg yuav zoo dlua?
Kuv txujlug zoo ib yaam le suavtawg hab zoo ib yaam le raab rauj kws tsoo tau tej pobzeb tawg ntsoog ntxawg.
Kuv yuav tawmtsaam cov cevlug cuav kws muab lwm tug tej lug qha rua suavdlawg has tas, yog kuv tej lug.
Kuv yuav tawmtsaam cov cevlug cuav kws puab has puab tej lug xwb los puab tseem khaav has tas yog kuv has.

Mej ca le noog kuv kws yog tug TSWV has! Kuv yuav tawmtsaam cov cevlug cuav kws muab puab tej npau suav dlaag pav rua suavdlawg noog. Puab pav hab khaav puab tej npau suav dlaag kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuam kev. Kuv tsi tau has rua puab hab xaa puab moog. Puab ua tsi tau dlaabtsi paab suavdlawg le. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has rua kuv has tas, “Yelemis, thaus twg kuv cov tuabneeg ib tug lossis ib tug cevlug lossis ib tug povthawj twg tuaj nug koj has tas, ‘Tug TSWV txujlug has le caag?’ Koj yuavtsum teb puab has tas, ‘Mej ua rua tug TSWV nyuaj sab,  hab nwg yuav muab mej ntab tawm moog.’
Yog cov tuabneeg nuav lossis ib tug cevlug lossis ib tug povthawj twg has tas, ‘Tug TSWV nyuaj sab.’ Kuv yuav rau txim rua tug ntawd hab nwg tsev tuabneeg huv tuabsi.
Tsimnyog puab nyag nug nyag tug phoojywg hab tug kwvtij has tas, ‘Tug TSWV teb le caag?’ lossis ‘Tug TSWV has le caag?’

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj tsi has lu lug kws has tas, ‘Tug TSWV nyuaj sab.’ Yog leejtwg has lu lug ntawd, kuv yuav muab kuv txujlug ua kuas tug ntawd nyuaj sab, rua qhov cov tuabneeg ntawd tau hloov tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj sa nyob hab muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tej lug lawm.
Yelemis, koj ca le nug cov cevlug ntawd has tas, ‘Tug TSWV teb le caag rua mej? Tug TSWV has le caag rua mej?’
Yog puab tsi noog kuv lug, puab pheej has lu lug kws has tas ‘Tug TSWV nyuaj sab.’ Ces koj has rua puab tas,
Kuv yuav muab puab tshem tawm  moog povtseg kuas nrug dleb ntawm kuv, tsi has puab hab lub nroog kws kuv muab rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.
Kuv yuav ua kuas puab txaajmuag moog ibtxhis hab poob ntsejmuag taag moog le.”

Tug TSWV qha ob tawb txiv ncuav pas kws txawb rua ntawm hauv ntej lub Tuamtsev rua kuv. (Qhov nuav yog tom qaab kws Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj nteg tau Yehauyakees tug tub Yehauyakhees kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas hab cov Yudas cov numtswv, tej tuabneeg ntaus hlau hab tej tuabneeg kws paub ua num kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm).
Thawj lub tawb ntim cov txiv ncuav pas kws zoo hab yog cov kws xub sav; muaj ib lub tawb ntim cov txiv ncuav pas phem kws tsi zoo noj le.
Tug TSWV nug kuv has tas, “Yelemis, koj pum dlaabtsi?” Kuv teb has tas, “Kuv pum txiv ncuav pas. Cov txiv zoo, mas zoo heev, tabsis cov txiv phem, mas phem heev tsi zoo noj le.”
Yog le ntawd tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, cov tuabneeg kws raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos zoo ib yaam le cov txiv ncuav pas kws zoo hab kuv yuav ua zoo rua puab.

Kuv yuav tsomkwm puab hab coj puab rov lug rua huv lub tebchaws nuav. Kuv yuav txhim khu kuas puab rov vaammeej, hab tsi muab puab rhuav povtseg; kuv yuav muab puab cog hab tsi dlob puab povtseg lawm.
Kuv yuav ua kuas puab paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV, puab yuav ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv, rua qhov puab yuav muaj lub sab dlawb paug rov lug cuag kuv.

“Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg cov numtswv tswj tebchaws, hab cov pejxeem kws seem huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav lossis cov kws tsiv moog nyob rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm, kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav ua kuas puab zoo ib yaam le tawb txiv ncuav pas phem kws tsi zoo noj.

Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob thoob nplajteb ntshai. Tej tuabneeg yuav luag puab plig, muab puab has tso dlaaj tso luag, txobthuam hab luas yuav tuav puab lub npe foom tsi zoo rua txhua qhov chaw kws kuv ntab puab moog nyob.
Kuv yuav tso kev tsuv kev rog, kev tshaib kev nqhes hab kev mob kev nkeeg lug rua puab, kuas puab tuag taag tsi tshuav ib tug seem nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab hab puab cov yawmkoob.”

Thaus Yauxiyas tug tub Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau plaub xyoos lawm, tug TSWV has rua kuv txug cov Yudas. (Lub sijhawm ntawd yog thawj xyoo kws Nenpukajnexales ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos.)
Kuv has rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas,

“Tau neeg nkaum peb xyoo lawm, suav txij xyoo kaum peb kws Amoos tug tub Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas lug txug naj nub nua, tej kws tug TSWV has rua kuv, kuv yeej pav huv tuabsi rua mej, tabsis mej yeej tsi quavntsej tej lug ntawd le.
Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, tug TSWV yeej tso nwg cov tubkhai kws yog cov cevlug qha rua mej ua ntu zug los mej tsi quavntsej le.
Puab kuas mej tso mej lub neej ua phem ua qas hab mej tej kev txhum tseg, mej txhaj yuav tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej hab mej cov yawmkoob moog ibtxhis le.
Puab qha kuas mej tsi xob pe luas tej vaajtswv lossis pe tej mlom kws mej puab ua rua tug TSWV chim. Yog mej noog tug TSWV lug, nwg yuav tsi rau txim rua mej.
Tug TSWV has tas, mej yeej tsi noog nwg lug, mej pheej pe mej tej mlom ua rua tug TSWV chim, nwg txhaj rau txim rua mej.
“Vim mej tsi noog nwg lug le ntawd, tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas,

‘Kuv yuav kuas cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab qaumteb hab kuv tug tubkhai Nenpukajnexales kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj tawmtsaam cov Yudas hab cov tebchaws ibncig kuas raug luas thuam, ntshai, poob ntsejmuag hab puamtsuaj moog taag ibtxhis. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Kuv yuav ua kuas puab tej suab qw lomzem zoo sab, hab kev noj tshoob haus kug ntsag moog. Puab yuav tsi nov tuabneeg zum zeb hab tsi muaj leejtwg taws teeb lawm.
Lub tebchaws nuav yuav puamtsuaj hab nyob qhuav nkuag ca: tej tebchaws kws nyob ibncig ntawd yuav ua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos qhev xyaa caum xyoo.
Tom qaab ntawd kuv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos hab puab tug vaajntxwv, vim puab tej kev txhum. Kuv yuav rhuav lub tebchaws kuas puamtsuaj taag moog ibtxhis.
Kuv yuav rau txim rua lub tebchaws Npanpiloos, kuas raug puamtsuaj lawv le tej kev puamtsuaj kws kuv ua rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv kuas Yelemis sau tseg rua huv phoo ntawv nuav.
Kuv yuav ua pauj rua cov Npanpiloos lawv le tej kev phem kws puab tau ua lawm. Puab yuav tau moog ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg hab ntau tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim qhev.’ ”
Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, “Ntawm nuav yog khob cawv txiv maab kws puv nkaus kuv txujkev chim, koj ca le coj moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg haus.
Thaus puab haus taag, puab yuav qaug hab tsi meejpem, rua qhov kuv tso kev tsuv kev rog tuaj tawmtsaam puab.”
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj txais lub khob ntawm tug TSWV txhais teg hab coj moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg haus lawv le tug TSWV khaiv kuv moog.

Yeluxalees hab taagnrho tej nroog huv tebchaws Yudas, cov vaajntxwv hab tej numtswv yuav tau haus lub khob ntawd, tej nroog yuav ua suabpuam taag, cov vaajntxwv hab tej numtswv yuav raug luas txobthuam, hab luas yuav tuav puab lub npe foom tsi zoo ib yaam le naj nub nua.

Cov nuav yog cov kws yuav tau haus lub khob ntawd: Falaus kws kaav tebchaws Iziv, nwg cov numtswv hab cov thawjcoj; taagnrho cov Iziv hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Uxes; taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Filitees kws nyob huv lub nroog Asekeloos, Nkaxas, Ekiloos hab taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Asedaus; taagnrho cov tuabneeg huv tebchaws Edoos, Mau-am hab cov Amoos; ob tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Tiles hab lub nroog Xidoos; taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav cov tebchaws kws nyob lawv ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees kws nyob huv lub nroog Dedaas, Temas hab Npuxes; taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws txav plaubhau tuab tuab lu; taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Alanpias; taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv taj suabpuam; taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Ximelis, Elames hab Medias; taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav saab qaumteb, tsi has dleb hab ze, ib tug dlhau ib tug. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav yuav tau haus lub khob ntawd. Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos yog tug kws yuav haus lub khob ntawd thaus kawg.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus kuas kuv has rua puab tas, “Puab yuavtsum haus kuas qaug hab ntuav, kuas puab ndlog hab sawv tsi taug, rua qhov kuv tso kev tsuv kev rog tuaj tawmtsaam puab.
Yog puab tsi kaam txais lub khob ntawm koj teg moog haus, koj has rua puab tas tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, puab yuavtsum haus lub khob ntawd.

Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug kuv lub nroog. Puab xaav has tas puab yuav dlim tsi raug txim nua los? Tsi yog le ntawd, puab yuavtsum raug txim xwb, rua qhov kuv yuav tso kev tsuv kev rog lug rua tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav! Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le ntawd.

“Yelemis, koj yuavtsum qha kuv tej lug nuav txhua lu rua puab, koj has rua cov tuabneeg ntawd tas, ‘Tug TSWV yuav nyooj lawg sau ntuj, hab nthe nqho sau ntuj kws yog qhov chaw sab tuaj; nwg yuav nyooj lawg tawmtsaam nwg tsaav tuabneeg; nwg yuav qw ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws tsuj txiv maab qw. Tuabneeg nplajteb txhua tug yuav nov nwg lub suab,

hab nwg lub suab yuav nrov ntxhe moog txug qaab ntuj kawg. Tug TSWV ua plaub tawmtsaam txhua tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg yuav coj txhua tug tuabneeg tuaj rua ntawm lub rooj txav txim, hab yuav muab cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas tua povtseg; Tug TSWV yog tug kws has le ntawd.’ ”
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, kev puamtsuaj yuav lug raug ib tsaav tuabneeg dlhau rua ib tsaav tuabneeg, hab yuav muaj ib nthwv cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj tim qaab ntug tuaj.

Nub ntawd tej tuabneeg kws tug TSWV tua yuav tuag pawg lug saab ntuj tim nuav moog ti nkaus saab ntuj tim u. Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg quaj nyav hab coj puab moog log le. Puab yuav lwj ua tej pawg rua sau npoo aav ib yaam le tej quav nyuj.

Mej cov kws yog thawjcoj, mej cov kws saib kuv paab yaaj, mej ca le quaj nrov nrov! Ca le quaj dlaa luam rua huv aav. Rua qhov tub txug lub sijhawm kws muab mej tua lawm,  luas yuav muab mej hlais ib yaam le hlais tej laug yaaj.
Mej yuav tsiv tsi dlim le.
Mej yuav quaj ntsuag hab nyuaj sab kawg, rua qhov tug TSWV txujkev chim rhuav mej tsaav tuabneeg hab ua rua mej lub tebchaws kws muaj kev thaajyeeb puamtsuaj taag lawm.

Tug TSWV tub tso nwg tsaav tuabneeg,  tseg ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav tsiv tawm ntawm nwg lub qhov moog lawm. Tej kev tsuv kev rog kws txaus ntshai hab tug TSWV txujkev chim ua rua lub tebchaws ua suabpuam taag.
Thaus Yauxiyas tug tub Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau tsi ntev,

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le moog sawv ntawm lub tshaav puam ntawm lub Tuamtsev, qha tej lug kws kuv saamfwm rua koj lawm txhua lu rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj txhua lub nroog huv tebchaws Yudas tuaj pehawm kuv ntawd. Koj qha tej lug nuav rua suavdlawg tsi xob tseg ib lus le.
Tej zag puab yuav noog hab tso puab tej kev txhum tseg. Yog puab ua le ntawd, kuv yuav hloov sab tsi tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab, vim tej kev txhum kws puab tau ua.”
Tug TSWV kuas kuv has rua suavdlawg tas, “Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le kuv kws yog tug TSWV tej lug kws qha rua mej lawm, txhaj yog mej noog kuv lug,
hab mej yuavtsum muab sab rau noog tej lug kws cov cevlug kws yog kuv cov tubkhai qha rua mej. Kuv khaiv puab tuaj qha mej ua ntu zug, tabsis mej tsi noog puab qha le.
Yog mej tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug, kuv yuav ua kuas lub Tuamtsev nuav puamtsuaj ib yaam le kuv ua rua lub nroog Silaus,  txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv nplajteb yuav tuav lub nroog nuav npe foom tsi zoo.”
Cov povthawj, cov cev Vaajtswv lug hab cov pejxeem puavleej nov kuv has le nuav huv lub Tuamtsev,
thaus kuv qha tug TSWV tej lug rua puab noog taag, puab sau nthwv lug nteg kuv hab has tas, “Koj has tej lug nuav, tsimnyog muab koj tua povtseg lawm!

Ua caag koj laam tuav tug TSWV lub npe has tas, lub Tuamtsev nuav yuav zoo ib yaam le lub nroog Silaus, hab lub nroog nuav yuav puamtsuaj taag tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob huv le lawm?” Ces puab txawm lug vij nkaus kuv.
Thaus cov Yudas tej thawjcoj nov tej xwm nuav, puab tawm ceev nrooj huv vaajntxwv lub loog moog rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev hab moog nyob ntawm lub Roojvaag Tshab.

Cov povthawj hab cov cev Vaajtswv lug has rua cov thawjcoj hab cov pejxeem has tas, “Yeej tsimnyog muab tug txivneej nuav tua povtseg lawm, rua qhov nwg tau foom tsi zoo rua peb lub nroog nuav, lawv le mej tub nov nwg tej lug lawm.”
Ces kuv teb puab has tas, “Yog tug TSWV khaiv kuv tuaj foom tsi zoo rua lub Tuamtsev hab lub nroog nuav, lawv le tej lug kws mej tau nov kuv has lawm.

Mej yuavtsum hloov mej lub sab hab mej teg num dlua tshab tsi xob ua le qub lawm. Mej yuavtsum noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug, nwg txhaj yuav hloov sab tsi ua rua mej puamtsuaj lawv le nwg tau has rua mej lawm.
Nwgnuav kuv nyob rua huv mej txhais teg lawm, mej ca le ua rua kuv lawv le mej pum zoo hab yog kev yog cai.

Tabsis kuas mej paub has tas, yog mej tua kuv, mej hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav puavleej ua txhum vim mej tua ib tug tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim, rua qhov yog tug TSWV khaiv kuv coj tej lug qhuab ntuag nuav tuaj qha rua mej.”
Cov thawjcoj hab cov pejxeem txhaj has rua cov povthawj hab cov cev Vaajtswv lug tas, “Tsi tsimnyog muab tug txivneej nuav tua, rua qhov nwg tuav tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub npe qha peb.”
Tom qaab ntawd cov thawjcoj qee leej txhaj sawv ntsug hab has rua cov pejxeem kws tuaj saablaaj ntawd has tas,

“Lub sijhawm kws Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, Mikhas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv kws nyob huv lub nroog Mauleses, qha rua suavdlawg has tas, tug Tswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le nuav: ‘Luas yuav laij lub nroog Xi-oos ib yaam le laij teb, lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav pob puag taag ua ib pawg, hab lub roob kws luas ua lub Tuamtsev rua sau yuav caj haav zoov.’”

“Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab cov Yudas tub tsi muab Mikhas tua, tabsis Hexekiyas fwm tug TSWV hab nwg ua lawv le tug TSWV lub sab nyam. Tug TSWV txhaj hloov sab, tsi ua rua puab puamtsuaj lawv le nwg has tseg lawm. Nwgnuav peb taabtom lob kev puamtsuaj lug rua peb ntaag.”

(Muaj dlua ib tug txivneej hu ua Uliyas, nwg yog Semayas tug tub kws nyob huv lub nroog Kili-as Ye-alees, nwg tuav tug TSWV lub npe foom tsi zoo rua lub nroog hab lub tebchaws nuav ib yaam le Yelemis foom.

Thaus Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees, nwg cov tubrog hab tej numtswv nov Uliyas has le ntawd, vaajntxwv txawm nrhav Uliyas tua povtseg. Tabsis thaus Uliyas nov le ntawd, nwg ntshai, nwg txawm tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv kuas nwg dlim.
Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees txawm khaiv Anpaus tug tub Enathaas hab qee leej moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv hab nteg Uliyas rov lug.
Puab moog nteg tau Uliyas hab coj nwg rov lug rua Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees. Vaajntxwv txhaj kuas luas muab Uliyas tua hab coj moog pov rua ntawm lub toj ntxaas kws log tej tuabneeg txomnyem.)
Tabsis tub yog muaj Safaas tug tub Ahikas cawm kuv, luas txhaj tsi muab kuv rua cov pejxeem tua povtseg.
Thaus Xedekiyas tug tub Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau tsi ntev, tug TSWV has rua kuv
kuas kuv muab ntoo txua ua ib tug quabtwg hab muab ib pluaj hlua tawv khi rua hab muab khuam rua ntawm kuv cejdlaab.

Tug TSWV kuas kuv xaa xuv  moog rua cov Edoos tug vaajntxwv, cov Mau-am tug vaajntxwv, cov Amoos tug vaajntxwv, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Tiles, hab cov Xidoos tug vaajntxwv hab cov sawv cev kws tuaj cuag Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas huv lub nroog Yeluxalees,
Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuas kuv moog has rua puab, kuas puab coj tug TSWV tej lug moog has rua puab cov vaajntxwv has tas,
“Kuv lub fwjchim hab tug zug luj zug nchaav tsim lub nplajteb, tsim tuabneeg hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav; kuv yuav pub lub fwjchim ntawd rua tug kws kuv pum zoo.
Kuv yog tug kws muab txhua tsaav tuabneeg cob rua kuv tug tubkhai Nenpukajnexales kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos. Txawm yog tej tsaj qus los kuv kuas ua nwg qhev huv tuabsi.

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav ua nwg qhev, hab puab yuav ua nwg tug tub hab nwg tug xeebntxwv qhev moog txug lub sijhawm kws nwg lub tebchaws poob. Lwm tsaav tuabneeg hab tej vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim yuav kaav nwg lub tebchaws hab nwg yuav ua puab qhev.

“Tabsis yog muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg lossis lub tebchaws twg tsi ua lawv le nwg txuj kevcai tswjfwm, kuv yuav rau txim rua tsaav tuabneeg ntawd, puab yuav raug nav ntaaj nav rag tuag, raug kaab mob kev nkeeg tuag, hab tuag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes, moog txug nub kws kuv tso Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales tuaj tua puab kuas puamtsuaj taag.

Mej tsi xob noog mej cov cevlug lossis tug kws khaav has tas, nwg paub tej kws yuav muaj lug yaav tom ntej, tsi has ua npau suav lossis txheev tej tuabneeg kws tuag lawm tej plig lossis ua khawvkoob. Puab yuav kuas mej tsi xob moog ua vaajntxwv Npanpiloos qhev.
Puab yuav cevlug dlaag ntxag mej kuas mej raug luas coj moog dleb ntawm mej lub tebchaws. Kuv yuav ntab mej tawm moog, kuas mej raug kev puamtsuaj.

Tabsis yog tsaav tuabneeg twg txaus sab zwm rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos hab ua nwg qhev, kuv yuav ca puab nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, puab yuav tau ua puab tej laj tej teb. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Kuv has ib yaam le ntawd rua Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas has tas, “Koj ca le zwm rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos, ua nwg hab nwg cov pejxeem qhev, koj txhaj yuav muaj sa nyob.

Vim le caag koj hab koj cov pejxeem yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag lossis tuag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes lossis tuag rua kaab mob kev nkeeg? Tej nuav yog tej kws tug TSWV has tas, yuav lug raug tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi txaus sab zwm rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos.
Mej tsi xob noog cov cevlug kws has rua mej tas, tsi xob moog thawj tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos. Puab dlaag mej xwb.
Tug TSWV has tas, nwg tsi tau khaiv puab tuaj, puab tuav nwg lub npe dlaag mej xwb, yog le ntawd tug TSWV yuav ntab mej tawm moog, mej hab cov cevlug kws dlaag mej yuav raug tua tuag taag.”

Kuv txhaj has rua cov povthawj hab cov pejxeem lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws has tas, “Mej tsi xob noog cov cevlug kws has tas, tshuav tsi ntev luas yuav coj tej khoom muaj nqes huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev rov tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lug, puab dlaag mej xwb.
Mej tsi xob noog puab tej lug! Ca le zwm rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos, mej txhaj yuav muaj sa nyob! Vim le caag yuav ca lub nroog nuav pob puag taag ua ib pawg?

Yog has tas puab yog cov cevlug tseeb, hab yog kuv has rua puab tag, puab ca le thov kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuas luas tsi xob coj tej khoom muaj nqes huv lub Tuamtsev hab huv cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv lub loog moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos.”

(Thaus Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales tuaj nteg tau cov Yudas tug Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees kws yog Yehauyakees tug tub hab tej thawjcoj huv tebchaws Yudas hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm, Nenpukajnexales tseg tej ncej, lub rhawv tooj, cov tsheb txawb hab lub Tuamtsev qee yaam khoom muaj nqes ca xwb.)

“Mej ca le noog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has txug tej khoom muaj nqes kws tseem tshuav huv lub Tuamtsev hab huv cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv lub loog kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees:

Luas yuav coj tej ntawd moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos hab yuav nyob tim moog txug nub kws kuv pum has tas tsimnyog coj tej ntawd rov lug ca rua huv qhov chaw nuav dlua. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Thaus lub tsib hlis ntuj kws yog xyoo plaub  kws Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv, Axules tug tub Hananiyas kws yog tug cevlug nyob huv lub nroog Nkinpe-oos has rua kuv huv lub Tuamtsev taabmeeg cov povthawj hab cov pejxeem has tas,
Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Kuv tub rhuav tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos lub fwjchim lawm.

Tshuav le ob xyoos lawm xwb, kuv yuav coj tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev tej khoom muaj nqes kws Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales muab coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm, rov lug ca rua huv qhov chaw nuav dlua.

Kuv tseem yuav coj cov Yudas tug Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees kws yog Yehauyakees tug tub hab cov Yudas kws raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm rov lug huv tuabsi. Kuv yuav rhuav tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos lub fwjchim. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Kuv has rua Hananiyas taabmeeg cov povthawj hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev tas,

“Zoo kawg le lawm! Kuv ca sab has tas tug TSWV yeej yuav ua lawv le ntawd! Kuv ca sab has tas, nwg yuav ua kuas tej lug kws koj has tav, hab coj tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev tej khoom muaj nqes hab cov Yudas kws raug nteg moog rov lug.
Tabsis koj ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws kuv has rua koj hab cov pejxeem suavdlawg.
Cov cevlug kws nyob ua ntej koj hab kuv tam tau has tas, yuav muaj kev tsuv kev rog, kev tshaib kev nqhes hab kev mob kev nkeeg lug raug ntau lub tebchaws hab ntau tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim.
Tabsis tug cevlug kws qha tshwm has tas, yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb, ces txawm muaj le nwg has, tug cevlug ntawd txhaj yog tug kws tug TSWV khaiv lug.”
Ces Hananiyas txawm hle tug quabtwg ntawm kuv cejdlaab hab muab tsoo luv ua ob peb yaa,

hab nwg has taabmeeg suavdlawg tas, “Ob xyoos sau nuav, tug TSWV yuav muab tug quabtwg kws Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales muab khuam rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg cejdlaab tsoo kuas luv taag le nuav.” Ces kuv txawm ncaim moog lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev, tug TSWV kuas kuv
moog has rua Hananiyas has tas, “Koj muaj cuabkaav tsoo tug quabtwg ntoo nuav luv, tabsis nwg  yuav muab tug quabtwg hlau lug hloov.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, nwg yuav muab tug quabtwg hlau khuam rua sau txhua tsaav tuabneeg cejdlaab, hab kuas puab moog ua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos qhev. Tug TSWV has tas, txawm yog tej tsaj qus los yuav ua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales qhev.”
Yelemis has rua Hananiyas has tas, “Koj ca le noog kuv has! Tug TSWV tsi tau khaiv koj tuaj. Koj ntxag cov tuabneeg nuav ntseeg koj tej lug dlaag.
Yog le ntawd tug TSWV has tas, nwg yuav tshem koj tawm huv nplajteb nuav. Koj yuav tuag ua ntej lub xyoo nuav taag, vim koj ntxag cov tuabneeg nuav ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV.”
Ces Xyoo ntawd thaus lub xyaa hli ntuj, Hananiyas txawm tuag lawm.

Ntawm nuav yog tsaab ntawv kws kuv sau xaa huv Yeluxalees moog rua cov thawjcoj, cov povthawj, cov cevlug hab cov tuabneeg suavdlawg kws raug Nenpukajnexales nteg huv Yeluxalees coj moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.

Kuv sau kuv tsaab ntawv nuav tom qaab kws Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees, nwg nam, cov numtswv, cov Yudas hab Yeluxalees tej thawjcoj, cov kws tooj kws hlau, hab cov kws txua ntoo kws raug nteg huv Yeluxalees moog lawm.

Kuv muab tsaab ntawv nuav rua Safas tug tub Elaxas hab Hilekiyas tug tub Nkemaliyas kws yog cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv Xedekiyas khaiv moog cuag Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos nqaa moog. Tsaab ntawv ntawd has tas:
“Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, has le nuav rua cov kws tug TSWV kuas Nenpukajnexales tuaj nteg huv Yeluxalees moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos has tas:
‘Mej ca le ua vaaj ua tsev nyob, ca le ua laj ua teb cog txiv maab txiv ntoo noj.

Mej ca le yuav quaspuj kuas muaj tub muaj ntxhais; yuav nyaab rua mej tej tub hab qua mej tej ntxhais, mej tej tub tej ntxhais txhaj yuav muaj tub muaj ki fuamvaam coob. Mej yuavtsum fuamvaam kuas coob tsi xob ca tu noob.
Ca le tsim tej nroog kws kuv ca luas nteg mej moog nyob kuas zoo. Mej ca le thov kuv paab tej nroog ntawd, yog tej nroog ntawd vaammeej ces mej yuav vaammeej.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv ntuag mej has tas, mej tsi xob ca cov cevlug lossis lwm tug kws nrug mej nyob khaav has tas, puab txawj saib tej kws yuav tshwm lug yaav tom ntej dlaag ntxag mej, hab tsi xob ntseeg puab  tej npau suav.
Puab tuav kuv lub npe dlaag ntxag mej xwb. Kuv tsi tau khaiv puab tuaj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le ntawd.’
“Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Thaus mej moog nyob huv Npanpiloos puv xyaa caum xyoo lawm, kuv yuav lug paab mej lawv le kuv coglug tseg has tas, kuv yuav coj mej rov lug nyob huv mej lub tebchaws.
Kuv tuab leeg txhaj paub tej kws kuv npaaj yuav ua rua mej, kuv yuav paab kuas mej vaammeej, tsi yog ua kuas mej puamtsuaj, mej txhaj muaj kev ca sab  rua yaav tom ntej.
Thaus ntawd mej yuav hu kuv, lug cuag kuv hab thov kuv, kuv yuav teb mej.
Yog mej nrhav kuv kawg sab kawg ntsws, mej yuav ntsib kuv.

Kuv has rua mej has tas, mej yuav ntsib kuv, hab kuv yuav coj mej tawm huv lub tebchaws kws kuv ntab mej moog nyob rov lug. Kuv yuav sau mej huv txhua lub tebchaws hab txhua qhov chaw kws kuv ca luas nteg mej moog nyob rov lug rua huv mej lub tebchaws. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.’
“Mej has tas, tug TSWV tub pub rua mej muaj cov cev Vaajtswv lug nyob huv tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Mej ca le noog tej lug kws tug TSWV has txug tug vaajntxwv kws nyob sau Daviv lub zwmtxwv hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav, yog mej cov kwvtij kws tsi raug luas nteg nrug mej moog,

tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, ‘Kuv yuav tso kev tsuv kev rog, kev tshaib kev nqhes, hab kaab mob kev nkeeg lug rua puab, hab kuv yuav ua kuas puab zoo le cov txiv ncuav pas lwj kws tsi zoo noj.

Kuv yuav tso kev tsuv kev rog, kev tshaib kev nqhes hab kaab mob kev nkeeg caum puab hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob nplajteb yuav pum tej ntawd hab ntshai. Kuv ntab puab moog nyob txug qhov twg los luas yuav ntshai hab ceeb, vim tej xwm kws lug raug puab. Luas yuav luag puab plig hab tuav puab lub npe foom tsi zoo.
Tug TSWV has tas, vim puab tsi noog tej lug kws kuv khaiv cov cevlug kws yog kuv cov tubkhai lug qha puab ua ntu zug, tej xwm nuav txhaj lug raug puab. Puab yeej tsi noog kuv lug.
Mej cov kws kuv ntab tawm huv Yeluxalees moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm. Mej ca le noog kuv kws yog tug TSWV tej lug.’

“Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, has txug Kaulayas tug tub Ahaj hab Ma-axeyas tug tub Xedekiyas kws tuav kuv lub npe cevlug dlaag mej, kuv yuav muab obtug cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos, nwg yuav muab obtug tua taabmeeg mej.

Thaus cov tuabneeg kws raug nteg huv tebchaws Yudas moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm, xaav foom tsi zoo rua leejtwg, puab has tas, ‘Thov kuas tug TSWV ua rua koj ib yaam le nwg ua rua Xedekiyas hab Ahaj kws vaajntxwv Npanpiloos muab hlawv caj lawm.’

Obtug ua txhum luj kawg le, rua qhov obtug ntxag luas tej quaspuj hab tuav kuv lub npe has lug dlaag, kuv tsi tau kuas obtug has. Kuv paub tej kws obtug ua hab kuv ua timkhawv tawmtsaam obtug  Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuas kuv has rua Semayas kws yog tuabneeg Nehelas sau ib tsaab ntawv suam nwg lub npe xaa moog rua cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab xaa moog rua tug povthawj Xefaniyas kws yog Ma-axeyas tug tub hab cov povthawj txhua tug has tas:

“Tug TSWV tsaa koj ua povthawj hloov Yehauyadas chaw, hab nwgnuav koj yog tug thawj  kws saib tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev; koj ca le nteg txhua tug tuabneeg vwm kws ua txuj ua tug cev Vaajtswv lug, muab saw hlau khi nwg hab muab cuab hlau cuab nwg cejdlaab.
Vim le caag koj tseem tsi ua le ntawd rua Yelemis kws nyob huv Anathaus kws pheej cev Vaajtswv lug rua suavdlawg?

Koj ca le txwv nwg, vim nwg tau sau ntawv xaa tuaj rua cov kws nyob tim tebchaws Npanpiloos nuav has tas, puab yuav nyob tim nuav ntev; kuas puab ca le ua vaaj ua tsev nyob, ua laj ua teb hab cog txiv maab txiv ntoo noj.”
Tug povthawj Xefaniyas nyeem tsaab ntawv nuav rua kuv noog,
ces tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,

“Koj ca le sau ib tsaab ntawv xaa moog rua cov pejxeem kws raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos kws tug TSWV has txug Semayas kws yog tuabneeg Nehelas has tas, kuv tsi tau khaiv Semayas tuaj cevlug rua mej, nwg ca le tuaj cevlug le kws nwg yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug, kuas mej ntseeg nwg tej lug dlaag. Kuv yuav rau txim rua Semayas hab nwg cov xeebntxwv, nwg yuav tsi tshuav ib tug xeebntxwv ua neej nrug mej nyob, hab nwg yuav tsi pum tej yaam zoo kws kuv ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, rua qhov nwg qha kuas puab ntxeev sab rua kuv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas,
“Yelemis, koj ca le sau tej lug kws kuv has rua koj huv tuabsi rua ib phoo ntawv,

rua qhov thaus txug sijhawm lawm, kuv yuav pub kuas cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas kws yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg rov vaammeej ib yaam le qub. Kuv yuav coj puab rov lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab cov yawmkoob, puab txhaj yuav rov tau lub tebchaws nuav ua puab tug. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas has tas,
“Kuv nov ib lub suab quaj kws txaus ntshai heev, yog lub suab quaj txomnyem, tsi yog lub suab luag zoo sab.

Nwgnuav mej ca le ua tuab zoo xaav saib! Tej txivneej puas yug tau mivnyuas? Ua caag kuv pum txhua tug txivneej nyag pus rawv nyag lub plaab ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws mob plaab yuav yug mivnyuas? Vim le caag puab tej plhu thumxem taag le?
Muaj ib nub suavdlawg yuav raug kev txhawj kev ntshai; tsi muaj ib nub kws yuav ntshai npaum le nub ntawd, yog lub sijhawm kws kuv tsaav tuabneeg ntxhuv sab heev, tabsis puab yuav dlim.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Thaus txug nub ntawd, kuv yuav txu tug quabtwg kws khuam puab cejdlaab hab dlaws tej saw hlau kws khi puab povtseg, puab txhaj tsi tau moog ua lwm tsaav tuabneeg qhev ntxiv lawm.
Tabsis puab yuav ua kuv kws yog tug TSWV puab tug Vaajtswv teg num, hab ua Daviv tug xeebntxwv kws kuv yuav tsaa ua puab tug Vaajntxwv teg num.

‘Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej tsi xob ntshai; cov Yixalayees, mej tsi xob poob sab. Kuv yuav paab kuas mej dlim huv lub tebchaws kws dleb heev rov lug; mej yuav tau rov lug nyob huv mej lub tebchaws kaaj sab lug. Mej yuav tau rov lug nyob tso sab plhuav hab tsi muaj leejtwg ua rua mej ntshai le lawm.

Kuv yuav nrug nraim mej hab cawm mej; kuv yuav rhuav tej tebchaws kws kuv ntab mej moog nyob ntawd, tabsis kuv yuav tsi ua rua mej puamtsuaj. kuv yuav rau txim rua mej, tabsis kuv tsuas rau lawv le mej tej kev txhum xwb; kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.’ ”
Tug TSWV has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg tas, “Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg khu tau mej tej qhov txhaab; yuav tsi muaj leejtwg khu tau mej tej nqaj kws to kuas zoo.
Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tu mej; tsi muaj tshuaj qhwv mej tej qhov txhaab, hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg khu tau mej.

Cov tuabneeg kws hlub mej tub tso mej tseg lawm; puab tsi quavntsej mej. Kuv tawmtsaam mej ib yaam le kuv yog mej tug yeebncuab, kuv rau txim rua mej, rua qhov mej ua kev txhum ntau hab ua kev phem kev qas heev.
Mej tsi xob nroo txug mej tej mob, yeej tsi muaj leejtwg khu tau. Tej nuav tub yog kuv rau txim rua mej ntaag! Rua qhov mej ua kev txhum ntau hab ua kev phem kev qas heev.

Cov tuabneeg kws nwgnuav ntxo mej noj puab yuav raug luas ntxo ib yaam nkaus. Mej tej yeebncuab yuav raug luas nteg coj moog ua qhev huv tuabsi. Tej tuabneeg kws tsimtxom mej yuav raug luas tsimtxom, hab tej tuabneeg kws tuaj fuab mej, luas yuav tuaj fuab puab hab.

Txawm yog mej cov yeebncuab thuam mej has tas, ‘Luas tub tso lub nroog Xi-oos tseg, tsi muaj tuabneeg quavntsej nwg los xij.’ Kuv yuav ua kuas mej rov noj qaab nyob zoo, kuv yuav khu mej tej qhov txhaab kuas nqawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg rov lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, hab kuv yuav taabncuab txhua tsev tuabneeg huv tuabsi; puab yuav rov txhim khu lub nroog Yeluxalees dlua tshab, hab khu vaajntxwv lub loog kuas rov zoo le qub.
Tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog yuav hu nkauj ua tsaug; hab puab yuav qw zoo sab kawg le. Kuv yuav foom koob moov kuas puab fuamvaam coob, hab kuv yuav ua kuas puab tau ntsejmuag.
Kuv yuav pub kuas tsaav tuabneeg nuav muaj fwjchim ib yaam le yaav thaus u, kuv yuav tsaa puab lub neej kuas nyob ruaj khov; hab kuv yuav rau txim rua txhua tug kws tsimtxom puab.

Tug kws yuav kaav puab yog sawv huv puab tsaav tuabneeg lug, tug kws yuav ua puab tug vaajntxwv yog puab caajceg; thaus kuv hu nwg, nwg yuav lug cuag kuv, yog kuv tsi hu, leejtwg yuav muaj cuabkaav lug cuag kuv? Puab yuav ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv, kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV txujkev chim yog nthwv cua dlaaj cua dlub, nthwv cua nuav yuav ntsawj cov tuabneeg sab phem taubhau. Tug TSWV yuav chim moog txug thaus nwg ua ib puas tsaav yaam tav lawv le nwg npaaj tseg lawm. Muaj ib nub tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg yuav paub tseeb zaaj nuav lub ntsab.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Muaj ib nub kuv yuav ua cov Yixalayees txhua xeem tug Vaajtswv hab puab yuav ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg.
Kuv hlub cov Yixalayees kws seem tuag ntawm taj suabpuam. Thaus cov Yixalayees xaav su,
kuv tuaj dleb dleb tshwm rua puab  pum. Cov Yixalayees, kuv yeej ibtxwm hlub mej, kuv yuav hlub mej moog ibtxhis.
Kuv yuav muab mej hloov dlua tshab, mej yuav rov tau npuaj mej tej nruag seev cev hab zoo sab luag quas ntxhi.
Mej yuav rov tau xov vaaj cog txiv maab rua sau tej roob huv tebchaws Xamalis, hab cov tuabneeg kws cog tej txiv maab yuav tau noj tej txiv maab kws puab cog.
Muaj ib nub cov tub faajxwm yuav tuaj sau Efalayees tej roob hu has tas, ‘Peb ca le moog cuag tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv sau lub Roob Xi-oos.’ ”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Ca le hu nkauj zoo sab rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws yog tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb dlua lwm tsaav tuabneeg. Ca le hu mej tej nkauj qhuas has tas, ‘Tug TSWV cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg cawm cov tuabneeg kws seem txhua tug.’

Kuv yuav sau puab saab qaumteb hab tim qaab ntuj kawg rov lug, tsi has tej tuabneeg tuag teg tuag taw hab tej tuabneeg dligmuag lossis tej quaspuj suab mivnyuas hab tej kws tub yuav txug caij yug, puavleej yuav lug huv tuabsi, puab yuav lug sis sau ua ib tsaav tuabneeg.

Thaus kuv coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg rov lug puab yuav quaj hab thov kuv. Kuv yuav coj puab lug txug ndlua tej dlej cag kws ntshab si puab taug kev taj kev tug, puab yuav tsi qaug. Kuv yog cov Yixalayees leej Txiv, hab Efalayees yog kuv tug tub hlub.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Txhua tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le noog kuv has, hab qha kuv txujlug rua tej tebchaws dleb kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv. Kuv ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawg tsiv moog nyob ua saab ua sua, tabsis kuv yuav sau puab rov lug nyob ua ke hab kuv yuav tsomkwm puab ib yaam le tug tswv yug yaaj zuv nwg paab yaaj.
Kuv tso cov Yixalayees nyob thaajyeeb lug; kuv cawm puab dlim ntawm tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim txhais teg.

Puab yuav lug hu nkauj luag ntxhi sau lub roob Xi-oos; kuv pub puab muaj qoobloo hab muaj cawv txiv maab, muaj roj txiv ntoo, muaj yaaj, muaj tshis muaj nyuj hab muaj neeg. Puab yuav zoo ib yaam le lub vaaj kws luas ywg dlej quas ntshis, puab yuav muaj txhij muaj txhua lawv le puab xaav yuav xaav tau.

Thaus ntawd tej ntxhais yuav seev cev luag ntxhi; cov txivneej, tsi has laug hab hluas yuav zoo sab kawg nkaus; kuv yuav nplig puab sab, muab puab tej kev quaj ntsuag hloov ua kev lomzem, hab muab puab tej kev nyuaj sab hloov ua kev zoo sab.
Kuv yuav pub cov povthawj muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag, hab kuv yuav pub kuv tsaav tuabneeg muaj txhua yaam txaus puab sab. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Suavdlawg yuav nov suab quaj suab nyav huv lub nroog Lamas, yog lub suab quaj kws tu sab kawg le. Laxees yuav quaj ntsuag rua nwg tej mivnyuas; tsi muaj leejtwg yuav nplig tau nwg sab; rua qhov nwg tej mivnyuas tuag taag lawm.
Mej tsi xob quaj, ca le so kua muag. Txhua yaam kws mej ua yuav tawg paaj txi txiv, mej cov mivnyuas yuav rov huv yeebncuab tej tebchaws lug.
Mej tseem muaj kev ca sab, rua qhov mej tej tubki yuav tau rov lug. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.

“Kuv nov tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees seev has tas, ‘Tug TSWV, peb zoo ib yaam le tug tsaj kws tsi muaj tswv cob; tabsis koj cob qha peb kuas noog koj lug. Thov koj coj peb rov lug, peb zoo sab tig rov lug cuag tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv.

Peb tsiv ntawm koj moog lawm, tabsis tsi ntev peb xaav rov lug cuag koj. Thaus koj rau txim rua peb lawm, peb nyuaj sab heev. Peb poob ntsejmuag hab txaajmuag kawg le, rua qhov thaus peb tseem hluas peb tau ua txhum lawm.’

“Yixalayees, koj yog kuv tug tub kws kuv hlub heev, koj yog tug mivnyuas kws kuv hlub tshaaj plawg. Thaus twg kuv has txug koj lub npe, kuv hlub hab ncu txug koj. Kuv ncu ntsoov koj rua nruab sab, hab kuv yuav hlub koj.
Koj ca le tsuam nplooj rua txujkev kws koj moog, hab ca le taug koj txuj qub lw rov lug. Yixalayees, koj ca le rov qaab lug nyob huv tej qub zej qub zog.

Mej cov kws tsi muab lub sab npuab kuv, tseem yuav ua xyem xyaav moog txug thaus twg? Kuv tub tsim ib yaam tshab kws txawv dlua lwm yaam rua huv nplajteb nuav lawm: yaam ntawd txawv npaum nkaus le tug quaspuj ua tug tsomkwm tug txivneej.”

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Thaus kuv coj puab rov lug nyob rua huv puab lub tebchaws, cov kws nyob huv tej nroog huv tebchaws Yudas yuav rov has tas, “ ‘Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua lub roob dlawbhuv kws yog tug TSWV lub chaw nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.’
Tuabneeg yuav nyob huv tebchaws Yudas hab txhua lub nroog, puab yuav ua laj ua teb, hab yug yaaj yug tshis ua npoj ntwg.
Kuv yuav txhawb tej tuabneeg qaug zug kuas rov muaj zug, hab kuv yuav pub tej tuabneeg kws tshaib nqhes kuas muaj noj muaj haus.
Thaus ntawd suavdlawg yuav has tas, ‘Kuv tso sab lug pw tsaug zug hab sawv lug muaj zug khov kho.’
“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV has rua mej tas, tub txug nub kws kuv pub kuas lub tebchaws Yixalayees hab Yudas muaj tuabneeg nyob txhua qhov hab muaj tsaj txhu ua npoj ntwg lawm.

Yaav taag lug, kuv rhuav puab lub neej, tshem puab tawm, chua puab kutaw kuas puab qaug, ua rua puab puamtsuaj hab tso kev pluj kev tuag lug raug puab. Tabsis nwgnuav kuv yuav tsaa puab, txhim khu puab hab txhawb puab lub neej.
Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, suavdlawg yuav tsi has ib zag ntxiv has tas, ‘Nam hab txiv noj txiv qaub ua rua mivnyuas lug quavncaug.’
Tug kws noj txiv qaub tsuas qaub ntawm nwg lub ncauj xwb; txhua tug kws ua txhum, nyag tuag rua nyag txujkev txhum xwb.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub yuav txug nub kws kuv coglug tshab rua cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas.

Tej lug cog tseg tshab nuav yuav tsi zoo le tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob thaus kuv coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Txawm yog kuv zoo ib yaam le puab txiv los puab yeej tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg.
Cov lug cog tseg tshab kws kuv cog rua cov Yixalayees yog le nuav: kuv yuav ua kuas puab ncu ntsoov kuv tej kevcai rua nruab sab. Kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv hab puab yuav ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg.

Txij nuav moog tsi taag puab yuav qha kuas puab tsaav tuabneeg paub tug TSWV, rua qhov txhua tug tsi has tug hlub tug yau yuav paub kuv zoo. Kuv yuav zaam txim rua puab hab kuv yuav tsi cim ntsoov puab tej kev txhum le lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV ua lub nub ci pum kev rua nruab nub, ua lub hli hab tej nubqub ci pum kev rua mo ntuj; nwg dlu dlej havtxwv ndlaas nphau pis nphwv; nwg lub npe hu ua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
Nwg coglug tseg has tas, lub ntuj lub teb nyob ntev npaum le caag, cov Yixalayees yuav caj ua ib tsaav tuabneeg nyob ntev ib yaam le ntawd.

Yog leejtwg ntsuag tau sau nruab ntug lossis tshuaj tau nruab tivtxwv ces kuv txhaj tso tau cov Yixalayees tseg, txawm yog puab ua txhum los kuv yuav tsi tso puab tseg. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub yuav txug nub kws kuv txhim khu lub nroog Yeluxalees dlua tshab, txij ndlua ntawm lub chaw Tsomfaaj Hananees saab nubpoob moog txug ndlua ntawm lub Roojvaag Ceg kaum.
Lub nroog tug nrim saab nubpoob pib qhov ntawd moog txug rua sau lub roob Nkalej hab nkhaus moog cob rua ntawm Nkau-as.

Thoob plawg lub haav kws luas log tuag hab pov lamsim, hab tej teb kws nyob lawv ntug Haav Kiloos moog txug rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Neeg moog rua saab nubtuaj, yuav yog kuv qhov chaw tseemceeb. Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg rhuav lossis ua kuas lub nroog nuav puamtsuaj le lawm.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv thaus kws Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau kaum xyoo, hab Nenpukajnexales ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tau kaum yim xyoo.
Thaus lub sijhawm kws tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos cov tubrog tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuv raug nteg moog kaw rua huv vaajntxwv lub loog ib chaav.
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas yog tug kws nteg kuv moog kaw hab nwg kom kuv has tas, “Vim le cag koj cevlug has tas, tug TSWV yuav ca tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj txeeb lub nroog Yeluxalees,
hab Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas yuav tsiv tsi dlim. Nwg yuav raug Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales nteg moog hab nrug nwg thaam tim ntsej tim muag.

Xedekiyas yuav raug coj moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos, nwg yuav nyob tim moog txug nub kws kuv nrug nwg has taag. Txawm yog nwg yuav tawmtsaam cov Npanpiloos los nwg yuav kov tsi yeej. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas

kuv tug txiv ntxawm Salumes tug tub Hanamees yuav tuaj cuag kuv hab kuas kuv yuav nwg thaaj teb kws nyob huv Anathaus, huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, rua qhov kuv yog tug kws txheeb ze nwg tshaaj hab yog tug kws muaj cai yuav tau nwg thaaj teb ntawd lug ua kuv tug.
Ces txawm muaj lawv le tug TSWV has rua kuv. Hanamees tuaj ntsib kuv ntawm lub tshaav puam, kuas kuv yuav nwg thaaj teb. Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj paub has tas, yog tug TSWV has rua kuv tag.
Kuv txawm yuav Hanamees thaaj teb, tug nqe yog kaum xyaa dlaim nyaj, kuv txhaj muab nyaj lug luj rua nwg.
Kuv suam npe rua dlaim ntawv nas homthawj taabmeeg suavdlawg, hab kuv muab teev lug luj nyaj rua nwg.
Kuv muab dlaim ntawv yuav teb kws teev tej lug cog tseg hab nas homthawj rua, hab dlaim ntawv kws tsi nas homthawj,

cob rua Npalus kws yog Neliyas tug tub hab yog Maxeyas tug xeebntxwv taabmeeg Hanamees, cov timkhawv kws nrug suam npe rua ob dlaim ntawv yuav teb hab cov tuabneeg kws tuaj nyob huv lub tshaav puam ntawd.
Kuv has rua Npalus taabmeeg suavdlawg tas,

“Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, saamfwm kuas koj ca le txais ob dlaim ntawv nuav: dlaim ntawv yuav teb kws teev tej lug cog tseg hab nas homthawj rua hab dlaim ntawv kws tsi nas homthawj coj moog ntsaws rua huv ib lub hub ca, txhaj yuav nyob ntev moog yaav tom ntej.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, tseem yuav muaj tuabneeg yuav vaaj yuav tsev, yuav laj yuav teb hab yuav vaaj txiv maab nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav moog ntxiv.”
Tom qaab kws kuv muab dlaim ntawv yuav teb rua Npalus lawm, kuv thov Vaajtswv has tas,
“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj lub fwjchim hab tug zug luj zug nchaav tsim lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj; tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi nyuaj rua koj ua tsi tau le.

Koj qha koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg rua ntau txheeb tam tuabneeg, tabsis koj rau txim rua tuabneeg, vim puab nam puab txiv tej kev txhum. Koj yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj; koj yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
Koj muaj tswvyim npaaj homphaj hab koj teg num luj kawg nkaus. Koj pum txhua yaam kws tuabneeg ua hab koj muab nqe zug rua puab lawv le puab teg num.

Ntau xyoo dlhau lug koj ua tej txujci tseemceeb nraag tebchaws Iziv hab koj tseem ua tej txujci ntawd rua cov Yixalayees hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg pum lug txug naj nub nua, yog le ntawd, koj lub npe txhaj nrov nchaa moo lug moog rua txhua qhov.
Tub yog koj ua tej txujci tseemceeb rua peb cov yeebncuab pum, puab txhaj ntshai heev, koj tug zug hab koj lub fwjchim coj koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Koj muab lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob rua koj tsaav tuabneeg lawv le koj tub tau coglug rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.

Tabsis thaus puab lug nyob huv lub tebchaws lawm, puab tsi noog koj tej lug saamfwm lossis ua lawv le koj tej lug qha, puab tsi ua lawv le koj kuas puab ua. Vim le ntawd, koj txhaj tso tej kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab.

“Cov tubrog Npanpiloos tub tuaj vij hab meem ntswg thoob plawg kuas tua tau lub nroog. Kev sis ntaus sis tua, kev tshaib kev nqhes hab kev mob kev nkeeg txhaj ua rua lub nroog poob rua cov yeebncuab teg. Tej kws koj has txhaj tshwm rua koj pum lawm tag.
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj kuas kuv yuav thaaj teb taabmeeg cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ua timkhawv, tabsis nwgnuav lub nroog yuav poob rua cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos teg.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog tuabneeg nplajteb tug Vaajtswv. Tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi kws nyuaj rua kuv ua tsi tau le.
Kuv yuav muab lub nroog nuav cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos hab nwg cov tubrog; puab yuav txeeb lub nroog,

hab tis suavtawg hlawv lub nroog. Suavtawg yuav kub lub nroog hab tej tsev kws puab moog hlawv khoom sau ruv tsev fij rua Npa-aas hab laub cawv txiv maab fij rua luas tej vaajtswv, txhaj ua rua kuv chim.
Cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas yeej ibtxwm tsi ua lawv le kuv sab nyam hab tej kws puab ua, ua rua kuv chim.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav, ua rua kuv chim hab npautawg, txij nub kws puab pib rhawv lub nroog lug lawm. Kuv tub txav txim sab yuav muab lub nroog rhuav povtseg,
rua qhov cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov vaajntxwv, cov thawjcoj, cov povthawj hab cov cevlug tau ua kev phem kev qas.
Txawm yog kuv qha puab taag rov qha dlua los puab tsi noog hab tsi xyum ua zoo; tabsis puab tig nrausqaum rua kuv.
Puab coj puab tej mlom kws phem qas lug tso rua huv lub Tuamtsev kws yog qhov chaw tuabneeg tuaj pehawm kuv hab ua rua kuv lub Tuamtsev tsi huv lawm.

Puab ua ib lub thaaj rua Npa-aas huv lub Haav Hinoos, coj puab tej tub tej ntxhais moog tua hlawv fij rua tug vaajtswv Maulej. Kuv tsi tau has kuas puab ua tej ntawd, hab kuv tsi tau xaav has tas, puab yuav ua tej ntawd kuas cov Yudas ua txhum.”

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, “Yelemis, tej tuabneeg has tas kev tsuv kev rog, kev tshaib kev nqhes hab kev mob kev nkeeg yuav ua rua lub nroog nuav poob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos teg. Koj ca le noog, kuv yuav has dlua lwm yaam ntxiv hab.
Kuv yuav sau puab huv cov tebchaws kws kuv ntab puab moog nyob, thaus kuv chim hab npautawg rua puab, kuv yuav coj puab rov lug nyob qhov chaw nuav hab ca puab nyob kaaj sab lug.
Puab yuav ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv xaav pub puab ua ib lub sab hab taug ib txujkev, kuas puab fwm kuv txhua lub sijhawm, puab hab puab tej xeebntxwv txhaj tau lub neej zoo.
Kuv yuav coglug rua puab kuas nyob moog ibtxhis. Kuv yuav ua zoo rua puab moog le, hab kuv yuav ua kuas puab fwm kuv kawg sab kawg ntsws, puab txhaj tsi tso kuv tseg.
Kuv yuav txaus sab ua txhua yaam zoo rua puab hab pub kuas puab nyob ruaj rua huv lub tebchaws nuav moog le.
“Kuv tau tso kev txomnyem lug rua tsaav tuabneeg nuav npaum le caag, kuv yuav pub tej kws zoo rua puab npaum le ntawd, lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg lawm.

Tej tuabneeg has tas, lub tebchaws nuav yuav ua suabpuam, tsi muaj tuabneeg lossis tsaj nyob hab yuav muab cob rua cov Npanpiloos. Tabsis tseem muaj tuabneeg yuav laj yuav teb huv lub tebchaws nuav dlua ib zag ntxiv.

Yuav muaj tuabneeg yuav laj yuav teb, ua ntawv suam npe, nas homthawj rua hab kuas tuabneeg tuaj ua timkhawv. Puab yuav ua le nuav nyob rua huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, huv tej zog kws nyob ibncig lub nroog Yeluxalees, huv cov Yudas tej nroog, cov nroog kws nyob sau tej laaj roob, nyob lawv tej taw roob hab huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb. Kuv yuav coj puab rov lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Thaus kws kuv tseem raug kaw nyob huv chaav kws cov tub faajxwm zuv, tug TSWV rov has rua kuv dlua.
Tug TSWV kws tsim lub nplajteb, rhawv lub nplajteb hab muab txawb nyob muaj chaw, nwg lub npe hu ua tug TSWV, yog tug kws has rua kuv tas,
“Koj ca le thov kuv, kuv yuav teb koj; kuv yuav qha tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj tsi tau paub rua koj.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, luas yuav tuaj vij lub nroog Yeluxalees muab tej tsev kws nyob huv lub nroog hab cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv lub loog rhuav kuas puamtsuaj taag.

Cov Yudas ibtxha yuav sawv tawmtsaam cov Npanpiloos, tabsis vim kuv txujkev chim hab npautawg, kuv yuav muab puab tua kuas tuag pawg lug rua txhua qhov.  Kuv tso lub nroog nuav tseg, vim cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv ua phem ua qas.
Tabsis kuv yuav khu lub nroog hab nwg cov tuabneeg kuas noj qaab nyob zoo. Kuv yuav pub kuas puab nyob tso sab lug tsi ntshai dlaabtsi.
Kuv yuav pub kuas cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees muaj kev vaammeej, hab kuv yuav txhim khu puab lub neej ib yaam le yaav thaus u.
Txawm yog puab ntxeev sab hab ua txhum tawmtsaam kuv los kuv yuav zaam puab lub txim hab ntxuav puab tej kev txhum.

Yeluxalees yuav ua qhov chaw rua kuv zoo sab, tau koob meej hab tau ntsejmuag, txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob nplajteb yuav ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo thaus puab nov tej txujci tseemceeb kws kuv ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalees hab tej kev vaammeej kws kuv pub rua lub nroog ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Tej tuabneeg sis thaam has tas, qhov chaw nuav zoo ib yaam le lub taj suabpuam kws tsi muaj tuabneeg lossis tsaj nyob. Yeej yog le puab has tag; cov Yudas tej nroog yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg lossis tsaj nyob hab tej kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg taug le. Tabsis mej yuav nov has tas qhov chaw ntawd

rov muaj suab zoo sab hab suab noj tshoob haus kug. Mej yuav nov suab hu nkauj zoo sab hab coj khoom ua tsaug tuaj fij rua kuv huv lub Tuamtsev; puab yuav has tas, “ ‘Ca le ua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tsaug, rua qhov nwg yog tug muaj sab dlawb sab zoo hab nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.’ Kuv yuav ua kuas lub tebchaws nuav rov vaammeej ib yaam le thaus u. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Lub tebchaws nuav zoo ib yaam le lub taj suabpuam, tsi muaj tuabneeg lossis tsaj nyob, tabsis yuav rov ua tshaav zaub rua cov tub yug yaaj coj puab tej yaaj moog noj zaub.

Cov tub yug yaaj yuav txheeb puab tej yaaj nyob huv tej nroog, sau tej laaj roob, ntawm tej taw roob, huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb, huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, huv tej zog kws nyob ibncig lub nroog Yeluxalees hab huv cov Yudas tej nroog. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub yuav txug lub sijhawm kws kuv ua kuas txhua yaam tav lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg rua cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees.
Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd kuv yuav xaiv Daviv ib tug xeebntxwv kws ncaaj nceeg lug ua vaajntxwv. Tug vaajntxwv ntawd yuav kaav lub tebchaws ncaaj nceeg.
Kuv yuav cawm cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kuas dlim hab nyob kaaj sab lug. Luas yuav hu lub nroog has tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws Yog Peb Txujkev Cawm Dlim.’
Tug TSWV has tas, Daviv yuav muaj xeebntxwv lug ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees tsi tu ncua,
hab xeem Levis yuav tau ua povthawj ua kuv teg num kws yog muab tsaj, qoobloo hab tej khoom theej txhoj hlawv fij tsi tu ncua rua kuv.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Kuv coglug rua nruab nub hab mo ntuj, kuas nyag moog lawv le nyag lub caij; lu lug cog tseg ntawd tsi muaj leejtwg rhuav tau le.

Kuv tau coglug tseg rua kuv tug tubkhai Daviv ib yaam le ntawd has tas, nwg caajceg yuav tau ua vaajntxwv tsi tu ncua, hab cov povthawj kws yog xeem Levis los yuav tau ua kuv teg num moog le; tej lug cog tseg nuav los tsi pub leejtwg rhuav tau le.

Kuv yuav pub kuas kuv tug tubkhai Daviv cov xeebntxwv hab cov povthawj kws yog xeem Levis fuamvaam coob ib yaam le tej nubqub sau nruab ntug hab tej xuabzeb ntawm ntug havtxwv kws tsi muaj leejtwg suav txheeb.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,

“Koj puas nov tej tuabneeg has tas, kuv tub muab ob tsev tuabneeg kws yog cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees kws kuv xaiv ntawd tso tseg lawm? Vim le ntawd, luas txhaj saib tsi taug kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab tsi suav has tas puab yog ib tsaav tuabneeg le.
Tabsis kuv kws yog tug TSWV, kuv tub coglug rua nruab nub hab mo ntuj, hab ua kuas muaj kevcai tswj lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj.
