Yeej yuav muaj tseeb lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg nuav, yog le ntawd, kuv yuav tsi hloov tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv hab kuv tug tubkhai Daviv. Kuv yuav xaiv Daviv cov xeebntxwv ib tug lug ua thawjcoj kaav Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv. Kuv yuav taabncuab kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab pub kuas puab rov vaammeej dlua.”

Tug TSWV has rua kuv thaus lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej tubrog tuaj paab Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos hab nwg cov tubrog hab cov tuabneeg kws zwm rua nwg tuaj ntaus lub nroog Yeluxalees hab tej nroog kws nyob ibncig ntawd.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kuas kuv moog has rua Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas tas, “Kuv kws yog tug TSWV, yuav muab lub nroog nuav cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos, nwg yuav muab hlawv kuas kub nyab taag.

Koj yuav tsiv tsi dlim le; koj yuav raug luas nteg coj moog cob rua Nenpukajnexales. Koj yuav tau moog ntsib nwg hab nrug nwg thaam tim ntsej tim muag, ces nwg yuav coj koj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos.
Xedekiyas, koj ca le noog tej lug kws kuv has txug koj, koj yuav tsi raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog.

Koj yuav tuag kaaj sab lug, luas yuav hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab rua koj hab log koj ib yaam le thaus u luas hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab hab log koj cov yawmkoob, hab cov vaajntxwv kws tuag ua ntej lawm. Puab yuav quaj nyav koj has tas, ‘Peb tug vaajntxwv tuag lawm!’ Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Kuv txhaj coj tug TSWV tej lug moog has rua Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kws nyob huv Yeluxalees

thaus tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos cov tubrog tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab tua cov Yudas lub nroog Lakhis hab Axekas kws yog ob lub nroog huv tebchaws Yudas kws tseem muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv.
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees coglug has tas,
puab yuav tso cov Henplais kws ua luas qhev kuas dlim kev ua qhev, tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej, kuas cov kwvtij Henplais tsi muaj ib tug ua luas qhev le.
Cov thawjcoj hab tej pejxeem suavdlawg pum zoo tso puab tej qhev hab tsi yuam puab ua qhev ntxiv lawm. Puab tau tso cov qhev ntawd tag,
tabsis tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev, puab hloov sab hab moog coj cov qhev rov lug ua qhev dlua.
Ces tug TSWV,

kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kuas kuv moog has rua cov tuabneeg tas, “Kuv tau coglug rua mej cov yawmkoob thaus kws kuv tso puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuas puab dlim ntawm txujkev ua luas qhev. Kuv has rua puab tas

cov tuabneeg Henplais kws nwg muab nwg muag ua qhev hab ua num rua puab puv rau lub xyoos lawm, xyoo xyaa puab yuavtsum tso cov qhev ntawd, tabsis mej cov yawmkoob tsi quavntsej lossis tsi noog kuv has le.

Ob peb nub kws dlhau lug ntawd, mej tau hloov sab ua kuas hum kuv sab nyam. Mej suavdlawg yeej pum zoo tso mej cov kwvtij Henplais kws ua mej qhev, hab coglug taabmeeg kuv huv lub Tuamtsev kws mej pehawm kuv.
Tabsis mej rov hloov sab hab saib tsi taug kuv. Mej rov moog coj cov qhev kws mej tub muab tso moog lawm rov lug hab yuam kuas puab ua mej qhev dlua.

Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav kuv kws yog tug TSWV has rua mej tas, mej yeej tsi noog kuv lug; mej tsi tso mej tej kwvtij Henplais kuas dlim kev ua qhev. Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav tso mej nyob ywjpheej: Yog kev ywjpheej moog tuag rua huv tshaav rog, tuag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes, hab tuag rua kaab mob kev nkeeg. Kuv yuav ua kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob nplajteb ntshai, vim tej kws kuv ua rua mej.

Cov numtswv huv tebchaws Yudas, huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, huv lub loog, cov povthawj hab cov thawjcoj tau coglug rua kuv hab tua ib tug txiv nyuj muab phua ua ob saab, hab puab moog huv kis nruab nraab, tabsis nwgnuav puab rhuav tsi ua lawv le puab tej lug cog tseg. Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav ua rua puab ib yaam le puab ua rua tug txiv nyuj ntawd.
Kuv yuav muab puab cob rua puab tej yeebncuab kws nrhav nrhw tua puab tua povtseg. Tej tsaj qus hab noog yuav lug noj puab.

Kuv yuav muab Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas hab nwg cov numtswv cob rua cov tuabneeg kws nrhav nrhw tua puab tua povtseg. Kuv yuav muab puab cob rua cov tubrog Npanpiloos kws tub thim rov qaab lawm.

Kuv yuav has rua puab, kuas puab tig rov lug rua huv lub nroog. Puab yuav tua lub nroog, txeeb lub nroog hab hlawv lub nroog kuas kub nyab taag. Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Yudas tej nroog zoo ib yaam le lub taj suabpuam kws tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Thaus kws Yauxiyas tug tub Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Koj ca le moog ntsib Lekhas cuab kwvtij hab nrug puab thaam. Hab coj puab tuaj rua huv lub Tuamtsev ib chaav hab muab cawv txiv maab rua puab haus.”
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj coj Yaxaniyas kws yog dlua ib tug Yelemis tug tub, (Tug Yelemis nuav yog Hanpaxiniyas tug tub) hab taagnrho Yaxaniyas cov kwvtij hab cov tub kws yog Lekhas cuab kwvtij tuaj

rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Kuv coj puab moog rua huv Idaliyas kws yog tug cevlug tug tub Hanaas cov tub chaav tsev. Chaav tsev nuav nyob txheej sau kws ncaaj ntawm Salumes tug tub Ma-axeyas chaav. Ma-axeyas yog tug zuv lub Tuamtsev tej qhovrooj.
Kuv muab ib cov fwj kws muaj cawv puv nkaus hab ib cov khob lug txawb rua ntawm Lekhas cuab kwvtij xubndlag, hab kuv has rua puab tas, “Suavdlawg haus cawv.”
Tabsis puab teb has tas, “Peb tsi haus cawv. Peb yawmkoob Yaunadas kws yog Lekhas tug tub qha rua peb has tas, kuas peb lossis peb cov xeebntxwv tsi xob haus cawv hlo le.

Nwg tseem qha ntxiv has tas, peb tsi xob ua vaaj ua tsev lossis ua laj ua teb lossis cog txiv maab lossis yuav cawv txiv maab le. Hab nwg saamfwm ntxiv has tas, kuas peb nyob tsevntaub xwb, peb txhaj tau nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws nuav, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj tebchaws.
Peb yeej ibtxwm noog peb yawmkoob Yaunadas kws yog Lekhas tug tub tej lug kws nwg ntuag peb. Peb cov nuav ibtxwm tsi haus cawv txiv maab, peb tej quaspuj mivnyuas los yeej tsi haus le.
Peb yeej tsi ua vaaj ua tsev nyob, peb nyob tsevntaub xwb, hab peb tsi muaj vaaj txiv maab, tsi muaj laj teb lossis qoobloo. Peb ua txhua yaam lawv le peb yawmkoob Yaunadas qha rua peb lawm.

Tabsis thaus Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales tuaj tua lub tebchaws nuav, peb txhaj tsiv tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kuas peb dlim ntawm cov Npanpiloos hab cov Xilias tej tubrog xwb. Tub yog vim le ntawd, peb txhaj lug nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav.”

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuas kuv moog has rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv nug mej has tas, vim le caag mej tsi noog kuv lug hab tsi ua lawv le kuv has?
Yaunadas cov xeebntxwv noog nwg lug, hab puab tsi haus cawv txiv maab lug txug naj nub nua. Kuv qha mej ua ntu zug, tabsis mej tsi noog kuv lug.

Kuv khaiv kuv cov tubkhai kws yog cov cevlug tuaj qha mej tsi tu ncua, puab qha kuas mej tso mej tej kev phem kev qas tseg hab ua qhov zoo. Puab ntuag kuas mej tsi xob pe mlom hab teev lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv, mej txhaj yuav tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm. Tabsis mej yeej tsi noog hab tsi quavntsej kuv tej lug le.
Yaunadas cov xeebntxwv ua lawv le puab yawmkoob tej lug saamfwm, tabsis mej tsi noog kuv lug le.

Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav tso tej kev puamtsuaj lug raug mej cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees lawv le kuv has tseg lawm. Kuv yuav ua le nuav, rua qhov mej tsi noog kuv lug hab mej tsi teb kuv thaus kuv hu mej.”

Kuv txhaj has rua Lekhas cuab kwvtij tas, tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Mej noog mej yawmkoob Yaunadas tej lug kws nwg saamfwm rua mej; mej ua lawv le nwg tej lug qha, hab mej ua txhua yaam lawv le nwg saamfwm.
Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus coglug has tas, Lekhas tug tub Yaunadas yuav muaj xeebntxwv lug ua kuv teg num moog le.”
Thaus Yauxiyas tug tub Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau plaub xyoos, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,

“Koj moog muab ib thooj ntawv lug sau tej kws kuv qha rua koj txug cov Yixalayees, cov Yudas hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg. Ca le sau txhua yaam kws kuv qha rua koj, txij thaus Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas lug txug naj nub nua.
Thaus cov Yudas nov has tas, kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj, tej zag puab yuav tseg tsi ua kev phem kev qas lawm. Kuv yuav zaam puab lub txim hab tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua.”
Kuv txawm hu Neliyas tug tub Npalus tuaj hab kuv pav txhua yaam kws tug TSWV qha rua kuv lawm, rua Npalus sau rua huv ib thooj ntawv.
Tom qaab ntawd, kuv has rua Npalus has tas, “Luas txwv tsi pub kuv moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev.

Yog le ntawd, nub kws suavdlawg tuaj yoo mov huv lub Tuamtsev lawv le kevcai, kuv xaav kuas koj moog rua tod, hab nyeem thooj ntawv kws tug TSWV kuas kuv pav rua koj sau rua suavdlawg noog, puab txhaj nov txhua yaam kws tug TSWV has rua kuv. Koj yuavtsum coj moog nyeem rua qhov chaw kws suavdlawg nov, kuas cov Yudas kws tuaj huv puab tej nroog tuaj tau nov txhij txhua.
Tej zag puab yuav thov tug TSWV hab tso puab tej kev txhum tseg, rua qhov tug TSWV qha has tas, nwg yuav rau txim rua puab, vim nwg chim hab npautawg heev.”
Npalus txhaj moog nyeem tug TSWV tej lug huv lub Tuamtsev rua suavdlawg noog lawv le kuv has.

Thaus Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau tsib xyoos hab cuaj hlis, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalees hab cov Yudas txawm tuaj rua huv puab tej nroog tuaj yoo mov lawv le kevcai, kuas tug TSWV txaus sab rua puab.

Thaus Npalus taabtom nyeem thooj ntawv kws sau tej lug kws tug TSWV qha rua kuv rua suavdlawg noog huv lub Tuamtsev. Npalus sawv huv Safas tug tub Nkemaliyas kws yog tug teev ntawv chaav. Chaav ntawd nyob txheej sau, ze ntawm lub Roojvaag Tshab kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
Thaus Nkemaliyas tug tub Mikayas kws yog Safas tug xeebntxwv noog Npalus nyeem tug TSWV txujlug huv thooj ntawv taag lawm,

Mikayas txawm moog rua huv tug teev ntawv chaav tsev ua num huv vaajntxwv lub loog. Muaj cov numtswv ntau leej tuaj nyob huv saablaaj. Cov numtswv ntawd yog tug teev ntawv Elisamas, Semayas tug tub Delayas, Akhenpaus tug tub Enathaas, Safas tug tub Nkemaliyas, Hanayas tug tub Xedekiyas hab cov numtswv ntau leej tuaj nyob huv.
Mikayas txhaj pav tej kws nwg nov Npalus nyeem rua cov pejxeem noog ntawd txhua yaam rua cov numtswv.

Thaus ntawd cov numtswv txhaj khaiv Nethaniyas tug tub Yehudis, (Yehudis yawm yog Selemiyas, hab nwg yawmkoob yog Kusis), moog has kuas Npalus coj thooj ntawv kws nwg nyeem rua suavdlawg noog tuaj rua puab saib. Npalus txhaj nqaa thooj ntawv ntawd moog rua puab.
Puab has rua Npalus has tas, “Koj ca le nyob quastsawg hab nyeem thooj ntawv rua peb noog” Yog le ntawd, Npalus txhaj nyeem rua puab noog.
Thaus nwg nyeem cov lug ntawd taag, puab ntshai heev, ib leeg saib ib leeg hab puab has rua Npalus tas, “Peb yuavtsum moog qha zaaj nuav rua vaajntxwv paub.”
Cov numtswv nug Npalus has tas, “Koj ca le qha rua peb saib ua le caag koj txhaj sau tau tej lug nuav? Puas yog Yelemis pav rua koj sau?”
Npalus teb has tas, “Yelemis pav tej lug nuav txhua lu rua kuv, kuv txhaj muab cwjmem sau tej lug ntawd rua huv thooj ntawv nuav.”
Cov numtswv has rua Npalus has tas, “Koj hab Yelemis ca le tsiv moog nkaum tsi xob pub leejtwg paub has tas meb nyob qhov twg le.”
Cov numtswv muab thooj ntawv ntawd khaws ca rua huv Elisamas kws yog tug teev ntawv chaav tsev ua num, puab txawm moog rua huv vaajntxwv chaav tsev, hab pav txhua yaam rua vaajntxwv noog.

Vaajntxwv kuas Yehudis moog muab thooj ntawv lug rua nwg. Yehudis txhaj moog rua huv Elisamas chaav tsev ua num hab nqaa thooj ntawv ntawd lug nyeem rua vaajntxwv hab cov numtswv kws sawv puagncig vaajntxwv noog.
Thaus ntawd yog lub caij ntuj no, vaajntxwv nyob quastsawg nte tawg huv nwg lub loog chaav kws rauv tawg.

Thaus Yehudis nyeem taag peb plaub ntus lawm vaajntxwv txawm muab chais hlais tej ntu kws nyeem taag lawm pov hlawv. Nwg pheej hlais ib ntus quas zug le ntawd pov hlawv moog txug thaus thooj ntawv ntawd taag.
Tabsis tsi pum vaajntxwv hab nwg cov numtswv ntshai lossis nyuaj sab txug tej kws puab nov ntawd le.
Txawm yog Enathaas, Delayas hab Nkemaliyas puab thov kuas vaajntxwv tsi xob muab thooj ntawv ntawd hlawv los vaajntxwv tsi noog puab has le.

Tom qaab ntawd, vaajntxwv kuas Yelamees kws yog vaajntxwv tug tub nrug Aliyees tug tub Selayas hab Anpedees tug tub Selemiyas tuaj nteg kuv hab Npalus kws yog kuv tug teev ntawv. Tabsis tug TSWV muab wb zais lawm.
Thaus Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees muab thooj ntawv kws kuv pav rua Npalus sau ntawd hlawv taag lawm, tug TSWV kuas kuv
muab dlua ib thooj ntawv lug sau txhua yaam lawv le sau rua thawj thooj ntawv lawm.

Tug TSWV kuas kuv sau rua Yehauyakees has tas, “Koj muab thooj ntawv ntawd hlawv, hab koj nug Yelemis has tas, vim le caag nwg txhaj sau has tas, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos yuav tuaj tua lub tebchaws nuav, luas yuav tua tej tuabneeg hab tej tsaj txhu kuas tuag taag.

Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav kuv kws yog tug TSWV has rua koj kws yog Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees paub has tas, koj cov xeebntxwv yuav tsi muaj ib tug tau nyob sau Daviv lub zwmtxwv kaav tebchaws le lawm. Luas yuav muab koj lub cev tuag pov rua saab nrau. Nruab nub tshaav ntuj yuav zab, hab mo ntuj yuav tsau lwg tsawv.

Kuv yuav rau txim rua koj, koj cov xeebntxwv hab koj cov numtswv, vim tej kev txhum kws mej ua, tsi has koj lossis koj cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov Yudas puavleej tsi noog kuv tej lug ntuag, yog le ntawd, kuv yuav ua kuas mej puamtsuaj lawv le kuv tau has tseg lawm.”

Tom qaab ntawd, kuv muab dlua ib thooj ntawv lug rua Npalus kws yog kuv tug teev ntawv, nwg yog Neliyas tug tub kuas nwg sau txhua yaam lawv le kuv pav rua nwg. Nwg sau txhua yaam lawv le cov lug kws kuv pav rua nwg sau rua thawj thooj ntawv lawm.
Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tsaa Yauxiyas tug tub Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas hloov Yehauyakees tug tub Yehauyakhees.
Tabsis Xedekiyas cov numtswv lossis cov pejxeem tsi noog tej lug kws tug TSWV kuas kuv has rua puab le.
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas khaiv Selemiyas tug tub Yehukales hab Ma-axeyas tug tub Xefaniyas kws ua povthawj tuaj kuas kuv thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv paab peb tsaav tuabneeg.
Thaus ntawd luas tseem tsi tau coj kuv moog kaw. Kuv tseem nyob ywjpheej hab moog lug ib yaam le suavdlawg.
Thaus cov tubrog Npanpiloos taabtom vij lub nroog Yeluxalees, puab nov has tas cov tubrog Iziv tub hlaa Iziv tug nrimteb tuaj lawm, ces cov tubrog Npanpiloos txawm ca le thim rov qaab.
Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kuas kuv
has rua Xedekiyas has tas, “Iziv cov tubrog kws tuaj paab mej, puab yuav rov moog tsev.
Ces cov tubrog Npanpiloos yuav rov tuaj tua, txeeb lub nroog hab muab hlawv povtseg.
Kuv kws yog tug TSWV has rua mej tas, mej tsi xob tso sab has tas cov Npanpiloos yuav tsi rov tuaj tua mej lawm. Puab yeej yuav rov tuaj xwb.
Txawm yog mej tua cov tubrog Npanpiloos swb lawm los tshuav puab cov tubrog kws raug mob pw huv tej tsevntaub tseem yuav sawv lug hlawv lub nroog povtseg.”
Cov tubrog Npanpiloos thim ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees moog, rua qhov cov tubrog Iziv tuaj ze lawm.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj sawv kev tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog rua peg xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, moog saws kuv tsev tuabneeg thaaj aav ua kuv tug.

Tabsis thaus kuv moog txug ntawm lub Roojvaag Npeenyamees, Selemiyas tug tub Iliyas kws yog Hanayas tug xeebntxwv, hab yog tug thawj saib cov tubrog zuv roojvaag, txawm thaiv kuv kev hab has rua kuv tas, “Koj yuav moog thawj cov Npanpiloos puas yog?”
Kuv teb has tas, “Tsi yog le koj has. Tsi yog kuv moog thawj puab.” Tabsis Iliyas tsi ntseeg kuv, nwg ca le nteg kuv moog cuag cov numtswv.
Cov numtswv npautawg heev rua kuv, puab txhaj kuas luas nplawm kuv hab coj kuv moog kaw rua huv Yaunathaas kws yog ib tug teev ntawv lub tsev, luas muab lub tsev ntawd ua tsev lojcuj.
Puab muab kuv kaw rua txheej huv aav, kuv nyob rua huv tau ntev loo.

Tom qaab ntawd, Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas khaiv tuabneeg tuaj tso kuv tawm lug. Vaajntxwv nug kuv tuabywv huv nwg lub loog has tas, “Tug TSWV puas muaj dlaabtsi has rua koj?” Kuv teb has tas, “Muaj, tug TSWV has tas, nwg yuav muab koj cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos.”
Kuv nug Xedekiyas has tas, “Kuv ua txhum dlaabtsi rua koj hab koj cov numtswv lossis koj cov pejxeem, koj txhaj nteg kuv moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj?
Koj cov cevlug kws has rua koj tas, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos yuav tsi tuaj tua koj lossis lub tebchaws nuav dlua twg taag lawm?
Vaajntxwv, thov koj noog hab ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv thov koj. Thov koj tsi xob xaa kuv rov moog kaw rua huv Yaunathaas lub tsev lawm. Yog koj ua le ntawd, kuv yeej yuav tuag rua tod xwb.”

Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas txhaj kuas luas muab kuv kaw rua huv nwg lub loog ib chaav kws muaj tubrog zuv, hab nwg kuas cov tuabneeg cub ncuav ntawm ntug kev nqaa ncuav tuaj rua kuv noj txhua nub nyob qhov ntawd moog txug thaus tsi muaj ncuav nyob huv lub nroog le lawm.
Mathaas tug tub Sefatiyas, Pasehus tug tub Nkedaliyas, Selemiyas tug tub Yehukales hab Makhiyas tug tub Pasehus nov tug TSWV tej lug kws kuv qha puab

has tas, “Yog leejtwg nyob huv lub nroog nuav yuav tuag taag rua nav ntaaj nav rag lossis kev tshaib kev nqhes lossis kaab mob kev nkeeg. Tabsis yog leejtwg moog thawj cov Npanpiloos, nwg yuav dlim txujsa tsi raug luas tua.”
Kuv has rua puab tas, tug TSWV has le nuav: “Kuv yuav muab lub nroog nuav cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tej tubrog, hab puab yuav txeeb tau lub nroog.”

Cov numtswv txhaj moog has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Tsimnyog muab tug txivneej nuav tua povtseg, rua qhov nwg has tej lug nuav ua rua cov tubrog kws nyob huv lub nroog poob sab, hab nwg has ib yaam le ntawd rua cov tuabneeg kws tseem nyob huv lub nroog. Nwg tsi nrhav kev paab suavdlawg, nwg tsuas xaav kuas suavdlawg ntxhuv sab xwb.”
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas teb has tas, “ca le ua lawv le mej has! Mej yuav ua le caag rua nwg los nyob ntawm mej; kuv tsi txwv mej le.”

Yog le ntawd, cov numtswv txhaj tuaj coj kuv moog hab muab hlua dlauv kuv rua huv vaajntxwv tug tub Makhiyas lub qhov tshij kws nyob huv lub tshaav puam ntawm vaajntxwv lub loog. Lub qhov tshij ntawd tsi muaj dlej, tsuas muaj aav nkus xwb, kuv txhaj nyob tsau tsawv cov aav nkus ntawd.

Enpemelej kws yog tuabneeg Sudaas ua num nyob huv vaajntxwv lub loog nov has tas, puab coj kuv moog tso rua huv lub qhov tshij qhuav lawm. Thaus ntawd vaajntxwv tseem nrug nwg cov numtswv saablaaj ntawm lub Roojvaag Npeenyamees.
Yog le ntawd, Enpemelej txhaj moog qha rua vaajntxwv has tas,

“Vaajntxwv, tej kws cov tuabneeg nuav ua rua Yelemis, puab ua tsi yog lawm, puab coj nwg moog kaw rua huv lub qhov tshij qhuav, ces nwg yeej yuav tuag tshaib xwb, rua qhov tsi muaj mov nyob huv lub nroog nuav le lawm.”
Thaus vaajntxwv nov le ntawd, nwg kuas Enpemelej coj peb tug tuabneeg nrug nwg tuaj nqug kuv tawm huv lub qhov tshij ntawd lug ua ntej kuv tuag.
Enpemelej txhaj coj cov txivneej ntawd nrug nwg moog huv chaav tsev rau khoom huv vaajntxwv lub loog hab muab tej qub rig tsho ua hlua dlauv lug rua kuv.
Nwg has kuas kuv muab tej qub rig tsho ntawd xab kuv ob lub qhovtsus, txuj hlua txhaj tsi zawm kuv. Kuv txhaj ua le ntawd,
puab txhaj muab hlua nqug kuv tawm huv lub qhov tshij qhuav lug. Puab coj kuv rov lug nyob huv chaav kws muaj tubrog zuv huv vaajntxwv lub loog.
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kuas tuabneeg tuaj coj kuv moog cuag nwg ntawm lub Tuamtsev lub qhovrooj peb. Vaajntxwv has rua kuv tas, “Kuv yuav nug koj ib lus, koj ca le qha ncaaj rua kuv tsi xob zais le.”
Kuv teb nwg has tas, “Yog kuv qha tseeb rua koj, koj yuav muab kuv tua povtseg, hab yog kuv paab koj tuavxaam los koj yuav tsi noog kuv tej lug.”

Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas coglug tuabywv rua kuv has tas, “Vaajtswv yog tug muaj sa nyob, nwg pub peb muaj sa, nwg nyob sau pum, kuv yuav tsi tua koj lossis muab koj cob rua cov tuabneeg kws xaav muab koj tua povtseg.”

Kuv has rua Xedekiyas has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le nuav: yog koj yeem moog thawj tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tej tubrog, luas yuav tsi tua koj hab tsi hlawv lub nroog nuav. Koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg yuav muaj sa nyob,

tabsis yog koj tsi yeem moog thawj luas, ces kuv yuav muab lub nroog nuav cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos cov tubrog, puab yuav muab lub nroog nuav hlawv hab koj yuav tsiv tsi dlim ntawm puab le.”
Tabsis Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas teb has tas, “Kuv ntshai nyob tsaam cov Npanpiloos muab kuv cob rua peb cov tuabneeg Yudas kws tub tsiv moog thawj puab lawm tsimtxom xwb.”

Kuv has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg muab koj cob rua cov tuabneeg ntawd. Kuv thov kuas koj ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws kuv qha rua koj nuav, koj txhaj tsi raug luas tua hab nyob tso sab plhuav.
Tabsis yog koj tsi yeem moog thawj cov tubrog Npanpiloos, ces yuav muaj lawv le tug TSWV ua rua kuv ua ywgtoog pum lawm.

Huv zaaj ywgtoog ntawd, kuv pum tej quaspuj kws seem nyob huv tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Yudas lub loog raug luas coj moog cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tej tubrog. Koj ca le noog tej lug kws cov quaspuj sis thaam thaus puab taug kev has tas: ‘Vaajntxwv tej phoojywg tau dlaag ntxag nwg, puab yuam nwg ua lawv le puab sab xaav. Nwgnuav nwg ob txhais kutaw zum paag aav lawm, nwg tej phoojywg tsiv taag hab tso nwg tseg.’ ”

Tom qaab ntawd kuv has tas, “Luas yuav coj koj tej quaspuj tubse moog cob rua cov Npanpiloos, txawm yog koj los yuav tsi dlim le. Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos yuav nteg koj hab muab lub nroog nuav hlawv povtseg.”
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas teb has tas, “Koj tsi xob qha tej nuav rua leejtwg paub, luas txhaj tsi tua koj.
Yog cov numtswv paub has tas kuv tuaj nrug koj thaam, puab yuav nug koj saib wb tau sis thaam dlaabtsi. Puab yuav has tas, yog koj qha tej nuav rua puab, puab yuav tsi tua koj povtseg.
Koj ca le has rua puab tas, yog koj tuaj thov kuas kuv tsi xob xaa koj rov moog kaw kuas tuag rua tom tsev lojcuj xwb.”

Tom qaab ntawd cov numtswv txawm tuaj nrhav kuv hab nug kuv. Kuv qha rua puab lawv le kws vaajntxwv has rua kuv, ces puab txawm tsi nug kuv ntxiv lawm, rua qhov tsi muaj leejtwg nov zaaj kws wb sis thaam ntawd le.
Luas kaav kuv nruj nyob rua huv chaav kws muaj tubrog zuv huv vaajntxwv lub loog moog txug nub kws luas txeeb tau lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.
Thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau cuaj xyoos, lub kaum hli ntuj, Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos coj taagnrho nwg cov tubrog tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau kaum ib xyoos, nub xab cuag lub plaub hlis ntuj, luas tuaj tsoo tug ntsaa yeej moog rua huv lub nroog.

(Thaus luas txeeb tau lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm,  tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos cov numtswv txawm lug teeb chaw ua num rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Nruab Nraab. Cov numtswv ntawd yog: Nenkas Salexes, Xaankas Nenpaus, Xaxekhimes, hab muaj dlua ib tug Nenkas Salexes.)

Thaus Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas hab nwg cov tubrog pum tej xwm nuav, puab tawm tsiv thaus ib taag mo hlaa vaajntxwv lub vaaj moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws nyob kem nruab nraab ntawm ob txheej ntsaa yeej moog rua tom lub Haav Yauladees lawm.

Tabsis cov tubrog Npanpiloos caum puab qaab moog nteg tau Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas ntawm lub taj nraag kws nyob ze lub nroog Yelikaus. Puab coj nwg moog cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales ntawm lub nroog Lilas kws nyob huv cheebtsaam Hamas, hab Nenpukajnexales txav txim rua Xedekiyas qhov ntawd.
Nenpukajnexales muab Xedekiyas cov tub tua taabmeeg Xedekiyas huv lub nroog Lilas, hab nwg kuas luas muab cov Yudas tej numtswv tua huv tuabsi.
Tom qaab ntawd nwg muab Xedekiyas ob lub qhovmuag kaus povtseg hab muab saw hlau khi Xedekiyas caab moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Thaus ntawd cov tubrog Npanpiloos hlawv Xedekiyas lub loog hab cov pejxeem tej vaaj tse kub nyab taag, hab tsoo lub nroog Yeluxalees tug ntsaa yeej pob taag.
Thaus kawg, Nenpuxaladaas kws yog tug thawj tubrog txawm nteg cov tuabneeg kws seem nyob huv lub nroog hab cov tuabneeg kws lug thawj nwg, coj moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Nwg tseg cov tuabneeg txomnyem kws tsi muaj laj teb nyob huv tebchaws Yudas, nwg muab tej vaaj txiv maab hab tej laj teb faib rua puab.
Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kuas Nenpuxaladaas kws yog nwg tug thawj tubrog, has rua cov tubrog has tas,
“Mej ca le moog nrhav kuas tau Yelemis hab ua zoo tu nwg. Mej tsi xob ua phem rua nwg. Yog nwg xaav tau dlaabtsi, mej ca le muab rua nwg.”
Yog le ntawd, Nenpuxaladaas kws yog tug thawj tubrog txhaj nrug Nenpusanpas kws yog tug numtswv luj, Nenkas Xalexes hab lwm tug kws yog cov Npanpiloos tug vaajntxwv cov numtswv

tuaj tso kuv tawm huv chaav kws muaj tubrog zuv huv vaajntxwv lub loog lug. Puab tso kuv rua Ahikas tug tub Nkedaliyas kws yog Safaas tug xeebntxwv coj kuv moog kuas txug tsev. Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj tau nrug kuv cov tuabneeg nyob ua ke.
Thaus kuv tseem raug kaw rua huv chaav kws muaj tubrog zuv huv vaajntxwv lub loog, tug TSWV kuas kuv

moog has rua Enpemelej kws yog tuabneeg Sudaas has tas, tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le nuav tas: “Kuv yuav ua kuas lub nroog nuav puamtsuaj lawv le kuv tau has tseg lawm, tsi yog ua kuas vaammeej, koj yuav pum ntsoov lub nroog nuav puamtsuaj.
Tabsis nub ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav cawm koj, hab yuav tsi muab koj cob rua cov tuabneeg kws koj ntshai.
Kuv yuav cawm koj kuas dlim, koj yuav tsi raug nav ntaaj nav rag tuag, tabsis koj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob, rua qhov koj tso sab rua kuv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tom qaab Nenpuxaladaas kws yog tug thawj tubrog tso kuv tawm huv Lamas. Luas muab saw hlau khi kuv coj nrug cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov Yudas kws raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos.
Tug thawj tubrog coj kuv moog rua ib caag hab has rua kuv tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv ua rua lub tebchaws nuav puamtsuaj taag,
nwgnuav nwg ua lawv le nwg tau has tseg lawm. Tej nuav tshwmsim tub yog vim koj cov tuabneeg ua txhum rua tug TSWV hab tsi noog nwg lug.

Nwgnuav kuv yuav dlaws txuj saw hlau kws khi koj ob txhais teg hab tso koj. Yog koj xaav nrug kuv moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos los tau, kuv yuav saib hab tu koj. Tabsis yog koj tsi xaav nrug kuv moog los tau, muab lub tebchaws nuav rua koj xaiv, koj yuav moog nyob qhov twg los tau lawv le koj nyam.”

Thaus kuv tseem tsi tau teb,  Nenpuxaladaas has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le moog nrug Ahikas tug tub Nkedaliyas kws yog Safaas tug xeebntxwv nyob, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tsaa nwg ua tswvxeev saib tej nroog huv tebchaws Yudas. Koj ca le moog nrug nwg hab cov pejxeem nyob lossis koj xaav moog nyob qhov twg los nyob ntawm koj sab nyam.” Nwg muab ib qhov khoom hab zaub mov noj rua kuv, hab tso kuv rov lug lawm.
Kuv txhaj moog nrug Nkedaliyas hab cov pejxeem kws seem nyob huv lub nroog Mixepas huv lub tebchaws.

Cov Yudas cov numtswv hab cov tubrog qee leej kws tsi kaam moog thawj cov Npanpiloos nov has tas, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tsaa Nkedaliyas kws yog Ahikas tug tub ua tswvxeev kaav lub tebchaws hab kaav cov tuabneeg txomnyem kws tsi raug nteg coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos, puab txhaj tsi kaam zwm rua cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos.

Yog le ntawd, Nethaniyas tug tub Yisamayees, Kaleyas tug tub Yauhanaas, Tahumes tug tub Xelayas, Efayis cov tub kws nyob huv lub nroog Netaufas hab Yexaniyas kws nyob huv Ma-akas, nrug puab cov tuabneeg moog cuag Nkedaliyas huv lub nroog Mixepas.

Nkedaliyas has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le lug thawj cov Npanpiloos, tsi xob ntshai. Mej ca le nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav hab zwm rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos, mej txhaj yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.

Kuv yuav nyob huv Mixepas nuav, hab thaus cov Npanpiloos tuaj, kuv yuav ua tug sawv cev mej suavdlawg. Mej ca le rov moog nyob huv mej tej zog, sau tej cawv txiv maab, tej txiv maab txiv ntoo hab roj txiv ntoo lug ca rua huv txhaab hab ntim rua huv hub.”

Thaus cov Yudas kws nyob huv tebchaws Mau-am, Amoos, Edoos hab cov kws nyob lwm tebchaws nov has tas, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tso cai rua cov Yudas ibtxha nyob huv tebchaws Yudas, hab nwg tsaa Nkedaliyas ua tug tswvxeev kaav puab.

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj rov huv tej tebchaws kws puab raug ntab moog nyob rov lug rua huv tebchaws Yudas. Puab moog cuag Nkedaliyas huv Mixepas. Puab sau tau cawv txiv maab hab txiv maab txiv ntoo ntau kawg le.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yauhanaas hab cov thawj tubrog kws tsi kaam moog thawj cov Npanpiloos tuaj cuag Nkedaliyas huv Mixepas,
puab has rua nwg tas, “Koj puas paub has tas, Vaajntxwv Npalis kws kaav tebchaws Amoos khaiv Yisamayees tuaj tua koj?” Tabsis Nkedaliyas tsi ntseeg tej lug kws puab has.

Yauhanaas moog has tuabywv rua Nkedaliyas has tas, “Thov ca kuv moog muab Yisamayees tua povtseg, tsi pub kuas leejtwg paub. Vim le caag yuav ca nwg tuaj tua koj? Yog ua le ntawd yuav ua rua cov Yudas kws lug nrug koj nyob tawg moog nyob ua saab ua sua, hab yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg kws seem nyob huv tebchaws Yudas raug kev puamtsuaj.”
Tabsis Nkedaliyas teb has tas, “Koj tsi xob ua le ntawd, tej kws koj has txug Yisamayees ntawd tsi muaj tseeb.”

Xyoo ntawd thaus lub xyaa hli ntuj, Nethaniyas tug tub Yisamayees kws yog Elisamas tug xeebntxwv, nwg yog caajceg vaajntxwv hab yog vaajntxwv ib tug numtswv luj, nwg txawm coj kaum leej tubrog tuaj cuag Nkedaliyas huv Mixepas. Thaus puab taabtom noj mov ua ke,
Yisamayees hab nwg kaum leej tubrog txawm rhu puab tej ntaaj tua Nkedaliyas tuag.
Yisamayees tseem tua cov Yixalayees txhua tug kws nrug Nkedaliyas nyob huv Mixepas hab cov tubrog Npanpiloos kws tuaj nyob huv tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Nub tom qaab, thaus kws tsi tau muaj tuabneeg paub has tas, Nkedaliyas raug tua tuag,

muaj yim caum leej txivneej tuaj huv Sekhees, Silaus, hab Xamalis tuaj txug. Puab chais puab tej fwjtxwv, dlua puab tej rig tsho hab puab rov hlais puab lub cev. Puab coj qoobloo hab moov tshuaj tsw qaab moog fij huv lub Tuamtsev.
Ces Yisamayees txawm ua txuj tsaa suab hlo quaj tawm huv Mixepas tuaj tog puab, thaus nwg pum dlheev puab nwg has rua puab tas, “Thov mej lug saib Nkedaliyas.”
Thaus puab moog txug huv lub nroog lawm, Yisamayees hab nwg cov tubrog txawm muab puab tua hab coj moog pov rua huv qhov tshij.

Tabsis puab paab ntawd muaj kaum leej has rua Yisamayees has tas, “Thov koj tsi xob tua peb, peb muaj qeb, nplej, roj txiv ntoo hab zib ntaab nyob huv peb tej teb.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tsi tua puab.

Lub qhov tshij kws Yisamayees muab cov tuabneeg kws nwg tua pov rua huv mas luj heev  kws yog Vaajntxwv Axas khawb thaus lub sijhawm cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Npasaas tuaj tua nwg. Yisamayees muab cov tuabneeg kws nwg tua pov puv nkaus rua huv lub qhov tshij ntawd.

Yisamayees nteg vaajntxwv cov ntxhais hab taagnrho cov pejxeem kws tug thawj tubrog Nenpuxaladaas tseg rua Nkedaliyas saib nyob huv Mixepas. Yisamayees coj cov tuabneeg kws nwg nteg ntawd moog rua tebchaws Amoos lawm.
Thaus Yauhanaas hab cov thawj tubrog kws nrug nwg nov tej xwm kws Yisamayees tua tuabneeg ntawd,
puab txawm coj puab cov tubrog moog caum cuag Yisamayees rua ntawm lub paag dlej luj huv Nkinpe-oos.
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws Yisamayees nteg pum Yauhanaas hab cov thawj tubrog kws nrug nwg moog ntawd, puab zoo sab heev,
hab puab dlha moog rua ntawm Yauhanaas.
Tabsis Yisamayees hab nwg yim leej tubrog tsiv dlim moog rua tebchaws Amoos lawm, Yauhanaas nteg tsi tau le.

Yauhanaas hab cov thawj tubrog kws nrug nwg moog txhaj coj cov tuabneeg kws Yisamayees nteg huv Mixepas moog tom qaab kws Nkedaliyas raug tua tuag lawm, tsi has cov tubrog, cov quaspuj mivnyuas hab cov kws ua num huv vaajntxwv lub loog rov qaab huv Nkinpe-oos lug.

Puab ntshai cov Npanpiloos heev rua qhov Yisamayees muab Nkedaliyas tug kws cov Npanpiloos tug vaajntxwv tsaa ua tswvxeev kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tua tuag lawm. Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, kuas dlim ntawm cov Npanpiloos. Thaus puab taug kev moog, puab moog su rua ntawm Khihas kws nyob ze lub nroog Npelehees.
Kale-as tug tub Yauhanaas hab Hausaiyas tug tub Axaliyas,  hab cov thawj tubrog txhua tug nrug cov pejxeem suavdlawg, tsi has tug hlub tug yau tuaj

has rua kuv tas, “Thov koj noog peb tej lug thov! Koj ca le thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv paab peb cov kws seem nyob ntawm nuav. Yaav taag lug peb muaj coob, tabsis nwgnuav peb tshuav tsawg heev lawv le koj pum nuav lawm xwb.
Koj thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv qha rua peb saib peb yuav moog qhov twg hab peb yuav ua le caag?”
Kuv teb puab has tas, “Kuv pum zoo. Kuv yuav thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lawv le mej tej lug thov, saib nwg teb le caag, kuv maam le qha rua mej paub. Kuv yuav tsi zais ib lus le.”
Puab has rua kuv tas, “Thov tug TSWV ua timkhawv ncaaj hab tseeb rua peb, yog peb tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm rua peb.
Txawm yog tej lug teb kws peb kuas koj thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv yuav hum peb sab hab tsi hum los peb yuav noog nwg lug. Yog has tas, peb noog nwg lug, peb yuav noj qaab nyob zoo.”
Kaum nub tom qaab tug TSWV has rua kuv;
yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj hu Yauhanaas hab cov thawj tubrog kws nrug nwg nyob hab cov pejxeem tuaj.
Kuv has rua puab tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws mej kuas kuv thov, nwg has tas,

‘Yog mej txaus sab nyob huv tebchaws nuav, kuv yuav tsi rhuav mej, tabsis kuv yuav paab kuas mej vaammeej; kuv yuav cog mej kuas ruaj hab tsi dlob mej povtseg. Txujkev puamtsuaj kws kuv tso lug raug mej, ua rua kuv tu sab kawg le.
Mej tsi xob ntshai tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos. Kuv yuav nrug nraim mej hab yuav paab mej kuas dlim ntawm nwg lub fwjchim.
Rua qhov kuv yog tug muaj txujkev hlub, kuv yuav ua kuas nwg muaj sab hlub mej hab tso mej rov moog tsev. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.’

“Tabsis mej cov kws tseem nyob huv tebchaws Yudas, mej yuavtsum noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug, hab txaus sab nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav. Mej tsi xob has tas, ‘Peb yuav moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, kuas peb tsi pum kev tsuv kev rog lossis tsi nov suab sis ntaus sis tua lossis tsi raug kev tshaib kev nqhes.’ Yog mej has le nuav, tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, ‘Yog mej txav txim sab moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv,
tej kev tsuv kev rog kws mej ntshai yuav lug raug mej, hab kev tshaib kev nqhes kws mej txhawj yuav caum tau mej, mej yuav tuag taag rua nraag tebchaws Iziv.

Txhua tug kws txav txim sab tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, yuav tuag taag rua nav ntaaj nav rag lossis kev tshaib kev nqhes lossis kaab mob kev nkeeg. Puab yuav tsi muaj ib tug tsiv dlim txujkev puamtsuaj kws kuv tso lug rua puab ntawd le.’

“Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Kuv txujkev chim hab npautawg tau phwj tuaj raug cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees le caag, ces kuv txujkev chim hab npautawg yuav phwj lug raug mej thaus mej tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv ib yaam le ntawd, mej yuav raug txobthuam hab luas yuav tuav mej lub npe foom tsi zoo, luas yuav ntshai hab tsi xaav pum mej; hab mej yuav tsi tau rov lug pum lub tebchaws nuav ntxiv le lawm.’ ”
Kuv has ntxiv tas, “Tug TSWV kuas mej cov kws seem nyob huv tebchaws Yudas nuav, tsi xob tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv. Yog le ntawd, nub nua kuv ntuag mej
has tas, mej tau ua yuam kev lawm. Mej kuas kuv thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv paab mej, hab mej coglug has tas, mej yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm.
Nwgnuav kuv tub qha txhua yaam rua mej lawm, tabsis mej tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws nwg khaiv kuv tuaj qha rua mej nuav le.
Yog le ntawd kuas mej ncu has tas, mej yuav raug nav ntaaj nav rag, kev tshaib kev nqhes hab kaab mob kev nkeeg tuag taag rua huv lub tebchaws kws mej xaav moog nyob ntawd.”
Thaus kuv pav tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tej lug txhua yaam kws nwg khaiv kuv moog qha rua puab taag.

Ces Axaliyas kws yog Hausaiyas tug tub, Kaleyas tug tub Yauhanaas, hab cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb txawm has rua kuv tas, “Koj dlaag xwb. Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv yeej tsi tau khaiv koj tuaj has kuas peb tsi xob tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv.
Yeej yog Neliyas tug tub Npalus rau tswvyim rua koj tuaj tawmtsaam peb, muab peb cob rua cov Npanpiloos kuas tua peb lossis nteg peb coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos xwb.”
Yog le ntawd, tsi has Yauhanaas lossis cov thawj tubrog lossis cov pejxeem los yeej tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm kuas nyob tuabywv huv lub tebchaws Yudas le.

Ces Yauhanaas hab cov thawj tubrog txhaj coj cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub tebchaws Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws raug ntab tawm moog lwm tebchaws rov qaab lug ntawd huv tuabsi moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm:
tsi has cov txivneej, tej quaspuj mivnyuas, vaajntxwv cov ntxhais, cov tuabneeg kws tug thawj tubrog Nenpuxaladaas tso rua Nkedaliyas saib, coj Npalus hab kuv nrug puab moog.
Puab tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm, puab moog nyob rua nraag tebchaws Iziv hab moog nyob rua huv lub nroog Tapahes.
Thaus peb nyob ntawm Tapahes, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,

“Koj ca le muab ib cov pobzeb luj lug faus rua huv plawv txujkev kws pua roj maab  kws moog rua ntawm Vaajntxwv Falaus lub loog kws nyob huv lub nroog Tapahes. Koj ua le nuav rua cov Yudas saib ntsoov.

Koj qha rua puab has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, yuav coj kuv tug tubkhai kws yog Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj rua ntawm thaaj chaw nuav, hab nwg  yuav teeb nwg lub zwmtxwv hab tsaa nwg lub tsevntaub rua sau cov pobzeb kws koj  faus nuav.

Nenpukajnexales yuav tuaj tua yeej lub tebchaws Iziv, cov tuabneeg kws teem tseg kuas tuag rua kaab mob kev nkeeg, yuav tuag rua kaab mob kev nkeeg, cov kws teem tseg kuas raug nteg, yuav raug luas nteg hab cov kws teem tseg kuas tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag.

Kuv yuav hlawv cov Iziv tej tuamtsev kws puab teev puab tej vaajtswv, hab tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos yuav muab puab tej vaajtswv hlawv lossis coj moog. Tug yug yaaj ntxhua nwg tej rig kuas tuv tuag taag le caag, ces tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos yuav tuaj muab lub tebchaws Iziv nuav rhuav kuas dlu lug le ntawd, hab nwg yuav rov kaaj sab lug moog lawm.
Nwg yuav rhuav tej ncej zeb tseemceeb ntawm lub nroog Heli-aupulis huv tebchaws Iziv, hab hlawv tej tuamtsev kws cov Iziv pe puab tej vaajtswv povtseg.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv txug cov Yudas kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv huv lub nroog Midaules, lub nroog Tapahes, lub nroog Meefis hab cov nroog kws nyob rua saab qaabteb huv tebchaws Iziv.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Mej tub pum tej kev puamtsuaj kws kuv tso lug raug lub nroog Yeluxalees hab tej nroog kws nyob huv tebchaws Yudas lawm. Txawm yog nwgnuav los tseem puag taag hab tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob,

rua qhov cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej nroog ntawd ua kev phem kev qas ua rua kuv chim. Puab tua tsaj hlawv fij rua luas tej vaajtswv hab pe tej vaajtswv kws tsi has puab lossis mej hab mej cov yawmkoob tsi tau pe dlua le.
Kuv yeej tso kuv cov tubkhai kws yog cov cevlug qha mej ua ntu zug, kuas mej tsi xob ua tej kev phem kev qas kws kuv ntxub ntawd.
Tabsis mej tsi quavntsej lossis tsi noog kuv tej lug. Mej tsi tso mej tej kev phem kev qas lossis kev tua tsaj hlawv fij rua luas tej vaajtswv tseg le.

Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj laub kuv txujkev chim hab npautawg lug rua tej nroog huv tebchaws Yudas hab tej kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab tso suavtawg hlawv tej ntawd kuas kub nyab taag. Tej nroog ntawd txhaj puamtsuaj taag nyob qhuav nkuag lug txug naj nub nua.

“Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus nug mej le nuav: vim le caag mej pheej ua tej kev phem kev qas ntawd. Puas yog mej xaav ca cov txivneej, cov quaspuj, cov hluas hab cov mivnyuas mog raug kev puamtsuaj kuas tsi seem ib tug le?

Vim le caag mej pheej pe mlom hab tua tsaj hlawv fij rua luas tej vaajtswv huv tebchaws Iziv kws mej lug nyob ua rua kuv chim? Puas yog mej ua le nuav kuas mej raug kev puamtsuaj rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob nplajteb txobthuam hab tuav mej lub npe foom tsi zoo?

Mej tsi ncu txug tej kev phem kev qas kws mej cov yawmkoob, cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Yudas hab puab cov quaspuj, mej hab mej tej quaspuj tau ua nyob huv tebchaws Yudas hab ntawm tej kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm los?
Tabsis mej yeej tsi txu mej lub fwjchim lug txug naj nub nwgnuav le. Mej tsi fwm kuv lossis ua mej lub neej lawv le tej kevcai kws kuv muab cob rua mej hab mej cov yawmkoob lawm.
“Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, yuav tawmtsaam mej hab rhuav kuas cov Yudas puamtsuaj.

Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Yudas kws txav txim sab tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, tsi has tug hlub tug yau raug puamtsuaj taag. Puab yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag lossis kev tshaib kev nqhes. Luas yuav ntshai puab, txobthuam puab hab tuav puab lub npe foom tsi zoo.
Kuv yuav rau txim rua txhua tug kws lug nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, ib yaam le kuv tso kev tsuv kev rog, kev tshaib kev nqhes hab kaab mob kev nkeeg lug rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees,

tsi pub cov Yudas kws seem hab tsiv lug nyob huv tebchaws Iziv tsiv dlim le. Puab yuav tsi muaj ib tug tau rov moog rua tebchaws Yudas kws puab xaav rov moog nyob. Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tau rov moog nyob, tsuas tshwj cov kws raug luas nteg moog lawm xwb txhaj tau rov moog.”

Cov txivneej kws paub has tas, puab cov quaspuj tua tsaj hlawv fij rua luas tej vaajtswv hab cov quaspuj kws sawv ntawd, hab cov quaspuj Yudas kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv saab qaabteb, ua ib paab coob heev tuaj has rua kuv tas,
“Peb tsi leeg paub tej lug kws koj tuav tug TSWV lub npe tuaj has rua peb.

Peb yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le peb tau has lawm tas peb yuav ua. Peb yuav tua tsaj hlawv fij rua peb tug vaajtswv kws yog Nam Vaajntxwv Ntuj, hab yuav laub cawv txiv maab fij rua nwg ib yaam le peb cov yawmkoob, peb cov vaajntxwv hab peb cov thawjcoj ibtxwm ua huv cov Yudas tej nroog hab ntawm tej kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Ces peb yuav muaj zaub mov nplua mag. Peb yuav vaammeej hab tsi txomnyem le.

Tabsis txij thaus peb tseg tsi tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tug Nam Vaajntxwv Ntuj, hab tsi laub cawv txiv maab fij rua nwg lawm, ces peb tsi muaj dlaabtsi hab peb cov tuabneeg tuag taag rua nav ntaaj nav rag hab kev tshaib kev nqhes lawm.”

Cov quaspuj has ntxiv tas, “Thaus peb puab ncuav ci, peb puab tej lub zoo le tug Nam Vaajntxwv Ntuj, tua tsaj hlawv fij rua nwg hab laub cawv txiv maab fij rua nwg los peb tej quasyawg yeej pum zoo peb ua le ntawd!”
Kuv txhaj has rua cov txivneej hab cov quaspuj kws tuaj has le ntawd rua kuv tas,

“Tej khoom kws mej, mej cov yawmkoob, mej cov vaajntxwv, mej cov thawjcoj hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Yudas coj tuaj fij rua huv cov Yudas tej nroog hab ntawm tej kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej xaav has tas, tug TSWV tsi paub lossis tsi ncu qaab tej ntawd lawm nua los?

Mej lub tebchaws puamtsuaj tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob lug txug naj nub nua, tub yog vim tug TSWV tsi xaav saib tej kev phem kev qas hab kev nkauj kev nraug kws mej ua. Luas yuav ntshai mej, txobthuam mej hab tuav mej lub npe foom tsi zoo.
Tej kev puamtsuaj nuav lug raug mej, vim mej tua tsaj hlawv fij rua luas tej vaajtswv, hab ua txhum rua tug TSWV hab tsi noog nwg tej lug saamfwm.”

Kuv qha rua mej hab cov quaspuj suavdlawg, kuas mej paub tej kws tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has rua cov Yudas kws tseem nyob huv tebchaws Iziv has tas, “Mej hab mej tej quaspuj tau coglug rua Nam Vaajntxwv Ntuj lawm. Mej coglug has tas, mej yuav fij khoom rua nwg, hab laub cawv txiv maab fij rua nwg, mej tub ua lawv le mej tej lug cog tseg rua nwg. Tau lawm lauj! Ca le ceev mej tej lug cog tseg hab ua le ntawd rua nwg!

Tabsis mej ca le noog kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tuav kuv lub npe coglug rua mej cov Yixalayees kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv nuav: kuv yuav tsi pub mej tuav kuv lub npe coglug has tas, ‘Kuv tuav tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob hab kaav ib puas tsaav yaam lub npe coglug!’

Kuv yuav saib ntsoov tsi pub kuas mej vaammeej, tabsis yuav ca kuas mej puamtsuaj. Mej yuav tuag taag, tsi has tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag lossis tuag rua kaab mob kev nkeeg, moog txug nub kws mej tsi tshuav ib tug le.

Tabsis mej cov qee leej yuav dlim tsi tuag rua huv tebchaws Iziv hab yuav tau rov moog rua peg tebchaws Yudas. Cov kws dlim ntawd yuav paub has tas leejtwg tej lug txhaj yog lug tseeb. Kuv tej lug lossis puab tej.

Kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav muab ib yaam ua cim lug qha rua mej paub has tas, kuv yuav rau txim rua mej hab ua kuas mej puamtsuaj rua ntawm qhov chaw nuav, mej txhaj paub has tas muaj tseeb lawv le kuv tej lug tag.

Kuv yuav muab Falaus Haufelas kws kaav tebchaws Iziv cob rua nwg cov yeebncuab kws xaav muab nwg tua povtseg, ib yaam le kuv muab Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos kws yog Xedekiyas tug yeebncuab kws xaav muab nwg tua povtseg.”
Tom qaab kws Yauxiyas tug tub Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau plaub xyoos lawm, kuv pav tug TSWV tej lug txhua lu rua Neliyas tug tub Npalus sau rua huv thooj ntawv.
Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, “Npalus,
Koj has tas, ‘Kuv tiv tsi taug lawm! Kuv tub raug kev txomnyem los tug TSWV tseem tsub kev nyuaj sab ntxiv rua kuv. Kuv naj nub quaj qaug zug taag tsi tau su le.’
“Tabsis kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav muab tej kws kuv ua rhuav hab dlob tej kws kuv cog povtseg. Kuv yuav ua le ntawd kuas thoob plawg lub nplajteb.

Koj pheej yuav nrhav kev tau zoo rua koj xwb nua los? Koj tsi xob ua le ntawd, kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug tuabneeg nplajteb; tabsis txawm yog koj nyob qhov twg los koj yuav dlim hab tau txujsa. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv txug tej tsaav tuabneeg,

yog xub has txug cov Iziv. Tug TSWV has txug Falaus Nekaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv cov tubrog kws Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj tua yeej huv lub nroog Kakhemis kws nyob ze ntawm tug Dlej Efalates, yog xyoo plaub kws Yehauyakhees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas:
“Cov Iziv cov thawj tubrog qw has tas, ‘Ca le npaaj mej tej thaiv nav ntaaj kuas txhij moog ntaus rog!
Muab eeb pem rua mej tej neeg hab caij; ca le ntoo mom hlau hab moog sawv ua tej kaab! Huv mej tej muv hab naav mej tej tsho hlau!’ ”
Tabsis tug TSWV nug has tas, “Kuv pum dlaabtsi? Puab ntshai hab thim rov qaab; puab cov tubrog raug tua ua rua puab ntshai hab tsiv tsi saib qaab le.
Txawm yog cov kws dlha ceev heev los yeej tsiv tsi dlhau, cov tubrog los tsiv tsi dlim. Puab dlawm hab qaug taag rua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates saab qaumteb.
Leejtwg txhaj yuav sawv taug nphau nphwv ib yaam le tug Dlej Niles, hab ib yaam le tug dlej kws fuam puv nkaus ntug?

Tub yog Iziv sawv nphau quas nphwv ib yaam le tug Dlej Niles, hab ib yaam le tug dlej kws fuam puv nkaus ntug. Iziv has tas, ‘Kuv yuav fuam hab nyaab lub nplajteb; kuv yuav rhuav tej nroog hab tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv kuas puamtsuaj taag.
Tej neeg ca le dlha moog hab tej tsheb ca le ndlog! Ca le txhij cov Sudaas hab cov Linpias tej tubrog kws nqaa tej thaiv nav ntaaj, hab cov Lidias tej tubrog kws txawj tua neevnti moog.’ ”

Nub nua yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus nub: Nub nua nwg yuav ua pauj; nub nua nwg yuav rau txim rua nwg cov yeebncuab nwg raab ntaaj yuav noj puab tej nqaj kuas tsau, hab haus puab tej ntshaav kuas txaus sab. Nub nua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus muab cov kws nwg tua tuag lawm coj moog fij rua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates saab qaumteb.
Cov Iziv, mej ca le moog rua peg Nkile-as hab nrhav tshuaj rua mej! Mej tej tshuaj tsi zoo hab khu tsi tau mej tej mob.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg nov mej tej kev txaajmuag; hab txhua tug nov mej quaj. Tej tubrog sis dlawm qaug rua huv aav.
Thaus Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj tua tebchaws Iziv, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Koj ca le moog qha rua lub nroog Midaules, lub nroog Meefis hab lub nroog Tapahes huv tebchaws Iziv has tas, ‘Mej ca le npaaj sis tua, rua qhov yuav muaj kev tsuv kev rog tuaj ua kuas mej puamtsuaj.
Vim le caag mej tug vaajtswv Anpis kws muaj fwjchim qaug lawm? Tub yog tug TSWV muab tsoo tawg taag lawm!’
Mej cov tubrog dlawm qaug taag lawm. Mej ib leeg has rua ib leeg tas, ‘Peb ca le rov moog tsev, moog cuag peb cov tuabneeg, peb txhaj dlim yeebncuab tej nav ntaaj nav rag!’
“Puab tis dlua ib lub npe tshab rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv hu ua, ‘Tug kws ua tsi tau dlaabtsi, ca nwg lub sijhawm dlhau moog.’

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus kws yog Vaajntxwv, hab kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob. Lub Roob Tanpaus sawv sab tshaaj tej hauv roob hab lub Roob Kalemees sawv sab tshaaj havtxwv le caag, tug kws yuav tuaj tawmtsaam mej muaj zug npaum le ntawd.
Cov Iziv, mej ca le sawbsim, luas yuav tuaj nteg mej moog, Meefis yuav ua suabpuam tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob.
Iziv zoo ib yaam le tug xyuas nyuj kws zoo nkauj heev, tabsis ib tug yoov nyuj yuav tuaj saab qaumteb tuaj tum nwg.

Txawm yog tej tubrog kws nwg ndlav tuaj paab nwg los tsuas zoo ib yaam le tug xyuas nyuj ntawd. Puab tiv tsi taug tej kev sis ntaus sis tua; puab thim tsiv rov qaab. Nub kws puab raug kev puamtsuaj tub lug txug lawm, yog nub kws puab raug txav txim.
Thaus yeebncuab cov tubrog tuaj ze lawm, cov Iziv tsiv nrov xuav ib yaam le naab ndlaug, yeebncuab nqaa taus tuaj tua cov Iziv ib yaam le ntuv ntoo
hab ib yaam le luas ntuv zoov. Yeebncuab cov tubrog coob heev yeej suav tsi txheeb le; puab cov tubrog coob tshaaj tej kooj txomfaav.
Cov Iziv raug kev txaajmuag; puab yuav swb cov tuabneeg kws tuaj saab qaumteb tuaj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Kuv yuav rau txim rua Amoos kws yog Thenpes tug vaajntxwv, cov Iziv, puab tej vaajtswv hab puab tej vaajntxwv. Kuv muab Falaus kws kaav tebchaws Iziv hab txhua tug kws tuaj nwg tog

cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos hab cov tubrog kws xaav muab nwg tua povtseg. Tom qaab ntawd, yuav muaj tuabneeg rov qaab lug nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, ib yaam le yaav taag lug lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej tsi xob ntshai, tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, mej tsi xob txhawj! Kuv yuav paab mej cov kws luas nteg moog nyob rua lub tebchaws kws dleb heev. Mej yuav tau rov lug tsev hab nyob kaaj sab lug; mej yuav nyob tso sab lug hab tsi muaj leejtwg ua rua mej ntshai.

Kuv yuav lug cuag mej hab cawm mej. Kuv yuav rhuav txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv ntab mej moog nrug nyob kuas puamtsuaj, tabsis kuv yuav tsi ca kuas mej puamtsuaj. Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej, tabsis thaus kuv rau txim rua mej, kuv yuav ua ncaaj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Ua ntej Falaus tuaj tua lub nroog Nkaxas, tug TSWV has rua kuv txug cov Filitees.

Nwg has tas, “Mej saib, dlej yuav nphau nphwv saab qaumteb tuaj hab yuav kuav ib yaam le dlej nyaab. Dlej yuav nyaab puv nkaus lub tebchaws hab txhua yaam, yuav nyaab tej nroog hab tej tuabneeg huv tuabsi. Tej tuabneeg yuav quaj qw thov kev paab, tuabneeg thoob nplajteb txhua tug yuav quaj qhuav sab qhawv.
Puab yuav nov tej suab neeg dlha nrov, tej tsheb neeg caij tua rog hab tej lug tsheb nrov dloog dlaj. Tej nam tej txiv yuav tsiv tsi tig saib puab tej mivnyuas; puab tej npaab yuav tsaug dlai vag.

Tub txug lub sijhawm kws rhuav cov Filitees kuas puamtsuaj lawm, kuv yuav txav lub nroog Tiles hab lub nroog Xidoos kev paab cov Filitees kws seem. Rua qhov kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav rhuav cov Filitees kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv Keletes kuas puamtsuaj.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Nkaxas yuav quaj ntsuag, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Asekeloos puamtsuaj taag lawm. Cov Filitees yuav quaj ntsuag moog txug thaus twg?
Mej ca le qw has tas, ‘Tug TSWV raab ntaaj! Thaus twg koj maam le tseg tsi tua tuabneeg? Ca le rov moog rua huv koj lub naab hab su!’
Tabsis yuav ua le caag raab ntaaj txhaj su tau thaus kuv tseem kuas nwg ua num? Kuv saamfwm kuas nwg tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Asekeloos hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv.”

Ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has txug lub tebchaws Mau-am: “Cov tuabneeg huv Nenpaus raug puamtsuaj, rua qhov puab tej nroog tub pob puag taag lawm! Luas txeeb tau lub nroog Kili-athayees, tsoo nwg tej chaw faajxwm pob taag, hab nwg cov pejxeem poob ntsejmuag kawg le;

Mau-am lub koob meej kws nchaa moo lug pluj lawm, yeebncuab tub tuaj txeeb tau lub nroog Hesenpoos, puab yuav rhuav lub tebchaws Mau-am kuas puamtsuaj taag. Lub nroog Mamees los yuav puamtsuaj ib yaam nkaus, rua qhov yuav muaj tubrog tuaj tawmtsaam nwg.
Cov tuabneeg huv Haulunayees yuav quaj qw has tas: ‘Kev nruj tsiv! Kev puamtsuaj!’
“Mau-am tub raug puamtsuaj taag lawm; ca le noog cov mivnyuas yau tej suab quaj.
Nov puab tej suab seev taug kev moog rua peg lub nroog Luhis; tej suab quaj txomnyem taug kev moog rua nraag lub nroog Haulunayees.
Puab has tas, ‘Ca le tsiv tag kuas mej dlim! Dlha ib yaam le tug neeg luav qus kws nyob tom taj suabpuam!’
“Mau-am, koj ca sab rua koj tug zug hab koj txujkev npluanuj, tabsis nwgnuav koj tub swb lawm; koj tug mlom Khemaus yuav raug luas coj nrug nwg cov numtswv hab cov povthawj moog rua lwm lub tebchaws.
Tsi muaj ib lub nroog yuav dlim kev puamtsuaj le, tej haav hab tej taj nraag puavleej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj taag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Ca le muab ib dlaim laag zeb npug Mau-am; rua qhov nwg tub yuav puamtsuaj. Nwg tej nroog los yuav puamtsuaj taag, tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob le lawm.”
(Tug kws tsi ua tug TSWV teg num ntawm lub sab dlawb paug, yuav raug foom tsi zoo! Tug kws tsi tua cov Mau-am lawv le tug TSWV has, tug ntawd yuav raug foom tsi zoo!)

Tug TSWV has tas, “Mau-am yeej ibtxwm tau zoo nyob tso sab plhuav, tsi raug luas nteg moog rua lwm lub tebchaws. Mau-am zoo ib yaam le cov cawv txiv maab kws luas tshwj tseg tsi muab theej ib lub hub rua ib lub. Cov cawv txiv maab tseem qaab hab tsw qaab ntxag le qub.

“Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv yuav tso tuabneeg tuaj muab Mau-am laub povtseg ib yaam le laub cawv txiv maab. Puab yuav muab cov cawv txiv maab laub povtseg kuas tej hub khoob lug ca, hab yuav muab tej hub tsoo kuas tawg taag.
Ces cov Mau-am yuav poob ntsejmuag vim puab tug vaajtswv Khemaus ib yaam le cov Yixalayees poob ntsejmuag vim tug vaajtswv Npethes kws puab ca sab rua.
“Cov tuabneeg Mau-am, vim le caag mej khaav has tas mej cov tubrog ua tau hab muaj sab tawv ntaus rog?”

Mau-am hab nwg tej nroog tub raug puamtsuaj taag; nwg tej tub hluas kws ua tau heev los tub raug tua tuag taag lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog vaajntxwv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, kuv has le ntawd.
Tej kev puamtsuaj kws yuav raug Mau-am tub lug ze lawm; hab tej kev puag ntsoog kws yuav raug nwg tub lug yuav txug.

“Mej cov kws nyob puagncig Mau-am, ca le quaj nyav nwg, mej txhua tug kws paub txug nwg lub koob meej ca le has tas; ‘Mau-am lub fwjchim kws tswj teb kaav chaw tub pluj lawm, nwg lub meejmom hab nwg tug zug tsi muaj taag lawm!’

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Dinpoos, mej ca le txu fwjchim lug nyob rua huv aav; rua qhov Mau-am tug yeebncuab tub tuaj tawmtsaam mej lawm, nwg yuav rhuav mej tej chaw faajxwm kuas puamtsuaj taag.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Alu-es, mej ca le moog sawv ntawm kev tog; hab nug cov tuabneeg kws tsiv lug kuas puab qha mej saib muaj xwm dlaabtsi.

Puab yuav teb mej has tas, ‘Mau-am tub pob puag taag lawm; nwg poob ntsejmuag heev, ca le quaj nyav nwg. Ca le qha rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob lawv tug ntug Dlej Alenoos kuas paub has tas Mau-am tub puamtsuaj taag lawm.’
“Kev txav txim taabtom lug raug lub nroog Hauloos, lub nroog Yaxas, lub nroog Mefas,
lub nroog Dinpoos, lub nroog Nenpaus, lub nroog Npethes Dilathayees,
lub nroog Kili-athayees, lub nroog Npethes Nkamus, lub nroog Npethes Me-oos,
lub nroog Keli-aus hab lub nroog Npauxelas kws nyob huv taj nraag. Kev txav txim tub lug raug cov nroog kws nyob huv tebchaws Mau-am tsi has dleb hab ze.
Mau-am tug zug tub ntaug hab nwg lub fwjchim tub pluj lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Muab cawv rua Mau-am haus kuas qaug, rua qhov nwg ntxeev sab rua kuv. Mau-am yuav dlaa nwg cov ntuav, ces tej tuabneeg yuav luag nwg.
Mau-am, koj puas ncu has tas, koj muab cov Yixalayees tso dlaaj tso luag? Koj ua rua puab ib yaam le puab yog tubsaab.
“Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Mau-am, mej ca le tsiv tawm huv mej tej nroog moog nyob rua sau tej roob tsuas! Ua le tug nquab kws ua zeg rua ntawm rooj tsuas.
Mau-am khaavtheeb heev! Peb nov nwg tej lug khaavtheeb, tsaav fwjchim, muab hlub hab nwg xaav txug nwg xwb.
Kuv kws yog tug TSWV, kuv paub nwg lub sab kws khaavtheeb. Nwg tej lug khaav yog lug dlaag, hab nwg tej num tsi ruaj tsi khov.
Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav quaj cov Mau-am txhua tug, hab quaj cov tuabneeg huv Kis Heles.

Kuv yuav quaj cov tuabneeg Xinpemas heev dlua kuv quaj cov tuabneeg Yaxes. Lub nroog Ximas, koj zoo ib yaam le tsob txiv maab kws tej ceg hlaav dlhau Havtxwv Tuag moog txug lub nroog Yaxes. Tabsis nwgnuav koj tej txiv ntoo hab txiv maab kws sav thaus lub caij ntuj qhua tub raug luas muab rhuav puamtsuaj taag lawm.

Tej kev zoo sab hab kev lomzem raug tshem huv lub tebchaws Mau-am kws aav rog hab zoo qoob lawm. Kuv tsi pub kuas puab tsu tau kua txiv maab; yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg tsu kua txiv maab hab qw lomzem le lawm.

“Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Hesenpoos hab huv Ele-ales yuav tsaa suab quaj,  hab puab tej suab quaj yuav ntxhe moog txug lub nroog Yahas; cov tuabneeg Xau-as los nov puab tej suab quaj, puab tej suab quaj yuav nrov moog txug lub nroog Haulunayees hab lub nroog Elas-Selisiyas. Txawm yog tug Dlej Niles los yuav qhuav.
Kuv yuav txwv tsi pub cov Mau-am tua tsaj hlawv fij rua puab tej chaw teev mlom hab hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab rua puab tej vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
“Yog le ntawd, kuv lub sab txhaj quaj ntsuag rua cov Mau-am hab cov Kis Heles, ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws tshuab zaaj raaj quaj ntsuag, rua qhov txhua yaam kws yog puab le tub pluj taag lawm.
Puab txhua tug chais puab tej plaubhau hab fwjtxwv. Puab hlais puab tej teg hab muab ntaub tsaaj lug npua.

Nyob rua sau cov Mau-am tej ruv tsev hab tom tej tshaav puam, tsi nov suab dlaabtsi le, tsuas yog nov tej suab quaj nyav nkaus xwb, rua qhov kuv ua rua Mau-am ntsoog taag, ib yaam le lub hub kws muab tsoo tawg taag, tsi muaj leejtwg xaav yuav.

Mau-am raug rhuav puamtsuaj hab poob ntsejmuag, nwg ca le tsaa suab hlo quaj! Mau-am puamtsuaj taag, ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig nwg luag nwg plig heev. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV coglug has tas yuav muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg tuaj tua cov Mau-am ib yaam le tug dlaav yaa qwv ntxaj lug
txeeb nwg tej nroog hab tej chaw faajxwm. Nub ntawd Mau-am tej tubrog yuav ntshai ib yaam le tug quaspuj yuav yug mivnyuas.
Mau-am yuav raug rhuav kuas puamtsuaj, tsi tau ua ib tsaav tuabneeg lawm, rua qhov nwg ntxeev sab rua kuv.
Tej kev txhawj ntshai, tej qhov hab tej vuj hlua tub cuab tog cov Mau-am kev lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Yog leejtwg tsiv kev txhawj ntshai, tug ntawd yuav poob qhov hab yog leejtwg nce tawm huv qhov lug, tug ntawd yuav maag vuj hlua, rua qhov tug TSWV tub npaaj kev puamtsuaj tog cov Mau-am lawm.

Cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj leejtwg paab, tsiv moog nrhav chaw nkaum rua huv Hesenpoos, lub nroog kws yaav taag lug Vaajntxwv Xihoos kaav, tabsis suavtawg taabtom kub cig laam lug.  Suavtawg kub cov Mau-am kws nyam ua rog huv taj nraag moog rua sau tej hauv roob sab.
Mau-am raug puamtsuaj lawm! Cov tuabneeg kws pe tug mlom Khemaus raug puamtsuaj, hab puab tej tub tej ntxhais raug luas nteg coj moog rua lwm lub tebchaws lawm.
Tej kws has taag lug nuav yuav lug raug cov Mau-am, tabsis muaj ib nub tug TSWV yuav pub kuas cov Mau-am rov muaj kev vaammeej dlua.

Tug TSWV has rua cov Amoos has tas, “Cov Yixalayees tsi muaj tub los? Puab tsi muaj ib tug lug tuav puab lub tebchaws le los? Vim le caag puab ca cov tuabneeg kws pe tug mlom Maulej tuaj txeeb xeem Khas cheebtsaam aav rua puab nyob lawm?

Tabsis tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv ua kuas cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Lanpas nov tej suab sis ntaus sis tua, lub nroog ntawd yuav puamtsuaj hab tej zog kws nyob ibncig yuav kub nyab taag. Ces cov Yixalayees txhaj yuav txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws kws luas txeeb lawm rov lug.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Hesenpoos, ca le tsaa suab quaj! Lub nroog A-is raug puamtsuaj lawm! Cov quaspuj kws nyob huv lub nroog Lanpas, ca le quaj ntsuag! Ca le npua ntaub tsaaj hab quaj ntsuag. Ca le moog moog lug lug tsi paub moog qhov twg! Luas yuav coj mej tug vaajtswv Maulej, cov povthawj hab cov numtswv moog rua lwm lub tebchaws.
Cov tuabneeg sab tsi ncaaj, vim le caag mej khaavtheeb ua luaj? Mej tug zug tub ntaug lawm. Vim le caag mej ca sab rua mej tug zug hab has tas, ‘Yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tawmtsaam tau peb le?’
Kuv yuav tso kev txhawj ntshai txhua phaab tuaj rua mej, mej txhua tug nyag taug nyag fuas sav tsiv, mej moog nyob qhov twg los yuav tsi muaj leejtwg sau mej rov lug nyob ua ke le lawm.
“Tabsis tom qaab ntawd kuv yuav ua kuas cov Amoos rov vaammeej dlua. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has txug cov Edoos has tas, “Cov Edoos txawm tsi muaj ib tug ntse le los? Puab cov tuavxaam tsi paub qha puab le los? Puab tej tswvyim pluj taag lawm los?
Cov tuabneeg Dedaas, mej ca le tsiv hab tig hlo rov qaab! Ca le tsiv moog nkaum! Kuv yuav rhuav Exaus cov xeebntxwv kuas puamtsuaj taag, rua qhov tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv rau txim rua puab lawm.
Thaus tuabneeg dle txiv maab puab tseg ibtxha ca rua ntawm txuj maab, hab yog tubsaab tuaj thaus tsaus ntuj, puab tsuas nyag tej kws puab xaav yuav xwb.
Tabsis thaus kuv  rhuav Exaus cov xeebntxwv, kuv yuav tsi tseg ib qhov chaw rua puab nkaum le. Kuv ua le ntawd kuas puab tsi tau chaw nraim cev. Cov Edoos puamtsuaj taag tsi tshuav ib tug seem le.
Tseg mej tej mivnyuas ntsuag rua kuv, kuv yuav tu hab tsomkwm puab. Mej cov puj ntsuag los kuas puab tso sab rua kuv.
“Txawm yog cov kws tsi xaav raug txim los yuav raug txim. Mej xaav has tas, mej yuav tsi raug txav txim nua los? Yeej tsi tau le! Mej yuavtsum raug txim xwb!

Kuv coglug has tas, lub nroog Npauxelas yuav ua suabpuam hab ua chaw rua luas ntshai tsi xaav pum; tej tuabneeg dlua kev yuav txobthuam hab tuav nwg lub npe foom tsi zoo; hab tej zog kws nyob ibncig los yuav puamtsuaj taag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Kuv has tas, “Edoos, kuv tub nov tug TSWV tso tuabneeg xaa xuv moog rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg kuas sau puab tej tubrog tuaj tawmtsaam mej lawm.
Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas mej qaug zug, hab tsi muaj leejtwg fwm mej.

Mej txujkev khaavtheeb dlaag ntxag mej, tsi muaj leejtwg fwm mej le mej xaav. Txawm yog mej yuav nyob sau tej roob tsuas hab sau tej roob sab; nyob sab ib yaam le tej dlaav yaa los tug TSWV yuav chua kuas mej poob lug. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Txujkev puamtsuaj kws yuav lug raug cov Edoos txaus ntshai heev, ua rua txhua tug tuabneeg kws dlua kev ceeb hab ntshai kawg le.

Txujkev puamtsuaj kws raug cov Edoos zoo ib yaam le tej kws lug raug lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas, hab tej zej zog kws nyob puagncig ntawd, yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg lug nyob le lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.

Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Edoos tsiv tawm huv puab lub tebchaws moog, thaus puab tsi nwm ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav tawm huv thaaj haav zoov ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees moog rua huv lub tshaav zaub ntaag. Ces tug thawjcoj kws kuv xaiv yuav tau kaav lub tebchaws. Leejtwg txhaj yuav pev tau kuv? Leejtwg txhaj yuav muaj cuabkaav nrug kuv sis tw? Tug thawjcoj twg txhaj yuav tawmtsaam yeej kuv?
Yog le ntawd, mej ca le noog tej kws kuv npaaj sab yuav ua rua cov Edoos hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Temas. Luas yuav coj puab tej mivnyuas moog, yuav ua rua txhua tug ntshai heev.
Thaus Edoos puamtsuaj, hab lub nplajteb ua zug koog, hab yuav nov puab lub suab quaj nrov moog txug nraag Havtxwv Lab.
Yeebncuab yuav tuaj tua lub nroog Npauxelas, ib yaam le tug dlaav yaa qwv ntxaj lug. Nub ntawd Edoos tej tubrog yuav ntshai ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws yuav yug mivnyuas.”

Tug TSWV has txug lub nroog Damaxes le nuav: “Thaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Hamas hab Alepas nov tej xuv tsi zoo, puab yuav txhawj hab ntxhuv sab heev. Kev txhawj hab kev ntxhuv sab ua rua puab lub sab nyob tsi tug ib yaam le havtxwv ndlaas.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes qaug zug, ntshai hab tsiv moog lawm. Puab mob hab txomnyem sab ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws mob plaab yuav yug mivnyuas.
Lub nroog kws ibtxwm nto npe hab muaj kev lomzem  tub puamtsuaj taag lawm.
Nub ntawd nwg tej tub hluas yuav raug tua tuag rua ntawm tej kev hab lub nroog, hab nwg tej tubrog yuav puamtsuaj taag.
Kuv yuav hlawv lub nroog Damaxes tej ntsaa yeej, hab suavtawg yuav kub Vaajntxwv Npeehadas lub loog. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has txug xeem Kedas hab cheebtsaam Haxaules kws Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj tua yeej has tas, “Ca le moog tua xeem Kedas hab rhuav cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nubtuaj kuas puamtsuaj taag!

Ca le moog fuab puab tej tsevntaub, tej yaaj tej tshis, tej ntaub vuv tsev hab txhua yaam kws muaj nyob huv puab tej tsevntaub. Caab puab tej ntxhuav moog hab has rua puab tas, ‘Tej kev txhawj ntshai tuaj vij mej lawm lauj!’ ”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Haxaules, mej ca le tsiv moog nkaus kuas dleb. Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tub tuaj vij hab yuav tua mej. Nwg has tas,
‘Peb ca le moog tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob tso sab lug! Puab lub nroog tsi muaj roojvaag lossis tsi xauv hab tsi muaj dlaabtsi thaiv le.’

“Ca le caab taagnrho puab tej ntxhuav hab tej yaaj tej tshis moog. Kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg kws txav puab tej plaubhau tuab tuab lu lawv tsiv ri sua rua txhua txujkev, hab kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj txhua phaab lug raug puab.
Lub nroog Haxaules yuav ua suabpuam moog ibtxhis, ua chaw rua tej maa lug nyob. Yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob huv ntxiv lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawm.”
Thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau tsi ntev, tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has rua kuv txug cov Elames has tas,
“Kuv yuav muab cov tubrog Elames kws tua neevnti kws ua rua cov Elaas muaj zug heev tua kuas tuag taag.

Kuv yuav tso cua ntsawj plaub ceg kaum ntuj tuaj tawmtsaam cov Elames, hab kuv lawv nwg cov tuabneeg kuas tsiv ri sua moog rua txhua qhov, tsi muaj ib lub tebchaws kws nwg tsaav tuabneeg tsi tau moog nyob le.

Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Elames ntshai puab cov yeebncuab kws xaav muab puab tua povtseg. Vim kuv txujkev chim, kuv yuav ua kuas cov Elaas puamtsuaj, hab tso tubrog tuaj tua puab moog txug thaus puab tu noob taag.
Kuv yuav rhuav puab cov vaajntxwv hab cov thawjcoj kuas puamtsuaj taag hab txawb kuv lub zwmtxwv rua qhov ntawd.
Tabsis tom qaab ntawd, kuv yuav pub kuas cov Elames rov vaammeej dlua. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv txug lub nroog Npanpiloos hab nwg cov tuabneeg le nuav:

“Koj ca le qha rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg! Tshaajtawm rua suavdlawg! Ca le tsaa chij hab tshaajtawm kuas suavdlawg paub! Tsi xob zais ib yaam dlaabtsi le! Npanpiloos swb lawm! Luas tub muab nwg tug vaajtswv Madus tsoo tawg taag lawm! Npanpiloos tej mlom raug rhuav poob ntsejmuag; nwg tej mlom kws phem qas raug tsoo tawg taag!
“Muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob rua saab qaumteb yuav tuaj tua lub nroog Npanpiloos, kuas ua suabpuam taag. Tej tuabneeg hab tej tsaj txhu yuav tsiv taag tsi nyob huv lawm.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas yuav quaj lug nrhav kuv kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.
Puab yuav nug txujkev kws moog rua huv lub nroog Xi-oos hab taug txujkev ntawd moog. Puab yuav nrug kuv coglug ruaj khov moog ibtxhis tsi rhuav le lawm.
“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg zoo ib yaam le paab yaaj kws tug yug yaaj ca puab moog yuam kev rua sau tej roob. Puab moog ib lub roob rua ib lub roob ib yaam le paab yaaj kws nrhav tsi tau kev rov lug tsev.

Txhua tug kws ntsib puab muab puab tua. Puab cov yeebncuab has tas, ‘Cov Yixalayees ua txhum rua tug TSWV, yog le ntawd tej kws peb ua yeej tsi txhum hab. Puab cov yawmkoob yeej ibtxwm ca sab rua tug TSWV. Tsimnyog puab muab sab npuab tug TSWV hab.’
“Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Npanpiloos moog! Ca le tso lub tebchaws nuav tseg! Mej ca le ua cov kws xub tsiv ntaag!

Kuv yuav tshoov tej tsaav tuabneeg nyob saab qaumteb kws muaj zug heev ua ib paab tuaj tawmtsaam lub nroog Npanpiloos; puab yuav tuaj tsheej kev tuaj tua hab txeeb tau lub tebchaws Npanpiloos; puab yog cov kws tua neevnti ncaaj heev, puab tua tsi saav le.
Luas yuav tuaj fuab lub nroog Npanpiloos. Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj fuab yuav nqaa txhua yaam zoo kws puab xaav yuav moog. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Npanpiloos, mej fuab kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Mej zoo sab hab txaus sab ib yaam le tug xyuas nyuj dlha tom tshaav zaub lossis ib yaam le tug txiv neeg xob kws hee quas lawg,
tabsis mej lub nroog yuav poob ntsejmuag hab txaajmuag kawg le. Npanpiloos yuav poob qeg tshaaj txhua lub tebchaws huv tuabsi; nwg yuav ua suabpuam qhuav nkig nkuav tsi muaj dlej.
Vim kuv txujkev chim, Npanpiloos raug rhuav puamtsuaj taag tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob; tej tuabneeg kws dlua kev yuav ceeb hab xaav tsi thoob.
“Cov tuabneeg kws tua neevnti yuav tuaj sawv ua tsheej phaj vij tua lub nroog Npanpiloos. Ca le tua mej tej xub neevnti rua huv Npanpiloos, rua qhov nwg tau ua txhum rua kuv kws yog tug TSWV lawm.

Ca le qw hab dlha moog vij lub nroog! Nwgnuav Npanpiloos tub lug thawj lawm. Luas tub rhuav nwg tej ntsaa yeej pob taag lawm.  Kuv taabtom ua pauj cov Npanpiloos, yog le ntawd, mej ca le ua pauj cov Npanpiloos, hab ua rua puab ib yaam le puab tau ua rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg lawm.
Tsi xob cog hab sau qoob huv lub tebchaws ntawd le. Lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd yuav ntshai tej tubrog kws tuaj tua lub nroog Npanpiloos, puab yuav ca le rov qaab moog tsev.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees zoo ib yaam le paab yaaj kws tsuv ntxhuav caum tawg tsiv ri sua. Thawj zag puab raug tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias tua, hab tom qaab ntawd puab raug Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos cua puab tej pobtxhaa.

Vim le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav rau txim rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales hab nwg lub tebchaws ib yaam le kuv rau txim rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias.

Kuv yuav coj cov Yixalayees rov lug rua huv puab lub tebchaws. Puab yuav tau noj tej qoob kws puab cog rua sau Roob Kalemees hab ntawm cheebtsaam Npasaas, hab tau noj tej qoob kws yog puab cog rua cheebtsaam Efalayees hab Nkile-as.

Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Yixalayees yuav tsi ua txhum, hab cov Yudas yuav tsi ua kev phem kev qas, rua qhov kuv yuav zaam txim rua cov tuabneeg kws kuv tseg puab txujsa. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Ca le moog tua lub tebchaws Melathayees hab cov tuabneeg Pekaus, tua hab rhuav kuas puab puamtsuaj taag.  Ca le ua txhua yaam lawv le kuv saamfwm rua mej. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Nov tej suab sis ntaus sis tua nrov thoob tebchaws, hab muaj kev puamtsuaj luj heev.

Npanpiloos muab rauj tsoo lub nplajteb tawg ntsoog ntxawg, nwgnuav raab rauj ntawd tub tawg taag lawm. Tej xwm kws raug lub tebchaws Npanpiloos ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob nplajteb ceeb luj kawg le.
Npanpiloos, koj sawv tawmtsaam kuv, nwgnuav koj tub maag lub vuj hlua kws kuv cuab tog koj kev lawm; txawm le ntawd los koj tub tsi paub le.

Kuv tub qheb lub chaw kws ntim kuv tej cuabyeej ua rog, vim kuv txujkev chim, kuv txhaj rhu tej ntawd tawm, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus hab kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv muaj num tseemceeb ua nyob huv tebchaws Npanpiloos.

Ca le puav tua txhua phaab tuaj hab tsoo lub txhaab rau khoom kuas tawg; sau tej khoom kws puab fuab tau lug teeb ua tej pawg ib yaam le tej pawg nplej! Ca le rhuav lub tebchaws kuas puamtsuaj, tsi xob tseg ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Ca le tua puab tej tubrog! Ca le muab puab tua kuas tuag taag! Cov Npanpiloos raug puamtsuaj lawm! Tub txug lub sijhawm rau txim rua puab lawm!”

(Cov tuabneeg kws tsiv huv tebchaws Npanpiloos rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, puab has tas tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tau ua pauj rua cov Npanpiloos, vim tej kws puab tau ua tsi zoo rua nwg lub Tuamtsev.)

“Ca le has kuas cov tuabneeg kws txawj tua neevnti nqaa puab tej neevnti hab xub vug moog tawmtsaam lub nroog Npanpiloos. Ca le moog vij lub nroog hab tsi pub ib tug twg tsiv dlim le. Ua pauj rua nwg lawv le tej kws nwg tau ua lawm, hab ua phem rua puab lawv le nwg tau ua rua lwm tug lawm, rua qhov nwg khaavtheeb tawmtsaam kuv kws yog cov Yixalayees tug TSWV kws dlawbhuv.
Yog le ntawd, nwg tej tub hluas yuav raug tua tuag taag rua ntawm tej kev huv nroog, hab taagnrho nwg cov tubrog yuav raug tua tuag taag rua nub ntawd. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.

“Npanpiloos, koj lub sab puv nkaus kev khaavtheeb, yog le ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus hab kaav ib puas tsaav yaam yuav tawmtsaam koj. Tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv rau txim rua koj lawm!
Koj tsaav tuabneeg kws khaavtheeb yuav dlawm hab qaug, tsi muaj leejtwg paab tsaa koj sawv le. Kuv yuav hlawv koj tej nroog hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob puagncig ntawd kuas kub nyab taag.”
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas, “Cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas raug luas tsimtxom nyaav kawg. Cov kws nteg puab ntawd zuv puab nruj heev tsi pub puab moog qhov twg le.

Tabsis tug kws yuav tso puab dlim muaj zug heev, nwg lub npe hu ua tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus. Nwg yuav lug txav puab rooj plaub hab coj kev thaajyeeb lug rua lub nplajteb nuav, tabsis cov Npanpiloos yuav raug kev ntxhuv sab.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Ca kev tuag lug raug Npanpiloos! Ca kev tuag lug raug nwg cov pejxeem, nwg cov numtswv hab nwg tej tub txawg tub ntse.
Ca kev tuag lug raug nwg cov cevlug cuav, vim puab ruag kawg le! Ca kev tuag lug raug nwg cov tubrog, ua rua puab ntshai kawg le!
Ca le rhuav nwg tej neeg hab tsheb neeg kuas puamtsuaj! Ca kev tuag lug raug tej tubrog kws nwg ndlav tuaj paab, ua rua puab qaug zug! Ca le rhuav nwg tej txhaab nyaj hab fuab nwg tej nyaj moog.
Ca nwg lub tebchaws qhuav nkig nkuav, hab ua kuas nwg tej dlej tu nqhuab taag. Npanpiloos yog lub tebchaws kws muaj mlom ntau, txhaj ua rua suavdlawg qaug sab rua tej mlom ntawd.
“Yog le ntawd, tej tsaj nruab nraag, maa  hab tej noog tsi huv yuav lug nyob huv Npanpiloos. Txij nuav moog yaav tom ntej yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg moog nyob huv le lawm.

Tej kev puamtsuaj kws lug raug lub nroog Npanpiloos zoo ib yaam le tej kws lug raug lub nroog Xaudoos, lub nroog Kaumaulas hab tej zog miv kws nyob ibncig ntawd. Yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg lug nyob qhov ntawd le lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
“Muaj tuabneeg taabtom tuaj saab qaumteb tuaj, Yog tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug hab muaj ntau tug vaajntxwv taug kev dleb tuaj ua rog.
Puab npaaj rawv puab tej neevnti hab tej ntaaj. Puab limham hab tsi taabncuab leejtwg le. Puab caij neeg dlha nrov nroo ntwg tuaj tawmtsaam lub nroog Npanpiloos ib yaam le havtxwv ndlaas;

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos nov txug tej xwm nuav, ua rua nwg ob txhais npaab tsaug taag tsi muaj zug le lawm; kev ntxhuv sab ua rua nwg mob ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws mob plaab yug mivnyuas.

“Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Npanpiloos tsiv tawm huv puab lub nroog moog thaus puab tsi nwm ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav kws tawm huv thaaj haav zoov ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees moog rua huv lub tshaav zaub. Ces tug thawjcoj kws kuv xaiv yuav tau kaav lub tebchaws. Leejtwg txhaj yuav pev tau kuv? Leejtwg txhaj yuav muaj cuabkaav nrug kuv sis tw? Tug thawjcoj twg txhaj yuav tawmtsaam yeej kuv?
Yog le ntawd, mej ca le noog tej kws kuv npaaj sab yuav ua rua lub nroog Npanpiloos hab nwg cov pejxeem. Luas yuav coj puab tej mivnyuas moog, ua rua txhua tug ntshai heev.
Thaus lub nroog Npanpiloos puamtsuaj lub nplajteb ua zug koog, hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav nov nwg lub suab quaj.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv taabtom tso cua ntsawj kev puamtsuaj  lug tawmtsaam Npanpiloos hab nwg cov pejxeem.

Kuv yuav tso lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj rhuav Npanpiloos ib yaam le cua ntsawj tej quavnyaab. Nub kws kev puamtsuaj lug txug, hab puab yuav tuaj txhua phaab tuaj tua Npanpiloos kuas lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag ca.
Tsi xob pub nwg cov tubrog tau sijhawm tua puab tej neevnti lossis naav puab tej rig tsho ua rog le. Tsi xob tseg tej tub hluas le. Tua cov tubrog kuas tuag taag!
Puab yuav raug mob hab tuag rua ntawm tej kev huv puab tej nroog.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, txawm yog cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas tau ua txhum tawmtsaam kuv kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv los kuv tsi tso puab tseg.
Mej ca le tsiv tawm huv Npanpiloos moog! Tsiv tag kuas mej dlim! Tsi xob this cov Npanpiloos lub txim tuag. Nwgnuav kuv taabtom ua pauj hab rau txim rua cov Npanpiloos lawv le puab tsimnyog raug.
Npanpiloos zoo ib yaam le lub khob kub huv kuv txhais teg kws muab rua tuabneeg nplajteb haus kuas qaug. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws haus cov cawv huv lub khob ntawd ua rua puab tsi meejpem lawm.
Tsi nwm Npanpiloos ca le qaug hab puamtsuaj lawm. Ca le quaj ntsuag rua Npanpiloos! Ca le muab tshuaj qhwv nwg tej qhov txhaab, tej zag nyaj nwg yuav zoo.
Tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nyob ntawd has tas, ‘Peb paab Npanpiloos, tabsis paab tsi tau, peb ca le rov qaab moog tsev. Vaajtswv rau txim nyaav heev rua Npanpiloos, nwg txhaj puamtsuaj lawm.’ ”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le qw has tas, ‘Peb cov kws nyob ntawm nwg saab xis ca le moog pav tej kws tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tau ua lawm rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalees paub.’ ”

Tug TSWV tub tshoov cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Medias sab, kuas tuaj rhuav tebchaws Npanpiloos lawv le nwg npaaj sab lawm. Rua qhov puab tau tuaj rhuav tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, tug TSWV txhaj ua pauj rua puab. Cov thawj tubrog saamfwm has tas, “Mej ca le huv mej tej xub vug! Ca le nqaa mej tej thaiv nav ntaaj!

Ca le kwv chij coj tubrog moog tsoo lub nroog Npanpiloos tej ntsaa yeej. Ca le tso tubrog moog zuv tej chaw faajxwm khov kho. Tso tubrog moog zuv kev tog kuas zoo!” Tug TSWV tau ua rua cov Npanpiloos lawv le nwg tau has tseg lawm.
Muaj ntau tug dlej hab ntau lub qhov nyaj qhov kub nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, tabsis nwg lub sijhawm taag lawm, hab nwg txujsa tu lawm.

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus coglug has tas, nwg yuav coj tuabneeg coob heev ib yaam le cov kooj txomfaav tuaj tawmtsaam lub nroog Npanpiloos, puab yuav qw zoo sab rua qhov puab yeej lawm.
Tug TSWV tsim lub nplajteb lug ntawm nwg lub fwjchim; nwg tsim lub nplajteb lug ntawm nwg lub tswvyim; hab nthuav lub ntuj lug ntawm nwg txujkev txawj ntse.

Thaus tug TSWV has rua tej dlej sau nruab ntug, ces tej dlej txawm nrov nroo ntwg. Nwg ua kuas muaj fuab tsaus nti tim qaab ntug lug. Nwg ua kuas muaj tsaglig xub thaus lug naag, hab tso cua huv nwg lub txhaab tuaj ntsawj.
Tuabneeg txhua tug puavleej ruag hab tsi muaj kev txawj ntse; cov tuabneeg nchuav mlom yuav raug txaajmuag; rua qhov tej mlom kws puab nchuav tsi muaj sa hab cuav xwb.
Tej mlom ntawd tsi muaj qaabhau hab tsimnyog raug thuam; thaus tug TSWV lug txav txim rua puab, puab yuav puamtsuaj taag.
