Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tsi zoo le tej mlom ntawd; nwg yog tug kws tsim ib puas tsaav yaam, hab nwg xaiv cov Yixalayees lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg lub npe hu ua tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Npanpiloos, koj yog kuv raab rauj kws yog kuv tej cuabyeej ua rog. Kuv siv koj tsoo ntau tsaav tuabneeg hab ntau lub tebchaws,
tsoo cov tubrog caij neeg hab tej neeg, tsoo cov tsaav tsheb neeg hab tej tsheb neeg,
tua cov txivneej hab cov quaspuj, tua cov laug hab cov hluas, tua tej mivnyuas tub hab tej mivnyuas ntxhais,
tua cov tuabneeg yug yaaj hab puab tej yaaj, tua tej tub qoob tub loo hab puab tej neeg laij teb, tua tej tswvxeev hab tej numtswv huv tuabsi povtseg.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej yuav pum kuv ua pauj rua Npanpiloos hab nwg cov pejxeem kws tau ua phem ua qas rua lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Npanpiloos, koj zoo ib yaam le lub hauv roob kws ua rua lub nplajteb puamtsuaj, tabsis kuv kws yog tug TSWV, kuv yog koj tug yeebncuab. Kuv yuav chua koj rua huv aav, hab ca koj dlaa qhov tshauv.
Tej pobzeb kws tawm ntawm koj lug, tsi muaj ib lub zoo coj moog ua tsev le, koj yuav ua suabpuam moog ibtxhis. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.

“Ca le kwv chij txhij tubrog, hab tshuab raaj tshuab xyu kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg npaaj moog ua rog tawmtsaam Npanpiloos! Has kuas lub tebchaws Alalaj, Minis hab Akenas cov tubrog coj ib cov neeg coob ib yaam le cov kooj txomfaav moog tua Npanpiloos hab tsaa ib tug ua tug thawjcoj moog tua rog.
Kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg npaaj moog ua rog rua Npanpiloos. Ca le has kuas Medias cov vaajntxwv, puab cov thawjcoj, cov numtswv hab cov tubrog kws nyob huv tej tebchaws kws puab kaav tuaj.
Lub nplajteb qeeg ua zug koog, rua qhov tug TSWV ua rua Npanpiloos puamtsuaj ua suabpuam taag tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob lawv le nwg tau npaaj tseg lawm.

Npanpiloos tej tubrog tseg tsi sis tua lawm, puab nyob tuabywv huv tej yeej, rua qhov puab zug ntaug taag zoo le tej quaspuj xwb. Tej roojvaag nroog pob puag taag hab puab tej vaaj tse los kub nyab taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Cov tuabneeg moog tshaab xu rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav Npanpiloos ib tug taag ib tug tuaj has tas, nwg lub nroog tub puamtsuaj taag lawm!
Yeebncuab tub tuaj txeeb tau tug dlej kws ndlwg phua huv lub nroog hab tub hlawv tej chaw faajxwm kub nyab taag lawm. Cov tubrog Npanpiloos ntshai tshee nyo ua ib ce tuag taag.

Tsi ntev yeebncuab tub yuav tuaj muab puab hlais hab tsuj ib yaam le luas tsuj nplej huv lub tshaav ntaus nplej. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le ntawd.”

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav Npanpiloos muab lub nroog Yeluxalees noj lawm. Nwg ua rua lub nroog nyob khoob lug ca ib yaam le lub hub; zoo ib yaam le tug zaaj nqog lub nroog Yeluxalees. Nwg coj txhua yaam kws nwg xaav tau moog taag, hab tseg tej kws nwg tsi xaav yuav xwb.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Xi-oos ca le has tas, “Ca Npanpiloos ris lub txim kws nwg ua nruj ua tsiv rua peb.” Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees ca le has tas, “Ca Npanpiloos ris lub txim kws nwg ua rua peb raug kev txomnyem!”

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tas, “Kuv yuav paab txheem mej rooj plaub, hab kuv yuav ua pauj mej cov yeebncuab lawv le tej kws puab tau ua rua mej lawm. Kuv yuav ua kuas Npanpiloos tej qhovdlej hab tej dlej cag qhuav.
Kuas lub tebchaws puamtsuaj ua chaw rua tej tsaj qus lug nyob. Tej tuabneeg dlua kev yuav txobthuam hab ntshai, tsi muaj leejtwg moog nyob huv.
Cov Npanpiloos yuav nyooj ib yaam le tsuv ntxhuav hab yuav quaj ib yaam le tej mivnyuas tsuv ntxhuav.
Puas yog puab ua tuabneeg sab hlub? Kuv yuav npaaj ib rooj noj haus rua puab, kuas puab noj tsau haus qaug hab zoo sab, puab yuav moog pw hab tsi sawv le lawm.
Kuv yuav coj puab moog tua ib yaam le luas tua tej mivnyuas yaaj, tej tshis hab tej laug yaaj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has txug Npanpiloos le nuav: “Lub nroog kws tuabneeg nplajteb qhuas luas tub txeeb tau lawm! Npanpiloos raug puamtsuaj ua rua tuabneeg nplajteb ntshai kawg le!
Dlej havtxwv ndlaas nphau nphwv hab nrov nroo ntwg tuaj nyaab Npanpiloos.
Tej nroog huv Npanpiloos yuav ua suabpuam tsi muaj dlej, tuabneeg yuav ntshai tsi moog qhov ntawd lossis tsi muaj tuabneeg moog nyob huv.

Kuv yuav rau txim rua Npeles kws yog Npanpiloos tug vaajtswv kuas nwg tsi xob moog nyag luas tug; tej tuabneeg nplajteb yuav tsi hawm nwg ntxiv lawm. “Npanpiloos tej ntsaa yeej tub pob puag taag lawm.
Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le tsiv tawm huv Npanpiloos moog! Ca le tsiv kuas mej dlim ntawm kuv txujkev chim.

Tsi xob ntshai lossis qaug zug rua tej xwm tsi zoo kws mej nov. Tej xwm tsi zoo ntawd ib xyoos luas has txawv lawm ib yaam, yog has txug tej xwm ua nruj ua tsiv huv lub tebchaws kws ib tug vaajntxwv sawv tawmtsaam ib tug.
Tub yuav txug lub sijhawm kws kuv rau txim rua Npanpiloos tej mlom. Thoob plawg nwg lub tebchaws yuav poob ntsejmuag, hab nwg tej pejxeem yuav raug luas tua tuag taag.
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab qaumteb tuaj rhuav Npanpiloos puamtsuaj lawm, txhua tsaav yaam kws nyob huv lub nplajteb hab sau nruab ntug yuav qw zoo sab heev.

Vim Npanpiloos tau ua rua tej tuabneeg kws nyob thoob nplajteb raug kev pluj kev tuag, hab ua rua cov Yixalayees coob leej raug kev pluj kev tuag, nwgnuav Npanpiloos txhaj yuav poob rua luas teg. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV has rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv Npanpiloos has tas, “Mej tub dlim kev tuag lawm! Nwgnuav mej ca le tawm moog! Tsi xob tog le! Txawm yog mej moog nyob dleb mej lub tebchaws los mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov kuv kws yog mej tug TSWV, hab xaav ntsoov txug lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Mej has tas, ‘Peb raug luas rhuav ntsejmuag ua rua peb txaajmuag kawg. Peb taag kev ca sab, rua qhov cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tuaj txeeb tau lub Tuamtsev kws yog qhov chaw dlawbhuv lawm.’
Yog le ntawd kuv qha rua mej has tas, tub yuav txug lub sijhawm kws kuv rau txim rua Npanpiloos tej mlom, hab cov tuabneeg kws raug mob thoob tebchaws yuav ntsaaj zum zawg.
Txawm yog Npanpiloos yuav nce moog txug sau nruab ntug hab ua chaw faajxwm ruaj khov rua sau los kuv yuav tso tuabneeg moog rhuav kuas puamtsuaj taag. Kuv Yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej ca le noog tej suab quaj huv Npanpiloos, tej suab quaj suab nyav huv lub tebchaws kws raug puamtsuaj.
Kuv taabtom rhuav Npanpiloos kuas nwg lub suab ntsag. Tej tubrog tuaj nrov nroog ntwg ib yaam le dlej havtxwv ndlaas; hab qw ntshu nrooj tuaj tawmtsaam nwg.

Puab tuaj rhuav Npanpiloos kuas puamtsuaj; Npanpiloos tej tubrog tub raug luas nteg hab puab tej neevnti luv taag lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws rau txim rua txujkev phem kev qas, hab kuv yuav rau txim rua Npanpiloos kuas tsimnyog nwg tej kev txhum.

Kuv yuav muab cawv rua nwg cov numtswv, tej tub txawg tub ntse, tej thawjcoj hab tej tubrog haus kuas qaug. Puab yuav moog pw hab tsi sawv le lawm. Kuv yog tug Vaajntxwv kws has le ntawd; kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus!

Npanpiloos tug ntsaa yeej kws ruaj khov yuav pob puag taag rua huv aav, hab nwg tej roojvaag tsomfaaj raug hlawv kub nyab taag. Teg num kws txhua tsaav tuabneeg ua tsi muaj qaabhau. Puab tej zug ntaug taag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has le ntawd.”

Yelemis saamfwm rua Xelayas kws yog Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas ib tug nom, Xelayas yog Nelayas tug tub hab yog Maxeyas tug xeebntxwv. Thaus kws Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau plaub xyoos, Xelayas raug nteg nrug Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Kuv sau ib thooj ntawv has txug tej kev puamtsuaj kws yuav lug raug Npanpiloos, tej lug kws kuv sau nuav yog has txug tej kev puamtsuaj hab lwm yaam kws yuav lug raug Npanpiloos.
Kuv has rua Xelayas has tas, “Thaus koj moog txug tim Npanpiloos lawm, koj ncu ntsoov nyeem kuv cov lug kws sau rua huv thooj ntawv nuav nrov nrov rua suavdlawg noog.

Tom qaab ntawd, mej thov Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Tug TSWV koj has tas, koj yuav rhuav lub nroog nuav kuas tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi nyob huv, tsi has tuabneeg lossis tej tsaj txhu hab lub nroog nuav yuav ua suabpuam moog ibtxhis.’
Xelayas, thaus koj nyeem thooj ntawv nuav rua puab noog taag lawm, koj muab paav rua ib lub pobzeb hab pov rua huv tug Dlej Efalates,

hab has tas, ‘Yuav muaj tej xwm le nuav lug raug Npanpiloos, Npanpiloos yuav tog rua huv qaab thu ib yaam le nuav hab tsi tawm lug le lawm, rua qhov tug TSWV yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug Npanpiloos.’ ”  Yelemis cov lug xaus le nuav.

Thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum ib xyoos. Nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum ib xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Hamutas, nwg nam yog tug Yelemis kws nyob huv lub nroog Linas tug ntxhais.
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas ua txhum rua tug TSWV ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees ua.

Tug TSWV chim rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab huv tebchaws Yudas, nwg txhaj muab puab ntab tawm moog lawm. Xedekiyas ntxeev sab rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos,

yog le ntawd thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv tau cuaj xyoos, lub kaum hli nub xab kaug, Nenpukajnexales txhaj coj nwg cov tubrog tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees. Puab tuaj tsuam yeej nyob saab nrau ntug nroog, hab puab meem ib tug ntswg puagncig lub nroog,
hab puab vij lub nroog Yeluxalees moog txug thaus Xedekiyas kaav tebchaws tau kaum ib xyoos.
Xyoo ntawd, lub plaub hlis nub xab cuag, thaus ntawd suavdlawg tshaib nqhes heev, tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi noj le lawm,

cov yeebncuab tsoo tug ntsaa yeej ib qho pob. Txawm yog cov tubrog Npanpiloos tub vij lub nroog taag lawm los thaus ib taag mo Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas hab nwg cov tubrog tseem tsiv tawm moog hlaa vaajntxwv lub vaaj moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws nyob kis nruab nraab ntawm ob txheej ntsaa yeej moog rua tom lub Haav Yauladees lawm.
Tabsis cov tubrog Npanpiloos caum puab qaab moog nteg tau Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas ntawm lub taj nraag kws nyob ze lub nroog Yelikaus. Nwg cov tubrog tsiv taag tso nwg tseg.
Thaus puab nteg tau Xedekiyas lawm, puab coj nwg lug cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales ntawm lub nroog Lilas huv cheebtsaam Hamas, hab Nenpukajnexales txav txim rua Xedekiyas qhov ntawd
Nenpukajnexales muab Xedekiyas cov tub tua taabmeeg Xedekiyas huv lub nroog Lilas, hab Nenpukajnexales kuas luas muab cov Yudas tej numtswv tua huv tuabsi.

Tom qaab ntawd, Nenpukajnexales muab Xedekiyas ob lub qhovmuag kaus povtseg hab muab saw hlau khi caab moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm. Xedekiyas nyob huv tsev lojcuj moog txug nub kws nwg tuag le.

Thaus Nenpukajnexales ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tau kaum cuaj xyoos, lub tsib hlis nub xab kaug, Nenpuxaladaas kws yog vaajntxwv tug tuavxaam hab yog tug tubrog txawm tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Nwg hlawv lub Tuamtsev, vaajntxwv lub loog, cov numtswv tej tsev ua num hab taagnrho tej vaaj tse huv Yeluxalees kub nyab taag;
hab nwg cov tubrog muab tej ntsaa yeej tsoo pob puag taag huv tuabsi.
Nenpuxaladaas nteg cov tuabneeg kws seem nyob huv lub nroog, tsi has cov kws tsiv lug thawj, cov kws txawj txaug yaam nuav yaam u kws nyob huv lub nroog moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos  huv tuabsi lawm.
Tabsis nwg tseg cov tuabneeg txomnyem ibtxha kws tsi muaj laj tsi muaj teb nyob rua huv tebchaws Yudas, hab nwg kuas puab tu luas tej teb hab tej vaaj txiv maab.
Cov Npanpiloos muab tej ncej tooj, tej tsheb txawb, lub rhawv tooj kws txawb ntawm lub Tuamtsev tsoo tawg taag, hab puab nqaa tej tooj ntawd moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.

Puab tseem nqaa tej toomtxhob, tej laug tooj kws luas siv yawm tshauv sau lub thaaj, tej txab txav teebxeeb, tej taig phab rau tej ntshaav tsaj kws tua theej txhoj, tej laujkaub kws hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab tej twj taig tooj kws siv ua kevcai huv lub Tuamtsev moog huv tuabsi lawm.

Puab nqaa txhua yaam kws muab nyaj muab kub nchuav ua huv tuabsi moog lawm: tsi has tej laujkaub miv, tej yag rau ncaig tawg, tej taig phab rau tej ntshaav tsaj kws tua theej txhoj, tej laug tooj yawm tshauv, tej ncej txawb teeb, tej laujkaub rau moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab tej taig kws rau cawv txiv maab ua khoom fij.

Tej kws Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tsim tseg rua huv lub Tuamtsev: tsi has ob tug ncej tooj, cov tsheb txawb, lub rhawv tooj hab kaum ob tug nyuj kws txawb lub rhawv tooj rua sau, nyaav heev muab lug luj tsi tau rua sau teev.

Ob tug ncej tooj ntawd sis luag zog: sab kaum yim tshim, qhov luj puagncig kaum ob tshim, khoob hab tuab plaub nti. Luas muab tooj ua ob lub hau ua paaj txawb rua sau ob tug hauv ncej, ib lub hau twg sab tsib tshim, luas muab xuv tooj qhab ua ob txuj saw thi puagncig ob lub hau, hab muab tooj nchuav ua ob tshaam txiv ntsab pobkws dlai rua sau.
Ob tshaam txiv ntsab pobkws ntawd, ib tshaam twg muaj ib puas lub, tabsis yog tuaj huv nuav saib rua sau, tsuas pum cuaj caum rau lub xwb.

Dlua le ntawd, Nenpuxaladaas kws yog tug thawj tubrog tseem nteg Xelayas kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub, hab tug povthawj Xefaniyas kws yog tug paab, hab nteg peb tug tuabneeg tseemceeb kws tu lub Tuamtsev coj moog lawm.

Nenpuxaladaas nteg tug thawj tubrog kws saib taagnrho cov tubrog, vaajntxwv xyaa tug tuavxaam, tug thawj tubrog kws yog tug paab hab tuav cov tubrog tej ntaub ntawv, hab rau caum leej tuabneeg tseemceeb kws nyob huv lub nroog moog lawm.
Nenpuxaladaas coj cov tuabneeg ntawd moog cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales ntawm lub nroog Lilas
huv cheebtsaam Hamas. Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kuas luas muab puab ntaus hab tua rua huv lub nroog ntawd. Yog le ntawd luas txhaj coj cov Yudas tawm huv lub tebchaws moog lawm.
Ntawm nuav yog has txug cov Yudas kws Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales nteg coj moog: Thaus Nenpukajnexales ua vaajntxwv tau xyaa xyoo, nwg nteg cov Yudas peb txheeb neeg nkaum peb leeg;
hab thaus nwg ua vaajntxwv tau kaum yim xyoo, nwg nteg cov Yudas yim pua peb caug ob leeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees coj moog,

hab thaus nwg ua vaajntxwv tau neeg nkaum peb xyoos, Nenpuxaladaas rov tuaj nteg tau cov Yudas xyaa pua plaub caug tsib leeg. Xaam taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg coj moog, muaj plaub txheeb rau pua leej.

Xyoo kws Evimeludas pib ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos, nwg hlub Yehauyakhees kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg txhaj tso Yehauyakhees tawm huv tsev lojcuj. Suav txij nub kws luas nteg Yehauyakhees huv tebchaws Yudas moog txug nub kws luas tso nwg tawm huv tsev lojcuj lug yog tau peb caug xyaa xyoo rua lub kaum ob hlis, nub neeg nkaum tsib.
Vaajntxwv Evimeludas, ua zoo rua Yehauyakhees hab muab nwg saib hlub dlua lwm tug vaajntxwv kws luas nteg moog rua huv tebchaws Npanpiloos.

Yog le ntawd, luas txhaj muab dlua ib cev rig tsho rua Yehauyakhees naav, hloov cev kws nwg naav nyob huv tsev lojcuj, hab nwg naj nub tau nrug vaajntxwv noj mov sau vaajntxwv lub rooj moog taag nwg simneej.

Thaus kws Yehauyakhees tseem ua neej nyob, Vaajntxwv Evimeludas kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos naj nub muab nyaj rua Yehauyakhees yuav noj yuav naav kuas txaus moog txug nub kws taag Yehauyakhees simneej.
